manchester city lost 2-1 at crystal palace in the premier league. glenn murray and jason puncheon scored for crystal palace. manuel pellegrini believes that palace's first goal was clearly offside. city are now nine points behind league leaders chelsea.
quinton fortune claims neymar looked uncomfortable during barcelona's 1-0 win over celta vigo. the brazilian forward has failed to score in his last four games for barcelona. barcelona remain four points clear at the top of the la liga table. jeremy mathieu scored the only goal of the game in the 73rd minute.
charlie adam scored the goal of his career during stoke city's defeat to chelsea at stamford bridge. adam scored from inside his own half after seeing keeper thibaut courtois off his line. adam's audacious effort was clocked at more than 45 miles per hour. the scotland international scored a 66-yard effort in the first-half.
john terry hailed eden hazard as one of the world's best players after chelsea's 2-1 win over stoke city. diego costa looks set to miss at least two weeks after suffering a hamstring injury. hazard scored a penalty and set up charlie adam to equalise for the blues.
raheem sterling has turned down a new deal with liverpool and put off contract talks until the summer. the 20-year-old winger says he does not want to be seen as a money-grabber. sterling was just 17 years old in 2012 when he was told off by brendan rodgers for answering back at training. sterling has attracted interest from real madrid, bayern munich, manchester city and arsenal.
derby county drew 2-2 with watford county at the ipro stadium on friday night. marco motta was sent off just before half-time for the visitors. darren bent opened the scoring for derby county from the penalty spot after marco vydra was fouled in the box. odion ighalo scored a late equaliser for watford to secure a point for steve mcclaren's side. tom ince put derby county 2-1 up in the 57th minute with a superb strike from the spot.
dundee united have failed to win any of their last 10 games in the scottish premiership. jackie mcnamara's side lost 2-0 to celtic in the league cup final on wednesday. chairman stephen thompson sold star players stuart armstrong and gary mackay-steven during the transfer window.
andre ayew is out of contract at marseille in the summer and will be available on a free transfer. mauricio pochettino is interested in signing the forward. inter milan are thought to be leading the race to land the marseilles star. tottenham have registered their interest in signing ayew.
paris saint-germain forward edinson cavani insists he has a respectful relationship with zlatan ibrahimovic. reports had suggested the pair do not get on amid reports of a rift. cavani says the only issue he has is being played out of position.   cavani has been linked with a summer exit from the club.
nick abendanon was man of the match in clermont's 37-5 thrashing of northampton on saturday. the english full back scored two tries for the french side in the european champions cup. the former bath man hopes to be selected for england at the world cup. anthony watson believes bath are on the verge of winning silverware.
paul casey 'desperately' wants to play in the ryder cup again. the englishman left the european tour to concentrate on the pga tour in january. casey has returned to the world's top 50 after leaving the tour. but he is unlikely to rejoin the tour in time to earn qualifying points this season. only tour members can play on the team.
former qpr boss harry redknapp says raheem sterling should focus on his football rather than his contract dispute. sterling has turned down a new deal with liverpool and put off contract talks. the 20-year-old has refused to sign a new contract at the club. redkapp says sterling is not ready to move to real madrid at this stage of his career.
tottenham striker harry kane believes tottenham still have a chance of qualifying for the champions league. the 21-year-old became the youngest premier league captain this season. spurs are seven points behind manchester city with seven games remaining. kane and danny ings will both be in gareth southgate's under 21 euros squad.
tim sherwood and chris ramsey forged their friendship at tottenham hotspur and remain close friends. sherwood will face ramsey and les ferdinand at villa park on tuesday evening. the pair will face each other in the premier league clash at the end of the season. sherwoods and ramsey are credited with guiding some of the brightest young talents at spurs.
raheem sterling suggested he was considering his future at liverpool last week. but manager brendan rodgers insists the forward has never said he wants to leave the club. rodgers says sterling is focused on playing for liverpool for the rest of the season. sterling has not yet signed a new contract with liverpool.
jose mourinho insists he would sell any chelsea player if they did not want to play for the club. raheem sterling has rejected a new £100,000-a-week deal with liverpool. sterling has attracted interest from arsenal, manchester city and bayern munich. liverpool boss brendan rodgers is adamant that sterling will not be sold in the summer transfer window. sterling will start against arsenal at arsenal on saturday despite admitting he is 'flattered' by interest.
michael owen started his senior career at liverpool but eventually moved on to real madrid in 2004. raheem sterling rejected a £100,000-a-week deal at anfield this week. owen feels that sterling is in a great place to develop. but owen says the 20-year-old is not good enough to leave liverpool.
a tour guide in the australian outback shows tourists how to lure a mob of emus. he kicks his legs in the air to lure the curious flightless birds in the bush. it's thought to be an old aboriginal trick to catch an emu. emus are known to be especially curious birds.
arsenal manager arsene wenger and striker olivier giroud are premier league player and manager of the month. giroud scored five goals in four games for arsenal in march to earn the award. harry kane also scored five times for tottenham in march but missed out on the honour. wenger inspired arsenal to four victories from four games in the premier league.
raheem sterling has turned down a new deal with liverpool and put off contract talks until the summer. the 20-year-old has confirmed he rejected an offer of £100,000-a-week to stay at liverpool. sterling's decision to delay talks with lliverpool is a distraction for players. no footballer has ever been late for kick-off because of talks on a new contract. sterling could have signed his new deal or told liverpool to come back in a year.
raheem sterling is within his rights to get the best possible deal he can for himself, according to roy keane. brendan rodgers remains confident that sterling will stay at liverpool and the situation will be resolved in the summer. former manchester united midfielder keane insists that a footballer should 'always look after no 1'   but liverpool do not have the financial muscle of a city or a chelsea and could lose sterling. daniel sturridge is believed to be earning around £150,000 a week.
dove asked a group of women to write down every thought they had about themselves in a notebook. two undercover actresses read the script out loud for the one beautiful thought ad campaign. the comments were harsh, cutting and bordering on bullying. the beauty brand is known for its empowering campaigns and championing of real women.
twin 18-month-old boys were pronounced dead at a hospital after being pulled from a canal in yuma, arizona. the toddlers are believed to have fallen in the water accidentally at 9.45am on friday. detectives believe the boys ended up in the canal by accident and don't suspect foul play.
yovil drew 1-1 with notts county at huish park on his second day in charge. paul sturrock was promoted five times as a manager. the glovers became the first league one side to suffer back-to-back relegations. the former torquay boss was relegated in his first game in charge .
former us president george h.w. bush, 90, fell ill in december and was hospitalized after complaining of shortness of breath. bush is a fan of associated tennis professionals and lives in the houston area with his wife barbara. he was accompanied by australian tennis player roy emerson at the u.s. men's clay court championship.
mark o'meara carded a 68 on day two at the masters to make the cut. the 58-year-old is the third oldest man in the field in 2015, behind tom watson and ben crenshaw. the 1998 champion was one over after the first round but carded five birdies in his second.
manchester city have apologised to 300 fans who travelled on free coaches to crystal palace. the premier league champions missed the kick-off at selhurst park on bank holiday evening. the club have written to supporters to apologise and promise to refund the cost of their match tickets. manchester city lost 2-1 at crystal palace in premier league clash.
advertising entrepreneur john singleton bought 80 beach drive for a suburb record of $4.25 million in late 2007. the five-bedroom abode offers sweeping views of the pacific ocean and the neighbouring national park. the property still holds a record price for a beach house on the central coast of new south wales. the auction is expected to kick off at $3.5 million.
the wisden–mcc cricket photograph of the year 2014 was won by getty images photographer matthew lewis. he took the winning image of dwayne bravo playing for the west indies. the images show children playing cricket on a rubbish tip in bangladesh and in the crater of mount kilimanjaro.
robbie fowler has named his ultimate premier league team to celebrate his 40th birthday. the former manchester united striker names peter schmeichel, frank de boer and paolo maldini in his team. real madrid's fernando hierro and roberto carlos also feature in the team. liverpool and fifa are challenging fifa 15 ultimate team players to take on fowler's team.
gang of fly-tippers used three tractors and trailers to dump the industrial waste in walsham-le-willows village. police officer said it is the worst case of flytipping he's seen in 28 years and will cost public purse thousands to clear up.
cody got stuck in the mud after wandering into a bog in belvedere, south-east london. animal rescue experts spent more than an hour rescuing the horse from the watery ditch. cody was covered head to hoof in mud after being dragged to safety.
leaflet told stratford-upon-avon residents what items could go in green bins but footnote said 'this is not recyclable'   residents in the district were named as among the best recyclers in england earlier this year. stratford district council was in the top ten councils for recycling and composting for second year running.
perth glory supporters, who set off a series of flares, will face the prospect of a five year ban. police have charged two teenagers for allegedly setting off flares at nib stadium. a 13-year-old boy suffered burns to his leg after a flare was set off during the club's 3-0 defeat to sydney fc on friday. the two teenagers have been charged with grievous bodily harm and use of flares. nib stadium operators venueswest has threatened a five-year ban on the patrons.
darron gibson underwent tests on his damaged metatarsal. everton manager roberto martinez expects gibson to return to pre-season in the best possible shape. romelu lukaku is only '50/50' to be involved against swansea due to a hamstring injury.
eagle scout brian gewirtz told his family he was going for a walk near his brooklyn, new york, home on february 17. his body was discovered at marine park golf club, two miles from his home. his family started a frantic search in the local community, warning people of his disability.
abdul hadi arwani, 48, was found slumped in a car in wembley with bullet wounds to the chest on wednesday morning. imam was found dead at the an-noor mosque in acton, west london. he had been replaced at the mosque by hassan anyabwile from trinidad and tobago. he is named in a report on an attempted coup d'état in 1990 and was'responsible' for the use of explosives. he stepped down from the mosque last year after it was linked to extremism. mr arwali was said to have been embroiled in dispute with his former workplace.
darron gibson will miss the final seven games of the season with metatarsal damage. roberto martinez expects gibson to be ready for pre-season as he does not require surgery. everton will look to extend gibson's contract this summer as he recovers from injury. martinez has moved to assure gibson he has a place in his plans despite holding an interest in tom cleverley.
bradley neil finished 13 over par after competing in his first masters. the 19-year-old from scotland finished day two at six over par. the young scot has been tipped for big things by the likes of rory mcilroy. neil earned his invitation to the masters after winning scottish boys championship.
danny willett carded a one-under 71 during his first ever round at the masters on thursday. the englishman was frustrated with a rules official for getting in his line-of-sight during his round. the 27-year-old shot a bogey on the 17th green at augusta national.
bradley neil missed the cut on his debut at the masters at augusta national. the amateur champion carded rounds of 78 and 79 to finish 13 over par. the 19-year-old played with 1988 masters winner sandy lyle. the scot admitted he needed to 'give himself a kick up the a***'
sadie the german shepherd was filmed at home in alberta, canada, switching on an electric organ with her nose and sitting down to play some tunes. she was filmed playing a minimalist piece of music. after a 20-second rendition, she turns around to take a bow.
m25 was closed between junctions four and five in ortford, kent to rescue a seriously injured motorcyclist. long tailbacks built up on both sides of the motorway as air ambulance landed. kent police tweeted warning motorists to remain inside their vehicles. two teenagers found themselves stranded on the wrong side of the road after the road reopened.
rory mcilroy finished seven shots behind first-round leader jordan spieth at the augusta golf tournament. the world no 1 carded a one-under-par 71 in the second round.    mcilroy goes out in the penultimate group with phil mickelson and ryan moore at 6.48pm on friday.
mercedes drivers lewis hamilton and nico rosberg finished second and third in malaysia. sebastian vettel won the second grand prix of the season for ferrari. mercedes chief toto wolff claims the champions will just keep calm and carry on .
andy murray will face novak djokovic in the final of the miami open on sunday. the british no1 is set to marry his fiancee kim sears in dunblane next saturday. murray has lost nine out of his last 10 matches against the world no1.
richie gray has one year left on his contract but will be released should castres olympique go down. glasgow warriors have been placed on high alert after it was revealed gray could be sold. gray will be sold to the highest bidder if castres are relegated from the top 14. johnnie beattie and max evans are also expected to leave castres.
lawrence dallaglio views poor performance of english clubs as a 'crisis' for french rugby. saracens are the nation's solitary representative in the semi-finals of the european rugby champions cup. northampton and wasps were knocked out of the competition by clermont and racing metro 92. dallagelio does not believe there is a gulf in class between the english and french leagues.
tom croft has signed a new deal with leicester despite his recent injury troubles. the flanker has been out for six months with a dislocated shoulder and a broken neck. director of rugby richard cockerill says croft is 'world-class'    croft missed most of last season with a knee injury and has missed the world cup.
tom poynton missed the entire 2014 campaign due to leg injuries sustained in a road accident. his father keith died last april. the 25-year-old has signed a new one-year contract extension with derbyshire. he will be available for the start of the season.
mike ashley was given security over the icons and logos as part of the £5m loan handed to the previous board. reports suggested newcastle owner was now the official owner of the light blues trademarks. dave king's new regime have promised a speedy investigation into the claims.
sebastian vettel won the second race of the season in malaysia last month. james allison believes mercedes are likely to lead the way in china this weekend. lewis hamilton and nico rosberg finished second and third.
manchester united sit above manchester city in the premier league table for the first time since november 23, 2013. the red devils have played the same number of games after having played same amount of league games. manchester lost 2-1 at crystal palace on monday night to trail city by a point in the table. louis van gaal's side travel to old trafford in the manchester derby on sunday.
cristiano ronaldo was booked for diving during real madrid's 2-0 win against rayo vallecano on wednesday. the portuguese was set to miss saturday's game against eibar at the bernabeu. but his yellow card has now been rescinded and he will start for the club. the star forward was booked after being brought down by antonio amaya.
sergio aguero has scored six goals in derby meetings with manchester united. the argentine forward says scoring against united is enough to give him shivers. manchester city face united at old trafford on sunday afternoon. aguero believes radamel falcao is one of the most gifted players in world football.
lazio beat napoli 1-0 on wednesday to reach the final of the coppa italia. lazio will face juventus in the final on june 7. defender mauricio captured the lazio fans celebrations using a selfie stick. the roman side face empoli in the serie a final on sunday.
hector bellerin has been linked with a move back to former club barcelona. the 20-year-old right back left the catalan giants four years ago. dani alves' contract expires at the end of the season at arsenal. barca fans have voted for the spaniard to replace the brazilian at the club.
james rodriguez is 'worth his weight in gold' according to spanish newspaper marca. real madrid have won 80 per cent of their games when the colombian midfielder is in the side. focus on cristiano ronaldo's appeal as roberto mancini reveals his targets for inter milan. tuttosport interview juventus striker alvaro morata as he says he is not interested in a return to real.
eden hazard believes chelsea have the premier league title in their grasp. eden hazard scored a penalty and set up loic remy's winner in 2-1 win over stoke city on saturday. jose mourinho's side are seven points clear at the top of the table.
zlatan ibrahimovic scored a hat-trick for paris saint-germain in their semi-final win over saint etienne. the 33-year-old has scored 102 goals in less than three years for the french side. christophe galtier called the striker the ‘best foreigner to ever play in france'    he has never played in the premier league but is considered to be one of the finest strikers of his generation.
bayern munich beat bayer leverkusen 5-3 in a penalty shoot-out to reach the semi-final of the german cup. pep guardiola is concerned about his team without arjen robben and franck ribery. robben is out until may with a stomach muscle tear and riberry is injured. munich have scored just once in their last three games without the pair.
david luiz is out for at least four weeks after tearing a hamstring at marseille on sunday night. the psg defender posted an instagram picture sporting a new hairdo in the style of a man bun. the 27-year-old suffered a torn hamstring in paris saint-germain's 3-2 win.
eight teams will play 60 matches in the 2015 edition of the indian premier league. ms dhoni's chennai super kings are looking to win their third title. the final of the tournament takes place at eden gardens in kolkata on may 24. yuvraj singh's salary is the highest in the tournament.
tim sherwood has branded aston villa’s stars ‘icing on the cake players’ ahead of their match with qpr. sherwood believes his star names must dig deep to avert their relegation crisis. qpr host queens park rangers on tuesday night in the premier league.
christian benteke scored a hat-trick as aston villa drew 3-3 with qpr at villa park on tuesday night. chris ramsey's side drew with relegation rivals qpr in the premier league. boweke's late free-kick secured a vital point for chris ramssey's men. matt phillips impressed for qpr with a superb performance in midfield.
arsenal under 21s take on stoke city at the emirates stadium on tuesday night. jack wilshere, mikel arteta and abou diaby all start for steve gatting's side. club captain arteta has been out of action since november with an ankle injury. serge gnabry and dan crowley also in the starting line-up for the young gunners.
liam treadwell has been booked to ride michael scudamore-trained monbeg dude in saturday's grand national. treadwell won the race on venetia williams-trained 100-1 shot mon mome in 2009. rugby union star mike tindall co-owns the former welsh national winner.
alastair cook insists he is'refreshed' by this winter's enforced sabbatical at home on the farm. cook will lead england in three caribbean tests against india this month. cook has only scored eight runs in two innings since christmas. cook hopes england can regain the ashes when they face australia later this summer.
nabil fekir's father believes a move to arsenal would benefit the lyon star, rather than manchester city. mohamed believes his son would progress under arsene wenger at the club. the frontman has been attracting interest from premier league club man city. but his father does not want his son to sit on the bench at man city .
kevin pietersen has lashed out at graham gooch for commenting on his attempted england comeback. gooch appeared on bbc radio five live and took a supportive stance of the batsman. former england captain gooch said pieterson had 'wiped the floor with the ecb'   gooch was the national side's batting coach until his sacking in 2014. incoming ecb chairman colin graves said signing for a domestic side would help piet andersen.
jack wilshere, mikel arteta and abou diaby are set to play for arsenal under 21s against stoke city at the emirates stadium on tuesday night. steve gatting's young gunners take on stokecity in a u21 premier league clash. club captain arteta has been out of action since november with an ankle injury. all three players featured in last week's practice match against brentford development.
fabian orellana was shown a straight red card during barcelona's 1-0 la liga victory against celta vigo. celta striker threw a lump of grass in the direction of barcelona midfielder sergio busquets. jeremy mathieu scored the only goal of the match in the 73rd minute.
kevin pietersen has re-signed for surrey this summer in an attempt to earn an england recall. the batsman has not played for england since 2013. incoming ecb chairman colin graves said signing for a domestic side would help. peter moores said he 'isn't on the radar' of a test recall. pieterson starts batting for surreys on monday. he has hinted his net session could be streamed live to fans on twitter.
diego costa limped off with a hamstring injury after 10 minutes after coming on at the interval. jose mourinho was happy to gamble with costa's fitness despite losing the striker. loic remy and eden hazard scored in chelsea's 2-1 win over stoke city at stamford bridge.
manuel pellegrini is hoping financial restrictions imposed by uefa will be lifted at the end of this season. manchester city have been limited to a net transfer spend of £49million in the last two transfer windows. the club breached financial fairplay regulations by spending too much in the summer of 2014-15. but the club's latest financial figures show they have reduced losses of £23million.
brittany lincicome beat stacy lewis in a play-off to win the ana inspiration tournament at mission hills country club in california. it was her second ana inspiration title after she won the tournament in 2011. lincolnicombe eagled the final hole of the final round to seal victory. the win was her first lpga tour victory since 2011.
derby county want sean dyche to replace steve mcclaren at the end of the season. former england boss has been linked with newcastle and sunderland. derby have been impressed with dyche's work in the premier league this season.
darren bent has scored nine goals in 13 games for derby since going on loan from aston villa in january. the striker could return to the rams in the summer after his contract runs out at the end of the season. bent is focussed on helping derby get promoted to the premier league. the 31-year-old is keeping his options open.
tim sherwood and chris ramsey's careers could be shaped by 90 minutes at villa park on tuesday night. qpr go to the home of sherwood's villa for a match that could see them out of the bottom three. the pair know each other inside out after working together at tottenham hotspur. a win for qpr would see them go above chris' villa in the premier league table.
jordan henderson is not ready to give up on liverpool's champions league hopes. liverpool are eight points behind manchester united in fourth place in the league. the club lost 4-1 to arsenal at arsenal on saturday and are two points off the top four. but he has urged his team to not give up and target seven wins out of seven in league.
aston villa host rangers in the premier league on tuesday night. tim sherwood has labelled it the club's 'biggest game' of the season. he admits he does not have the players to beat relegation rivals qpr. sherwood faces his friend and former tottenham assistant chris ramsey at rangers.
queens park rangers drew 3-3 at aston villa in the premier league on tuesday night. christian benteke scored a hat-trick to keep villa above the relegation zone. chris ramsey's side remain two points adrift of safety in the table. clint hill believes qpr's relegation rivals will be worried about them. the defender scored his first premier league goal in the draw at villa.
burnley manager sean dyche has been tipped to replace steve mcclaren at derby. dyche insists he is enjoying the challenge at turf moor. the clarets are currently second from bottom of the premier league. the burnley boss cannot believe some gunners fans were calling for arsene wenger to be sacked.
qpr boss chris ramsey believes tim sherwood will keep aston villa in the premier league. ramsey and sherwood were in the trenches together at spurs and live within 10 minutes of each other. if he was a betting man, ramsey says he would bet on sherwood to keep villa up. qpr beat west brom 4-1 at the hawthorns on saturday.
tony fernandes spoke of his despair after his queens park rangers team twice threw away a lead against aston villa. christian benteke scored a hat-trick to earn a 3-3 draw at villa park. rangers chairman was watching the game from afar on his iphone away from the game. matt phillips had given qpr the lead in the first half but they had to settle for a point.
wallace has been released without charge after being questioned by police on'suspicion of a sexual offence' the 20-year-old right back is on a season-long loan at vitesse arnhem. wallace signed for chelsea in january 2013 and has been loaned out to fluminense and inter milan.
eight clubs still have a chance of promotion to the premier league with five games to play in the championship. bournemouth's matt ritchie and norwich's bradley johnson could be playing in the top flight next season. watford striker troy deeney has scored 63 league goals this season. will hughes and bakary sako are two other players who could be in the league next season .
the 161st oxford-cambridge boat race will be televised for the first time on saturday. the women's crews will race on the same thames course as the men. it is 88 years since the first women to race were jeered by male spectators. clare balding will present the event on channel 4.
chelsea face qpr at loftus road on sunday in the premier league. john terry was caught up in a race controversy with then-qpr defender anton ferdinand in 2011. terry was cleared in court of racially abusing ferdinand but was banned and fined by the football association. team-mate gary cahill says terry will handle the hostile reception at the ground.
oxford university women's boat race team were overcome by choppy waters on the thames. royal national lifeboat institution came to the assistance of the crew and their cox. crew were training for the boat race which takes place on saturday, april 11. the rowers were returned safely to putney by crew from chiswick rnli.
nathan hughes was handed a three-week ban for knocking out george north at franklin's gardens. wasps will appeal against the decision to ban the back row. hughes will not be able to play in sunday's champions cup quarter-final against toulon.
nemanja matic and cesc fabregas are one booking away from a two-game ban. the duo would miss games against arsenal and manchester united if shown a yellow card. jose mourinho will start the pair against queens park rangers at loftus road on sunday.
leeds rhino beat castleford 26-12 in the super league derby at the mend-a-hose jungle. joel moon scored his first try of the season for the rhinos. ryan hall scored a double for leeds and adam cuthbertson also crossed. leeds captain kevin sinfield sat out during the week he announced he was switching codes.
northampton have ruled out winger george north for the game against clermont auvergne on saturday. the wing was knocked unconscious against wasps on friday night. north has been sent to see a neurosurgeon. northampton director of rugby jim mallinder said the winger will miss the game. north was knocked out after colliding with wasps' nathan hughes's knee.
tom lineham scored two interception tries in an eye-catching hat-trick as hull fc beat widnes 22-8. hull make it back-to-back wins for the first time since last june. kevin brown and patrick ah van scored tries for widnes. jamie shaul went over late on for hull.
george north suffered his third confirmed concussion in four months against wasps last friday. north was knocked out after a collision with the knee of nathan hughes. northampton wing will be reassessed at the end of april. north has been ordered by a neurologist to take at least a month off.
jacob fairbank fractured his ankle and suffered ligament damage while on loan at halifax. the huddersfield forward faces a lengthy spell on the sidelines. the 25-year-old was injured in halifax's victory over hunslet on easter monday.
jonathan trott failed twice with the bat during england's four-day warm-up match in st kitts. trott looks set to open the batting with alastair cook in the first test against west indies in antigua. ian bell was unbeaten on 43 when he retired in the morning session. chris jordan and james tredwell were also in action for the hosts.
ben stokes took three for 10 in an impressive spell with the ball as england dominated st kitts & nevis xi. alastair cook and jonathan trott scored an unbeaten 95 and 72 in the warm-up match. stokes described cook as one of the best batsmen in the world after his return to form.
richie benaud revealed late last year that he had skin cancer and was receiving radiation treatment. the cricket commentary box legend died on friday at the age of 84. he was diagnosed with skin cancers on his forehead and the top of his head. benaud said he believed the cancers were caused by playing cricket in the sun without a hat or sunscreen. he said 'as a kid we never ever wore a cap' and advised australians to cover their heads. the 84-year-old was in a car accident in october 2013 and had been receiving treatment for skin cancer. he had not returned to his commentary job for the nine network following the accident.
loic remy scored chelsea's winner against stoke in the 2-1 premier league win on saturday. diego costa left the game with a hamstring injury. jose mourinho praised remy's professionalism and scoring ability. remy also scored the winner against hull before the international break.
louis smith, 25, is a medal-winning olympic gymnast and strictly come dancing champion. posts a stream of topless selfies on instagram. has been dating towie's lucy mecklenburgh for four months. shot to fame after winning bronze and silver medal at the 2012 london games.
tottenham defender kyle walker was injured in the 0-0 draw with burnley on sunday. there were fears walker may have broken his foot after a heavy collision with kieran trippier. scans on tuesday showed heavy bruising but no fracture on walker's foot.
cameron thomas philp graffitied and spat on the side of a police forensics van in brisbane in 2013. he pleaded guilty to wilful damage of police property and was fined $300 but avoided a conviction. mr philp was caught after a forensic officer swabbed the spit and located him from his dna.

jeanetta riley, 35, a mother-of-three daughters was killed last july after she brandished a knife at two cops outside of a hospital in sandpoint, idaho. she was taken to hospital by her husband, shane, 44, after he heard her talking about killing herself. the native american woman was addicted to meth and alcohol and had been taken to the hospital by him . officers michael valenzuela, 27 and skyler ziegler, 29 were cleared of any wrongdoing following the incident.
georgina rojas-medina, 41, was shot and killed by her common-law husband, gerardo tovar, 44, who then turned the gun on himself, according to police in tulare, california. neighbors say they were alerted to the bodies by the couple’s 4-year-old daughter  just after midnight on saturday. the couple had been together for 13 years.
children who share ipads in class do much better in early literacy tests than those who don’t, researchers claim. shared ipad students scored around 30 points higher in a test than students who used the device on their own and non-ipad users. courtney blackwell, at northwestern university in the us, conducted the research.
dr seuss fans flock to visit the 12-cabin-high structure 130 miles from anchorage, alaska. it was once a two-story home but was abandoned after a forest fire. new owners are now renovating the property to withstand the strong winds. the tower was built after the owner wanted to see the mountains from his cabin.

retired engineer, dave tyler captured these stunning pictures showing the ferocious activity on the sun's surface during its solar maximum. the 72-year-old designed and built his own observatory in 1977 and now uses powerful telescopes to observe and photograph the solar system. the amateur snapper is able to capture a wide variety of phenomena from his own home near high wycombe.

chelsea and tottenham hotspur under 21s draw 0-0 at home to manchester united. win would have taken spurs joint top of the under 21 league with red devils. ruben loftus-cheek played for chelsea but was forced off injured after 37 minutes. deandre yedlin impressed at right-back for spurs and is already a senior international.
around 5,700 pensioners are now diagnosed with melanoma each year in the uk compared with just 600 a year 40 years ago. men aged 65 and over are ten times more likely to be diagnosed with malignant melanoma. getting sunburnt once every two years can triple a person's risk of developing the disease.
kenny jackett's wolves moved into sixth place in the championship with a fourth successive victory. charlie taylor opened the scoring for leeds after 11 minutes. wolves striker benik afobe equalised for the home side before half-time. nouha dicko put leeds in front before alex mowatt scored wolves' third goal of the afternoon. substitute david edwards scored a late winner for wolves to move wolves up to sixth place.
bournemouth came from two goals down to beat birmingham city 4-2 at the goldsands stadium. steve cook and callum wilson scored for bournemouth in the first half. yann kermorgant scored a penalty to make it 3-2 to the visitors. charlie daniels scored a late goal to seal the win for the hosts. eddie howe's side were down to fourth in the championship after being 2-0 down.
referee german delfino awarded a penalty to velez sarsfield after daniel valencia was adjudged to have handled the ball in the area . linesman ivan nunez caught a replay of the incident on a nearby cameraman's monitor and informed the referee. velez striker mariano pavone was shown a yellow card for the handball. but  delfino overturned the decision and allowed valencia to return to the field.
ander herrera has expressed his desire to remain at manchester united for years to come. the midfielder scored twice in the 3-1 win over aston villa at old trafford on saturday.    the 25-year-old has started the last eight matches for the red devils after starting the season as a substitute.
real madrid goalkeeper iker casillas comforted a young fan who was struck by a ball during the 9-1 win over granada. casillas handed the supporter his real madrid shirt during the half-time break. casilla alerted stewards and medical staff after the incident. the la liga giants eased to a comfortable win at the santiago bernabeu.
manchester united winger ashley young went to watch his younger brother lewis in action for crawley town against oldham athletic. the england international started for the home side against the latics in league one on monday. young's brother is a regular in the crawley side as a winger or striker.
bradley johnson scored twice as norwich city beat sheffield wednesday 2-0 at carrow road. the canaries move into the sky bet championship's top two for the first time since october. the midfielder scored his 12th and 13th goals of the season in the first half. norwich maintain their automatic promotion hopes with victory.
jordan henderson has already rejected a five-year deal worth £80,000-per-week from liverpool. the club's vice-captain wants to stay at anfield but he is approaching the final year of his contract. he is seeking a new contract worth £100,000 per week before committing his future to the club.
manchester city fans have been given free travel on six coaches to take them to crystal palace. around 3,000 fans will be taken to selhurst park for monday's premier league clash. hundreds of thousands of football fans face travel misery over easter rail shut down.
nakhi wells opened the scoring for huddersfield after 12 minutes at john smith's stadium. james vaughan doubled the lead for the home side after 30 minutes. ipswich manager mick mccarthy made two changes at half-time. luke varney headed home early in the second half but it wasn't enough.
ben cousins was supposed to appear in court to face reckless driving charges on wednesday morning but he failed to show up. the former afl star handed himself in to police after failing to make a court appearance over traffic charges. cousins smiled as he left fremantle magistrates court with a smug smirk on his face. the magistrate labelled cousins 'a risk to the public' and warned him he faces a jail term. his lawyer claimed the former west coast eagles captain had conflicting medical appointments. cousins was arrested on march 11 after allegedly leading police on a chase.

arsene wenger had all but given up on francis coquelin when he was sent on loan to charlton before christmas. hector bellerin has played a vital role in arsenal's late push for the premier league title. wenger admits he didn't expect the duo to be playing such key roles.
turkish team captain arda turan was celebrating after the team's 2-1 international friendly victory against luxembourg. he went to the cockpit to use the tannoy to congratulate his team-mates. turkish aviation officials said it was a serious breach of the safety rules of the flight. the crew of a turkish airlines flight are being investigated.
manuel pellegrini says manchester city must sign a 'crack' player in the summer. manchester are currently fourth in the premier league. the chilean manager insists his side must splash the cash to keep pace with rivals. man city were punished for breaching financial fair play regulations last summer.
roy deeney opened the scoring for watford in the 37th minute. odion ighalo scored his 19th goal of the season on 65 minutes to make it 2-0. middlesbrough have now lost four of their past five away games in the premier league.
malky mackay has been sacked as wigan athletic manager after just five months in charge. the latics lost 2-0 at home to derby county on monday and are facing relegation. chairman david sharpe made a snap decision to sack the 43-year-old after the defeat. wigan are eight points off championship safety with five games to play. m mackay was previously manager of cardiff city and was accused of sending racist, sexist and homophobic text messages.

juan arango bites the shoulder of opponent jesus zavela in a moment of madness. arango's club tijuana lost 4-3 to monterrey in the mexican league. the 34-year-old was not booked but could face a retrospective ban. he earlier scored a magnificent free kick to bring his side level against monterreys.

video allegedly shows militants destroying ancient ruins of the city of nimrud in northern iraq using sledgehammers, drills and barrel bombs. sculptures and stone slabs believed to be 3,000 years old are destroyed in seven-minute video. islamic state militants have been destroying ancient relics on several cultural heritage sites. attack on the ancient site has been declared a 'war crime' by u.n. secretary-general ban ki-moon.

ander herrera scored a brace against aston villa without actually looking at the ball. the manchester united midfielder appears to have his eyes closed. six of seven of herrera's seven goals have been scored without looking at goal. the 25-year-old joined the red devils for £29million in the summer.
andre-pierre gignac opened the scoring for marseille after half an hour against paris st germain. blaise matuidi equalised for the hosts before half-time. marquinhos and jeremy morel scored own goals to make it 2-1 to psg. zlatan ibrahimovic scored a late own goal to make the game 3-2 for the visitors. psg came from behind twice to win the game and move top of the ligue 1 table.

seven baby foxes were discovered in a cardboard box left by a clothing donation bin in a car park in pennsylvania. the newborn cubs were only 10 days old and weighed around six ounces each. they were taken in by the pocono wildlife rehabilitation and educational center. the cubs are being bottle-fed special fox milk and formula and will be released back into the wild.
the new main stand at anfield will be completed by the start of the 2016-17 season. steel foundations for the new stand are now taller than the existing structure. work on the main stand is expected to be finished in 15 months time. anfield's main stand will be able to seat 21,000 spectators. liverpool hosted newcastle in premier league on monday.
man was kicked out of neely's grog house in port st lucie, miami, florida, after paying with bounced checks. he returned with a cup of gasoline and threw it on the bouncer. bouncer tackled the man to the ground and chased after him. the man set the man on fire and was taken to the hospital with serious burns.

jury selection has begun for the murder trial of 17-year-old chancey luna accused of shooting chris lane. lane, 22, from melbourne, was shot in the back on august 16, 2013. lane was jogging along a road in duncan, oklahoma, when he was killed. if found guilty, luna faces a maximum sentence of life in jail without the prospect of release.
unnamed 13-year-old boy from medina, ohio, gave out $100 notes at claggett middle school in medina. he and his friends went on a spending spree at a friend's house after school. police have recovered $7,000 of the man's savings from his bedside table.
hln's the daily share video shows price differences between men and women's versions of the exact same products and services. the practice of gender-biased pricing discrimination is legal in almost every state in the us. women make, on average, 78 cents on the dollar more than men.
jordan spieth carded a double bogey on the 17th but still set a new 54-hole scoring record at the masters. the 21-year-old leads the 79th masters by five shots going into the final round. world no 1 rory mcilroy and tiger woods are in a five-way tie for fifth. phil mickelson and charley hoffman are five shots behind spieth.
matt kemp's anger management issues cost him his first marriage and his business. he labelled his pregnant wife a 'c***' during an episode of sbs's heat in the kitchen in 2004. former nrl player mark geyer also had anger issues and appears on insight on tuesday. the proud father-of-five said he missed out on the births of his children because of his uncontrollable rage. he credits his turnaround to being a father and turning his life around.
the 75-year-old man was playing golf at the palmer sea reef golf course at port douglas in queensland. a man was bitten on the leg by a crocodile on monday afternoon. the man suffered a deep laceration to his shin and puncture wounds to his calf. he believes he accidentally stood on the saltwater crocodile while looking at his golf ball. clive palmer owns the golf course and posted his well wishes to the man on his twitter account.

josi harrison, laura lefebvre, and hailey walden were bullied into sending nude pictures to a boy at clatskanie middle school in oregon. they reported ordeal to school officials but were told to'suck it up' after sending one they were blackmailed into sending more. principal and police chief said they would be charged with child pornography for the distribution of photos. two years after filing a civil claim against the school district, it was ordered to pay $225,000 to the girls.
liverpool beat newcastle 4-3 in a seven goal thriller at anfield on april 1996. martin tyler classed the game as his favourite game of all time. manchester united and newcastle were playing for the premier league title at the time.    the game still holds a place in tyler's personal archive and he still remembers the iconic shots.
wolfsburg are showing an interest in manchester united misfit javier hernandez. the mexico international has endured a frustrating season on loan at real madrid. wolfsburg are looking to bring in another striker and have also considered edin dzeko at manchester city. united are understood to have made a revised contract offer to andreas pereira. liverpool still anticipate goalkeeper norberto neto will join juventus.

raymond billam, 40, claimed he was unable to walk more than a few metres and needed crutches. grandfather-of-four claimed £15,000 in incapacity benefit for back and knee problems. but fraud investigators secretly filmed him playing for his sunday league team. he was filmed running and jumping as he took to the pitch for his pub football team. billam admitted benefit fraud and was sentenced to a 26-week suspended prison sentence.

liverpool midfielder philippe coutinho says winning the fa cup would save their season. fifth-placed liverpool are seven points adrift of fourth with seven games left in the premier league. brendan rodgers' side face fa cup quarter-final replay at blackburn on wednesday night.
manchester united beat aston villa 3-1 at old trafford in the premier league on saturday. louis van gaal's side moved up to third in the table after the win. ander herrera opened the scoring for manchester united in the 43rd minute. wayne rooney scored a stunning half-volley on 79 minutes to put united 2-0 ahead. christian benteke scored a late goal to make it 3-0 for the red devils. united are now eight points clear of aston villa at the top of the table.
alan pardew is a contender for manager of the year with his record at newcastle and crystal palace. 'team pardew' would sit in eighth place in the premier league with his records at both clubs this season. pardew's crystal palace beat manchester city 2-1 at selhurst park on monday. john carver's toon are currently in the relegation zone at st james park.
bafetimbi gomis scored twice in swansea's 3-1 win over hull on saturday and tops this week's ea sports' performance index. the striker has scored four goals in his last six premier league games. charlie austin is the runner up with a game index score of 52.9. eden hazard is the third best premier league player of the weekend.
brendan rodgers could recall dejan lovren for the fa cup quarter-final at blackburn on wednesday. liverpool were thrashed 4-1 by arsenal in the premier league on saturday. rodgers has been out of the liverpool team recently, but could call on the defender. kolo toure started in the place of martin skrtel at arsenal.
alex pritchard put brentford ahead in the 21st minute with a stunning strike. but derby equalised in the 92nd minute as darren bent scored in stoppage time to draw 1-1 with derby.    derby had a second-half goal cleared off the line by jonathan douglas.
tony pulis has discussed pre-season plans with saido berahino. west brom manager believes the england under 21 striker will stay at the hawthorns beyond the summer. berahinos has said he wants to play european football. berhino is likely to be away with gareth southgate's under 21 side in the czech republic.
leicester are bottom of the premier league and six points adrift of safety. boss nigel pearson insists leicester have no margin for error in relegation fight. the foxes travel to west brom on saturday in the league. matt upson and dean hammond are back in training after returning from injury.
barcelona drew 2-2 at sevilla in the champions league on saturday night. neymar was replaced by luis enrique with the score at 2-1. the brazilian forward was left fuming after being substituted by the barcelona star. luises enrique has replaced the forward in 15 of his 34 matches this season. in spain, attention is focused on the madrid derby, while in italy the focus is on lazio's win.
watford captain troy deeney has scored 20 goals in the championship this season. the watford striker is hoping to lead the hornets to the premier league next season. watford are currently just one point behind championship leaders bournemouth with five games to play .  deeney was named the sky bet championship player of the month for march.
jeremy peace has put the club up for sale for £150million. chairman wants to ensure his legacy is maintained at west bromwich albion. tony pulis is adamant peace will only sell the club to a buyer who wants to invest heavily. peace is open to selling the club but only to a suitable owner.
michael owen says raheem sterling is a better player than mesut ozil according to bt sport pundit. the former liverpool forward made the claim before arsenal lost 4-1 against liverpool at the emirates on saturday. ozil scored arsenal's second goal in the game. owen believes there should not be a debate about whether sterling is more talented.
robert lewandowski returned to haunt his former club as bayern munich claimed a narrow victory against borussia dortmund . the poland striker scored the winner on his first visit back to the club he left on a free transfer last summer. pep guardiola's side restored their 10-point lead at the top of the bundesliga.
mateo musacchio fractured his fibula and dislocated his left ankle during villarreal's 1-1 draw at getafe. the 24-year-old is expected to be sidelined for at least six months. santi cazorla tweeted support for the defender.
bayern munich face bayer leverkusen in the german cup quarter-final on wednesday. bastian schweinsteiger suffered an ankle injury during bayern's 1-0 win over dortmund on saturday. the midfielder is doubtful for the game after limping off with the injury. tom starke has been ruled out for four weeks with an ankle ligament injury.
bayern munich travel to bayer leverkusen in the german cup quarter-final on wednesday. manager pep guardiola has a number of injuries ahead of the game. manuel neuer's side beat borussia dortmund 1-0 in the bundesliga on saturday.
manuel pellegrini says manchester city's academy players are not ready for the first team. premier league regulations require clubs to have at least eight homegrown players. frank lampard is leaving the club in the summer and james milner could leave. city manager may look to buy english players like raheem sterling and jack wilshere.
gary caldwell admitted his first taste of management was 'crazy' following wigan's 2-2 draw against fulham. the latics came from behind to earn a point at craven cottage on friday. kit symons' side are nine points clear of the drop zone .
gary hooper came off the bench to score a stoppage-time winner against bolton. the former celtic striker lobbed adam bogdan to earn norwich all three points. graham dorrans had given the visitors the lead in the ninth minute. adam le fondre equalised for the visitors with a deflected free-kick. norwich remain second in the sky bet championship after the win.
manchester united beat manchester city 4-2 in the manchester derby at old trafford on sunday. louis van gaal's side are now four points clear in third place in the premier league. man of the match ashley young, marouane fellaini, juan mata and chris smalling scored for united.gary neville has hailed manchester united as a team that is 'the real deal' after the win.
england beat championship leaders south africa 21-14 in the final of the sevens world series in tokyo. phil burgess, charlie hayter and tom mitchell scored tries in the victory. it is england's first title on the series since feb. 2013.
tracey neville is phil neville's twin and sister to england netball coach gary neville. tracey is taking england's netball team to this summer's world cup in australia. she is currently the head coach of manchester thunder. neville believes she is a natural leader like her footballing brothers.
wing's chinese restaurant is in manchester city centre and is a favourite of manchester united players. ownermr wing is a regular at the five-star venue. radamel falcao dined at wing's on the day he signed for united. wayne rooney and his wife, coleen, are also regular visitors. the restaurant is more popular with united players but attracts a wide range of celebrities regularly.
arsene wenger's side beat liverpool 3-0 at the emirates on saturday in the premier league. the gunners have won seven league games in a row and sit second in the table. but arsene's side are yet to challenge for the title this season. alexis sanchez, mesut ozil and jack wilshere are the best players in the league. but wenger needs to strengthen in defence, midfield and forward to be title challengers.
kenny miller fears rangers' promotion bid could be derailed by ibrox side's rollercoaster run of form. rangers slumped to a 3-0 defeat at queen of the south on thursday night. the light blues are currently third in the scottish championship.
jake drage sang a children's song for reporters as he left a west java jail nine months after he was put behind bars. the 23-year-old surfer was jailed after a crash that killed a woman who was riding a motorcycle with her teenage daughter. drage was taken into custody in june last year. the surfer said he cannot wait to get back in the water after his release.
tennis champion novak djokovic shouted at his backroom team during the miami open final. he grabbed a towel from a ball boy who was caught up in the cross fire. the ball boy was startled by the loud confrontation. djkovic issued an apology to the youngster and his parents after his victory. the serb defeated britain's andy murray in the final.
every one of african football's 54 member countries will vote for sepp blatter in the presidential election. issa hayatou has promised unanimous support for the president of the confederation of africa. blatter is running for a fifth term and has three challengers standing against him.
mikel gonzalez opened the scoring for atletico madrid after just 10 minutes. antoine griezmann doubled the hosts' lead in the 10th minute at the vicente calderon. real sociedad keeper geronimo rulli was forced to make a series of saves to keep his side in the game.    fernando torres came on for the final 30 minutes but was unable to make an impact on the match.
cristiano ronaldo scored his 300th goal for real madrid in the 2-0 win at rayo vallecano on wednesday. the 30-year-old becomes only the third player in madrid's history to reach the milestone. he has scored 161 of his goals in the santiago bernabeu and has scored 60 in the champions league.
ex-tottenham and england star gary mabbutt, 53, was rushed to hospital after his leg went cold at 1am in 2013. his diabetes caused an artery to be clogged and needed emergency surgery to save the limb. surgeons had to replace the main artery in his left leg with a vein and needed 112 staples to seal the wound. he was left with a 30inch scar on his leg after the five-hour operation to save his leg. mab buttbutt was diagnosed with type 1 diabetes at 17 and will never play football again.
the 46-year-old works out three times a week with her long-term trainer mandy ingber. her pt sessions include 20-25 minutes of spinning, followed by 45 minutes of yoga. jennifer aniston shows off her toned arms at the oscars.
bizarre incident was caught on cctv and shows a man trying to lift the exit barrier at nottingham train station's car park. british transport police have released image of the man in the hope he will be recognised. incident occurred at the multi-storey car park on saturday, march 14.
real madrid drew 0-0 with atletico madrid in the champions league quarter-final first leg at the vicente calderon on tuesday. jan oblak made a string of excellent saves to deny gareth bale and james rodriguez. carlo ancelotti wants his side to repeat their performance at the bernabeu next week.
star stopped by the couple's wedding reception in berkshire and sung 'a million love songs' as a wedding gift. danielle jones, 33, and her husband darrel were married on good friday. she and her bridesmaids had asked the singer to perform at their wedding. barlow had promised to surprise the couple over twitter.
deanna robinson, of quinlan, texas, was 38 weeks pregnant when she says she was struck at least three times at her parents' home. she said deputies and state workers from child protective services were present to remove her 18-month-old son. robinson spent six days in jail after being charged with resisting arrest, interfering with child custody and assaulting an officer. she received the air force's highest honor, the airman's medal, after helping drag soldiers from a burning plane in iraq.
amanda peake glover was a devoted youth ministry teacher and choir singer. she was a fitness lover who co-owned a fitness center and ran the palmetto half marathon on saturday. just a month before her death, she had completed the myrtle beach marathon with her brother hand-in-hand. she is survived by her husband benji and four children.
wood, 39, was pictured hugging sam, 8, and charlie, 6, during the second day of practice at the augusta national golf club, georgia, ahead of his latest attempt at a comeback at the masters 2015. the former world no 1 recently dropped out of the world's top 100 rankings for the first time since september 1996. his children are the legacy of his six year marriage to former swedish model elin nordegren which ended in 2009.
real madrid and atletico madrid drew 0-0 in the first leg of the champions league quarter-final at the vicente calderon on tuesday. the second leg will take place at the bernabeu next week. jan oblak was man of the match in goal for atletico as real keeper iker casillas kept a clean sheet.

andy murray, 27, is marrying long-term girlfriend kim sears in dunblane this weekend. novak djokovic, tim henman and jamie delgado will not be among the guests. the tennis star has said there won't be any celebrity friends at the wedding.
dozhd tv fears clinton's video may fall foul of putin's 'gay propaganda' laws. independent network could have faced a £13,200 fine for promoting homosexuality to under-18s. it features jared milrad and nate johnson, a gay couple planning a wedding. the pair are holding hands in the video, talking about their upcoming nuptials. but russia has recently been putting in place more repressive lgbt rights laws.

richie benaud was farewelled at a small private funeral in sydney, attended by only immediate family members. the cricketing legend's wife daphne benaud organised the private ceremony. prime minister tony abbott offered to hold a state funeral for the 84-year-old former test captain. following the funeral, fellow commentators and cricketers gathered at the australian golf club for a memorial.

the 44-year-old, named by locals as donna christie, slipped and fell from hassans fall lookout at lithgow. she was bushwalking with a male friend and her two children, aged 12 and 13, when she dropped her phone. she is believed to have suffered serious head, spinal and chest injuries. it took two hours for police, paramedics and the lithgow volunteer rescue squad to rescue her.

some 1,500 couples in britain have had babies using the revolutionary embryoscope technology. the technology allows medics and parents to watch back the moment of conception. it was developed in the us and is helping scientists learn more about the ivf process. sally and stephen morley are one of the couples who have used the technology.

not being able to sleep, losing your keys and being stuck in traffic are the most stressful everyday incidents. half of adults in the uk said a sleepless night was the thing that stressed them out the most. running out of phone battery and losing an important document are also common everyday emergencies. 2,005 adults in uk were surveyed by direct line on what makes them stressed.
comedian limmy grins manically as the three-inch house spider crawls out of his mouth and across his chin. the 38-year-old stars in the bbc comedy limmy's show. limmy posted the video to his fans on his twitter account. the spider runs down across his face and along his cheek.
rose devereux, 49, was left in agony and disfigured after years of alleged incompetent treatment by janakan siva. she now faces a bill of £30,000 to get her smile back. general dental council has investigated the work of the dentist at menlove dental practice in liverpool. she has had all her lower teeth removed and needed bone grafts.
liverpool boss brendan rodgers has insisted that raheem sterling will not be sold this summer. the 20-year-old has attracted interest from a number of big clubs. sterling has rejected a contract worth £100,000-a-week at liverpool. manchester united, manchester city, arsenal and bayern munich are all interested in the midfielder.

lebron james posted an emotional farewell letter to lauren hill via twitter on friday, just hours after the teenager passed away from terminal brain cancer. the cleveland cavaliers player, 30, praised the 19-year-old for the 'leadership' and'strength' she showed. lauren was diagnosed with diffuse intrinsic pontine glioma, a rare form of brain cancer, two years ago. she played basketball for mount st. joseph university in ohio and raised more than $1.5million for research into the cancer. doctors told her she would not live past december and she passed away at the hospital in cincinnati.
national bar association is calling for officer clarence habersham, 37, to be fired for falsifying a report. he was the second officer to arrive at the body of walter scott, 50, after michael slager. slager, 33, was charged with murder after shooting father-of-four five times in the back during a traffic stop last week. video contradicts slager's account of the incident and shows him running away from the scene. haberham was the only officer to report that he tried to render aid to the victim and did not report michael's actions leading up to shooting.
robbie williams has ditched the proposal for a two-storey basement extension under the garden and glass studio at the top of his mansion. the pop star angered led zeppelin guitarist jimmy page with earlier plans to expand the 46-room home. he bought the property for £17.5million in 2013 and has submitted fresh plans to extend it. rocker page was upset that building work in his garden would cause disruption to the neighbourhood. the rocker hired a team of experts to help him rebuff the star's original plans.
bricks fell from the top of a building in cleveland on monday afternoon crushing a minivan that was parked below. no one was injured but the building and minivan were unoccupied at the time of the accident. officials are trying to determine what caused the bricks to fall. the building was not under construction and no renovations were being done on the building.

david ospina has won 11 of his 12 games in the premier league since displacing wojciech szczesny as no 1 for arsenal. the colombia goalkeeper has a premier league win ratio of 91.7 per cent. he has the highest of any player to have made at least 10 premier league appearances.    former manchester united defender stefan savic won 10 of his 11 league games and arjen robben has an impressive 82.1 per cent win ratio.
a cold front coming over georgia is likely to bring more stormy weather and strong winds to august national. players endured rainy spells during practice on tuesday ahead of the start of the masters tournament. weather reports have forecast unseasonably high temperatures and thunderstorms for the four days of play. the mercury is expected to reach 90f on the first day of play at the tournament.
the masters 2015 is the first major of the year. rory mcilroy, ian poulter, graeme mcdowell and justin rose will tee off at the augusta national golf club on thursday. the graphic gives you the lowdown on every hole at the masters.
paul downton has left his role as managing director of england and wales cricket board. downton made the call to sack kevin pietersen and reappoint peter moores as england coach. the ecb management board unanimously backed the sacking of downton. he was too accident-prone for the role, according to a board member.
dikembe mutombo was elected to the naismith memorial basketball hall of fame on monday. he was an eight-times nba all-star famous for swatting away shots and wagging his finger at opponents. mutombo played in the nba from 1991 until 2009, recording 11,729 points, 12,359 rebounds, and 3,289 blocks.
rory mcilroy will tee off alongside phil mickelson and ryan moore at augusta national on thursday. the northern irishman is bidding to become the sixth man to win golf's grand slam. tiger woods returns to action for the first time since february . the four-time green jacket winner will play alongside jamie donaldson and jimmy walker.
chelsea beat qpr 1-0 at loftus road in the premier league on sunday afternoon. cesc fabregas scored a late winner in the 88th minute. the win moved jose mourinho's side seven points clear at the top of the table. didier drogba and nemanja matic also scored for the blues.

kerry hamilton, 34, had stomach cramps, bleeding and irregular periods for two years. she was diagnosed with leiomyosarcoma, a rare cancer of the soft tissue normally found in women over 50. doctors finally discovered she had a tumour the size of a golf ball growing in her cervix. at just 34, she was forced to undergo a hysterectomy and was told she would never have children. she now wants to raise awareness about rare cancers and urges other women to visit their gp.

the state of california's department of corrections has set up special units to protect former gang members from the gangs. the sensitive needs housing units are set to protect inmates from gang affiliations. as much as 97 per cent of inmates in level iv maximum-security prisons are gang affiliated. inmates of different races and gang backgrounds are allowed to mix and exercise together in the special units.

gary mabbutt was rushed to hospital after his diabetes caused an artery to be clogged in his leg. the ex-tottenham and england star woke up at 1am to find his leg had gone cold. he needed a five-hour operation to replace the main artery in his left leg with a vein. the 53-year-old was left with a 30inch scar and needed 112 staples to seal the wound. he was diagnosed with type 1 diabetes at 17 and will not be able to play football again.
