paul downton has left his role as managing director of england and wales cricket board. downton was fired by new ecb chief executive tom harrison following england's humiliating world cup performance. michael vaughan and andrew strauss are among those in the running to replace him.
jack nicklaus hit a hole in one on the 130-yard fourth at augusta national during the par-3 contest. the 75-year-old was playing alongside gary player and ben crenshaw. camilo villegas completed the record of five hole-in-ones at masters week.
liverpool beat blackburn rovers 1-0 at ewood park to reach the fa cup semi-finals. philippe coutinho scored the only goal of the game for brendan rodgers' side. liverpool face aston villa at wembley on sunday week. jordan henderson became a new father after his partner gave birth to their second daughter.
liverpool beat blackburn rovers 1-0 in fa cup sixth round replay at ewood park. philippe coutinho scored the winner after 161 minutes. blackburn keeper simon eastwood was denied in stoppage time. ben marshall was unlucky to be denied by simon mignolet in second half.
luis suarez was clearly liverpool's player of the season last season after scoring 31 goals. steven gerrard, daniel sturridge, philippe coutinho and raheem sterling also played well. jordan henderson has excelled since the turn of the year. but liverpool have not been as consistent as they were 12 months ago.
mamadou sakho limped off early on in liverpool's 1-0 fa cup sixth round replay win over blackburn rovers. french defender was limping heavily and clutching his hamstring after a clearance. emre can and martin skrtel are already unavailable for brendan rodgers' side.
hector bellerin scored his second premier league goal for arsenal against liverpool last weekend. the young spaniard has impressed in the absence of mathieu debuchy at right back this season. he beat theo walcott's 40 metre club sprint record last summer. walcott is determined to reclaim his title this summer.
real madrid manager carlo ancelotti plans to appeal the yellow card shown to cristiano ronaldo for diving in the area against rayo vallecano.    he appeared to be unfairly cautioned by referee mario melero lopez after he was chopped down by antonio amaya. the decision means ron ronaldo could be suspended for the game against eibar on saturday.
thiago alcantara scored the winning penalty as bayern munich beat bayer leverkusen in the german cup semi-final. the spaniard challenged for the ball but followed through with a kick into stefan kiessling's chest. manuel neuer saved josip drmic's penalty as the game went to penalties. thiago's penalty went unpunished and bayern went through to the semi finals of the cup.
canal and river trust in bath are carrying out a dredging operation to remove items from the bottom of the river avon in bath. over 150 shopping trolleys have so far been recovered as well as six vehicles, some of which are over 40 years old. the clean-up operation is costing £20,000 and was ordered by the environment agency after objects were identified during a river survey.
kris commons scored a 45th minute penalty to give celtic a 1-0 lead at parkhead. partick thistle's james craigen was sent off for a 'last man' challenge on stuart armstrong. stefan johansen added a second goal in the 63rd minute to keep celic seven points clear at the top of the premiership.
delonte' martistee, 22, and ryan austin calhoun, 23, have been charged with sexual battery in connection with the alleged rape on panama city beach, florida. police in troy, alabama, found a cell phone clip of the alleged attack during another investigation.   the alleged victim told deputies she thought she had been drugged before the incident and was afraid to report it. both men have been suspended from troy university and calhoun has been removed from the team.
nina moric, 38, took to instagram to deny claims that she tried to take her own life over the weekend. italian media claimed she collapsed at home due to 'low blood pressure' and was found by her mother. she posted photographs of heavy bruising on her arms on her instagram account. ms moric told her fans she was recovering at home after being treated in hospital.
tiger was chasing the bird at the hengdaohezi siberian tiger park in northeast china when it slipped on the icy ground. the hilarious moment was captured by photographer libby zhang. the tiger was trying to catch a chicken when it lost its footing and fell over.
manchester city beat leicester city 5-1 on aggregate to reach the youth cup final at the king power stadium. isaac buckley and brandon barker scored late goals to consolidate a 3-0 first leg lead. city will face chelsea in a rematch of their last final seven years ago. leicester's layton ndukwu scored a penalty to cut the deficit but it was not enough.
fabio capello insists john terry should never have been stripped of the england captaincy. terry was accused of racially abusing anton ferdinand in 2011. the chelsea defender was cleared in court of the offence but was banned and fined by the fa. capello claims terry is still england's best defender. the italian claims england would be in a stronger position if they still had terry at their disposal.
strong storms swamped indianapolis, cincinnati and charleston, west virginia, at midday wednesday and forecasters said more severe weather could form as far away as the plains of west texas. some 34 million people in middle america have been warned of possible tornadoes and high winds and large hail. the storm prediction center upgraded to a moderate risk of a significant tornado or two from northern oklahoma to central missouri. 57 million people were at an 'enhanced risk' of seeing storms.
burnell 'bernie' mitchell, 61, arrested on suspicion of conspiracy to murder and terrorism offences. his sister is boney m's lead singer liz mitchell - also known as khalid rashad -  . imam abdul hadi arwani, 48, was found dead in his car in north london on tuesday. a 36-year-old man has been charged with his murder while mitchell is held on suspicion .
jordan morris is the first university student to be picked by usa in two decades. juan agudelo scored his first international goal since march 2011. jurgen klinsmann's side beat mexico 2-0 in texas. morris opened the scoring early in the second half.
robert shannon has been charged with sexual assault against a girl under the age of 16. bob shannon, 59, helped prepare hatton for his comeback fight against vyacheslav senchenko in november 2012. he has also trained hatton's brother, matthew, to a european title and world title shot.
alain robert climbed dubai's 1,007ft cayan tower with nothing more than sticky tape and chalk. the 52-year-old free-climber took an hour and a half to scale the 75-storey tower. robert has previously suffered falls during his attempts to climb buildings across the world.
new book by author martin fletcher has revealed a series of other blazes at businesses owned by or associated with stafford heginbotham. mr justice oliver popplewell led the inquiry into the fire at valley parade ground which killed 56 football fans in 1985. official inquiry concluded that the fire was an accident, probably caused by a fan dropping a cigarette. sir oliver has dismissed claims the blaze was not an accident saying they are 'nonsense'   he also rejected claims his inquiry was held too quickly, three weeks after the disaster.
luke shaw says ashley young is the biggest joker in the manchester united dressing room. he says the players still laugh at the time ashley got bird poo in his mouth during a match against swansea. shaw has made just 17 appearances this season for old trafford. the left back says goalkeeper david de gea is the 'nicest guy in football' and always approachable.
man in his 70s barricaded himself into his home in zaragoza after shooting his daughter's boyfriend and a police officer. after night of failed negotiations, elite police unit stormed the man's home and killed him. he shot at officers who stormed the home and seriously wounded one before being shot dead. his 50-year-old daughter is in a serious condition after being shot twice in the shoulder.
andre ayew is out of contract at marseille in the summer and is a free agent. the ghana international is keen on a move to liverpool. everton, newcastle and swansea are also interested in signing the striker. ayew supported liverpool as a boy and wants to play for the anfield club. the 25-year-old is also being looked at by roma and napoli.
ri sol-ju was pictured clapping next to her husband kim jong-un during a football match on monday. she was wearing what appeared to be a wedding ring on her left hand. the pair were celebrating the 103rd birthday of the country's founding leader kim il-sung. ri was last seen in public in december 2014 at a ceremony to commemorate the death of her father.
jurgen k klopp has announced he is to leave borussia dortmund at the end of the season. the manager has spent seven successful seasons at the westfalenstadion. mats hummels has been linked with a move to manchester united this summer. ciro immobile and neven subotic are other players who could follow klopp out of dortmund.
framed photographs of sir bobby robson's title-chasing side were found in a skip outside st james' park. newcastle united fans are upset by the club's decision to dispose of the images. the club said the images were 'old and not being used anymore'   the pictures were removed from corporate boxes inside the stadium and replaced by more recent images.
greg dyke must find £30million to fund his masterplan to reform grassroots football. fa chairman could axe the england c team to save money to help improve grassroots football . the team has operated under different names since it was formed in 1979. paul fairclough selects non-league players under 23 for the national team.
banyan tree in guangxi province, southern china, stands on a web of roots. the web is so flimsy that the entire tree sways in the wind due to its flimsy structure. originally the roots of the tree grew up against a wall before being moved to a park.
alexandre lacazette is the top scorer in ligue 1 this season with 25 goals. lyon beat bastia 2-0 at the stade de gerland on wednesday. mohamed yattara opened the scoring for olympique lyonnais in the second half.
andrew odell tweeted the company a picture of the rodent crawling around inside the loaf of bread. he said it was the first and last time he was going to shop at aldi. mr odell said his heavily pregnant wife claire was 'extremely upset' about the discovery. aaldi said it had contacted the customer and was investigating the incident.
dagenham and redbridge midfielder joss labadie has been banned for six months for biting stevenage defender ronnie henry. the 24-year-old was charged with violent conduct by the fa after the incident last month. he was banned for 10 matches and fined £2,000 12 months ago for biting torquay's ollie banks.
suma, a 36-year-old orangutan at melbourne zoo, was first diagnosed with the condition in 2013. she was initially given daily medication to help relieve the pain of her arthritis. on thursday, surgeons at the zoo carried out a full health check-up to check how her condition has progressed. x-rays were taken in areas of her body and a steroid injection was given to reduce her pain.
the fa have formed a concussion experts panel to help make the game safer for players. the panel of eight medical professionals will meet for the first time in may. jeff astle died in 2002 after suffering a number of head injuries during his footballing career. head injuries have been under greater scrutiny in recent months.
paul mcgowan avoided a prison sentence after a third assault on a policeman. the dundee midfielder will miss two games against former club celtic because he is under house arrest. the 27-year-old has been placed on a 16-week restriction of liberty order. the bad boy midfielder was handed his third conviction for assaulting a police officer.
b bristol city are runaway leaders in sky bet league one. the robins beat bradford city 6-0 at valley parade on tuesday night to secure promotion to the championship. aden flint has scored 20 goals this season and won the johnstone's paint trophy. steve cotterill's side need to beat coventry city at ashton gate on saturday to be crowned champions.
gerard pique says barcelona's front three have a special relationship. luis suarez, lionel messi and neymar are in france ahead of champions league quarter-final tie against paris saint-germain. pique claims he has never seen a relationship like the one between the trio. barcelona face psg at the parc des princes on wednesday night.
police have released photos of 13 people they are trying to track down as they hunt for the fans who threw bottles at nrl referees during the good friday clash between the bulldogs and rabbitohs. a touch judge suffered a broken shoulder when he slipped at anz stadium in sydney as he tried to dodge bottles being thrown by angry canterbury fans. nsw police have released images of 13 fans they want to speak to in relation to the incident. detective have called on any fans who have photos or video of the incident to come forward to help identify those responsible.
daniel agger has been accused of elbowing fc copenhagen's mattias jorgensen. the incident was not seen by match officials during brondby's goalless draw on monday. the former liverpool defender is to be investigated by the country's fa.
ian drinnan claimed his arthritis caused him almost constant pain and he had to use crutches to get around. 58-year-old was claiming £3,500 in disability benefits but was filmed putting up goalposts at blackpool rangers fc.    he was on his feet for three or four hours at a time and helped to erect spectator barriers and goalposts . drinnans was sentenced to do 80 hours unpaid work for the community and ordered to pay £85 costs and £60 .
lavall hall, 25, was shot dead by police officers in miami gardens, florida, on february 15. he was schizophrenic and had been released from a mental hospital just one week earlier. police department said hall 'attacked' officers with the broom - but video footage shows him running away from officers. footage shows shell cases flying as police officer shouted 'get on the f****** ground or you're dead'   hall's family have filed a wrongful death lawsuit against the city of miami garden and the two police officers.
terry richardson is one of the most famous and controversial photographers in the fashion industry. known for his racy photo shoots and sexual assault allegations. in a new interview with vogue kate upton has revealed that he released footage of her dancing in a bikini without her permission. terry is accused of releasing the video called 'cat daddy'    the 49-year-old photographer has shot everyone from miley cyrus to kim kardashian in his studio.
shaqueel van persie was filmed scoring with a'scorpion kick' in his back garden. the seven-year-old has trained with both manchester united and bt sport. robin van persie snr posted the video on his instagram account. the manchester striker will reportedly be offered £5million to leave old trafford this summer.
lewis hamilton leads the formula one world championship after two races. the british driver says his mercedes contract has not been signed. the reigning world champion says issues with paperwork has been 'a pain in the backside'   it is unlikely the contract will be signed ahead of this weekend's chinese grand prix in shanghai.
tabby produces a range of unusual gurgling noises as she is petted. when her back is rubbed, she lets out a string of gobbledygook sounds. youtube user serpentor filmed his feline friend in action. to date the clip of her singing has been watched more than 17,000 times.
the magnitude 3.1 quake was centered about four miles north of san fernando near interstate 210. it happened just before 9pm last night and caused a'sharp jolt' to be felt in the area. there was no reported damage or injuries. the us geological survey said the quake had a depth of about five miles.
matej vydra scored a stunning volley to put watford in the lead in the 26th minute. adlene guedioura added a second goal shortly after the break to seal the win for the hornets. millwall remain in the championship relegation zone after the 2-0 defeat.
quinn patrick was on a fishing trip with his dad at snow lake, indiana when the pair caught a bowfin. the bowfin propels itself from the ground and slaps the youngster in the face with its tail. the sound of the fish making impact with the youngster’s face is similar to a cartoon sound effect.
the curl-crested jay is native to south america and resides at the criadouro onca pintada breeding centre. it is known to be a good mimic of other birds and man-made sounds. the bird is one of a number of species that have learned to incorporate peculiar sounds into their song.
jimmy anderson took four wickets on day two of the first test at the sir viv richards stadium in antigua. anderson is still three wickets away from breaking sir ian botham's england record. ben stokes was england's first man to be dismissed on the second day. west indies finished the day on 99 for four after losing five wickets for 20 runs. jos buttler was dismissed for a duck and anderson fell for 20.
joao teixeira broke his leg during brighton's goalless draw with huddersfield on tuesday night. the 22-year-old was carried off on a stretcher during the match. portuguese starlet has been ruled out for the rest of the season. chris hughton said it 'is a real blow' to lose the liverpool youngster.
jason denayer is wanted back by manchester city for a pre-season assessment. but ronny deila has confirmed the defender will be missing for champions league qualifiers. the 19-year-old is currently on loan at celtic from manchester.
the ebay listing, posted friday, showed a laminated badge featuring a photo of former new england patriots player aaron hernandez and identifying information. the user claimed he was in jail with the 25-year-old and was trying to auction the card for $500. the listing was deleted on saturday and had zero bids. hern andez is currently in prison during his trial for the the june 2013 shooting death of odin lloyd.
mat mats hummels has been offered a contract extension by borussia dortmund. the germany defender has been linked with a move to manchester united. mats hummels has two years left on his contract at the club. the 26-year-old has admitted he is considering his future at dortmund .
bayern munich beat borussia dortmund 1-0 at the westfalenstadion on saturday. robert lewandowski scored the only goal of the game. jurgen klopp says his side lacked punch and deserved to lose. dortmund captain mats hummels disagrees with his manager and says bayern deserved to win.
a professor in new york invited her 11-year-old autistic son to one of her classes. he drew the world map from memory. the map was highly accurate and included political borders and tiny coastal islands. the boy is the son of one of the professor's students.
borussia dortmund beat hoffenheim 3-2 in extra time to reach the semi-finals of the german cup. ricardo rodriguez scored a second-half penalty to give wolfsburg a 1-0 victory over freiburg. sebastian kehl scored a stunning volley in the 107th minute to give dortmund the win.
john terry played the full 90 minutes as chelsea beat qpr 1-0 in the west london derby at loftus road. terry was jeered at the start of the game, but put in a good display at the back. the defender was rarely troubled by bobby zamora and charlie austin.
chelsea travel to loftus road on sunday for their 700th game under the ownership of roman abramovich. jose mourinho believes chelsea's adherence to financial fair play rules will benefit the english national side. the blues have won three premier leagues, four fa cups and one champions league since 2004.
england women's u19 european championships qualifier against norway will be replayed after refereeing mistake. england were awarded a penalty in the 96th minute of the match at 2-1 down. but referee marija kurtes wrongly awarded an indirect free-kick to norway. leah williamson thought she had equalised for england but team-mate rosella ayane entered the box too early. the match will be restarted at 9:45pm on thursday at seaview stadium in belfast.
strong storms rumbled through the southern plains early on thursday, missing major population centers but offering a preview of bad weather that could hit chicago, detroit and other big cities in the midwest later in the day. the storm system stretches from texas up to the great lakes and down to north carolina and has the potential to be the biggest severe weather event so far this spring. 10 reported tornadoes, grapefruit-sized hail and winds of up to 80 mph were reported across 12 states on wednesday. meteorologists and emergency managers from the high plains to the appalachians are on alert following the year's first widespread bout of severe weather.
a new episode of mockumentary w1a shows bosses holding an emergency meeting after clarkson uses the word 'tosser' on top gear. episode was apparently filmed last july, but narration has recently been tweaked. the bbc has made light of disgraced presenter's attack on a junior producer.
the 32-year-old dictator was inspecting a weapons factory in pyongyang, north korean capital. pictures show him smiling and waving, with his right wrist in a white bandage. it is the latest in a string of presumed health problems for the dictator. south korean official says he must have suffered the injury in the recent past.
manchester united host premier league leaders chelsea at stamford bridge on saturday. louis van gaal's side are all but guaranteed champions league place. gary neville believes manchester united face their toughest test of the season. united have beaten manchester city, liverpool and tottenham in recent weeks.
the first year students at washington university were rowing at creve coeur lake in missouri. asian carp are known for getting easily frightened by boats and leaping from the water. the st. louis freshman men’s crew were captured on video by filmmaker benjamin rosenbaum.
the woman known only as goska, has spent some time volunteering at criadouro onça pintada in brazil. she mixed with a number of exotic animals while at the jaguar breeding project. polish volunteer was captured on video being bottle-fed by one-year-old perseu.
siem de jong played 45 minutes for newcastle under 21s in 2-0 defeat to derby county at st james' park. the 26-year-old suffered a collapsed lung in february. he made way at the break after coming through the first half of united's defeat. newcastle midfielder has made just one premier league start since joining from ajax.
new york state senator jeffrey klein has apologized to republican political strategist susan del percio. tweet showed a link to a google search for 'hot' pictures of her and a series of random characters. klein said that a staffer 'accidentally tweeted a link from her personal phone'    he said that the tweets was sent by a recently hired female communications staffer and was 'taken seriously'
jack colback says newcastle united fans deserve more from the club. john carver's side have lost five games in a row and scored just one goal in eight hours. newcastle lost 2-0 at liverpool on monday in the premier league. the magpies are currently bottom of the league after a fifth straight defeat.
graeme mcdowell carded a final round of 73 on sunday to finish six over par for the masters at augusta national. he is now a combined 24 over for his eight appearances in the year's first major championship. the former us open champion said it would be'sacrilege' not to play the masters.
rory mcilroy caddied for niall horan at the masters at augusta national. irish singer fell while caddying for the world's best golfer in the traditional par-3 contest. horan is set to sing on stage with one direction star at the end of the summer. the pair will reunite on stage in boston on september 12.
yan tai weighed just over seven stone when she began dating you pan in south china's guangdong province. but two years on and the pretty 20-year-old has ballooned to over 14 stone 2lbs. she was almost unrecognizable when he proposed to her with a bouquet of chocolate. you pan, 25, had deliberately fattened up his girlfriend to put off any love rivals. yan, 20, weighed    yan was treated to meals for yan almost every day - and even fed her midnight snacks.
andy lee and peter quillin fought to a draw in brooklyn on saturday night. quillin failed to make the required 160lbs weight for the middleweight bout. lee was knocked down in the first round of the 12-round contest. the judges declared the bout to be a draw but quillin's unbeaten record remains intact. the irishman retains his wbo middleweight title after the judges scored the bout a draw.
jermain defoe was introduced to the crowd at a wwe event in newcastle on thursday. the sunderland striker received a mixed ovation when he was introduced. the 32-year-old striker was booed by some of the crowd. defoe scored the winner in the tyne/wear derby on sunday at the stadium of light.
moussa sissoko was sent off for a reckless challenge on liverpool midfielder lucas leiva during liverpool's 2-0 defeat at anfield. john carver feels it should have been a straight red for the france international. newcastle stand-in skipper is facing disciplinary action after being sent off. carver says newcastle cannot rely on others to preserve their premier league status.
martin montoya scored a trick shot during barcelona's training session at ciutat esportiva. the young defender shot a lofted pass straight into a basketball hoop at the other side of the training ground. barcelona beat almeria 4-0 on wednesday night in la liga. luis suarez and lionel messi scored the best of the goals in the win.
jose mourinho believes he is getting better and better in every aspect of his job. the chelsea boss says his problem is that he is not a hypocrite when he faces the media. the 52-year-old has won league titles in all four countries he has managed. but he regularly finds himself in hot water with the football association.
kevin pietersen posed for the surrey team photo at the kia oval ahead of the start of the new county championship season. paul downton was dismissed as england's managing director on wednesday. the batsman hopes to return to the england set-up after a year out of the international team. surrey begin their campaign at glamorgan on april 19.
the dual carriageway was shut for an hour after she drove a red peugeot towards southend. some cars were forced into the central barrier and one man suffered neck and back injuries. the pensioner was taken to basildon university hospital as a precaution.
jose mourinho believes the ballon d'or should be scrapped. arsene wenger said he was 'totally against' the award last year. real madrid's cristiano ronaldo is the current holder of the trophy. lionel messi has won the award on three occasions.
tiger woods struggled with his short game during the opening round at augusta. the world no 111 struggled to get under par in his first round at the tournament. woods was off the lead at 41st place after the first round. the crowd favourite struggled with a poor chip shot on the third hole. woods finished the day tied for 41st after a round of 71.
arsenal chief negotiator dick law has flown to argentina to finalise a deal for maxi romero. the 16-year-old has been dubbed the next lionel messi. the gunners are in advanced talks with velez sarsfield over a £4.5million deal for the forward. romero's ownership rights have been held up by red-tape over ownership rights.
rory mcilroy was one over par after 11 holes at the masters. the world no 1 recorded birdies on the 13th and 15th to card a one-under-par 71. he is seeking to become just the sixth player in history to win all four major titles at augusta.    the 25-year-old has recorded a score of 77 or worse on five occasions at the tournament.
jose mourinho says sir alex ferguson showed him 'two faces' during their first meeting in champions league in 2004. porto beat manchester united at old trafford. the chelsea boss has no close friends in english football. he claims to have learned respect from ferguson, but has had spats with arsene wenger and pep guardiola.
the masters got underway at augusta national on thursday. rory mcilroy is bidding to complete a career grand slam. tiger woods' girlfriend lindsey vonn joined him during the par three contest.    alexis randock has been dating bikini model rickie fowler since last year. dustin johnson is engaged to pop singer paulina gretzky.
liverpool players brad jones, glen johnson and fabio borini enjoy opening day of grand national meeting at aintree. liverpool beat blackburn in their fa cup semi-final replay on wednesday night. johnson's wife laura was celebrating her birthday the day before at the races.
michael vaughan has emerged as the favourite for the role of director of england cricket. former england captain has already held talks with new ecb chief executive tom harrison. andrew strauss and alec stewart are also in the frame for the job. if confirmed as the new director of cricket he will become the most powerful man in english cricket.
reanne evans beat former world champion ken doherty 10-8 in world championship qualifying match at ponds forge. doherty won the first frame 71-15 but evans fought back to win the game. evans was hoping to become the first women player to play in the world championship. she lost the opening frame to doherty before winning the final frame.
danny welbeck scored the winner as arsenal beat manchester united in the fa cup in march. a 15-year-old boy posted a racist tweet after the game. the boy has been cautioned and warned about his behaviour. the teenager took to social media after welbeck's goal. wiltshere police have arrested and cautioned the boy.
england drew 2-2 with norway in a european u19 women's championships qualifier on saturday. leah williamson scored a penalty in the 96th minute to earn england a draw. marjia kurtes controversially disallowed the spot-kick and awarded a free-kick. uefa ruled the match should be replayed for an 18-second penalty shoot-out . the england captain stepped up again to take the penalty during the rematch in belfast . mo marley's side drew 1-1 and qualified for this summer's finals in israel.
manchester city face manchester united in the manchester derby at old trafford on sunday. manuel pellegrini's team are fourth in the premier league, nine points behind chelsea. sergio aguero insists manchester city can retain the title despite defeat by crystal palace. the champions have won the last four derbies, having beaten city in each of the last five.
andy murray's coach amelie mauresmo is expecting her baby in august. the openly gay 35-year-old broke the news on twitter on thursday night. murray and kim sears will marry at dunblane cathedral on saturday.   murray was appointed as murray’s coach in june 2014 following his split from ivan lendl.  the former world no 1 won wimbledon and the australian open titles in 2006.
world boxing champion kell brook watched the premier league darts in his home town of sheffield. brook received a hero's ovation when he was introduced to the crowd at the motorpoint arena. dave chisnall won both of his games in week 10 to move onto 17 points in second place in the table.
aljaz bedene defeated fellow qualifier arthur de greef 6-2, 6-3 in just 70 minutes at grand prix hassan ii. british no 2 switched allegiance from slovenia to britain last month. bedene will face third seed jiri vesely in the quarter-finals in casablanca.
arsenal are trying to find a cure for alex oxlade-chamberlain’s persistent groin problems. arsene wenger revealed the attacking midfielder has suffered a setback in his bid to return to fitness. the 21-year-old has been struggling with an ongoing groin problem for several months. arsenal are keen to surgery and are exploring other treatment methods.
qpr keeper rob green was embarrassed during the 3-3 draw with aston villa at villa park on monday night. a ball boy decided to embarrass the former england no 1 by rolling the ball through his legs. green conceded three goals as qpr were held to a draw. christian benteke scored a hat-trick for the belgium international.
justin rose and ernie els made the early running with a five-under-par 67 at the 79th masters at augusta. jordan spieth opened with a 64 to take a three-shot lead into the second round.    charley hoffman and   rose and els tied for second after posting scores of 67. rory mcilroy and bubba watson both shot 71 in the first round.
jenson button crashed into the back of pastor maldonado's lotus on lap 49 of the chinese grand prix. the british driver finished 13th but was demoted to 14th after the race. button was penalised five seconds and two penalty points for the incident. fernando alonso moved up two places after the incident .
philippe saint-andre has struggled as france coach winning just 15 of his 37 games in charge. he succeeded marc lievremont following the 2011 world cup in england. the french rugby federation is looking for a replacement after the world cup. rapahael ibanez, fabien galthie and guy noves are among the favourites to take over.
nico rosberg will start second on the grid behind pole-sitter lewis hamilton in china. the german missed out on pole to the world champion by 0.042secs. sebastian vettel of ferrari will start third in shanghai.
richard cockerill believes the aviva premiership title race will go to the wire. leicester tigers are separated by just two points and two places in the play-off race. the tigers face saracens at allianz park on saturday. northampton saints are clear at the top of the table.
jason gillespie has signed a two-year deal with big bash team adelaide strikers. yorkshire coach will combine role with his duties at headingley county cricket club. he will begin his role with the south australian side in december. the 39-year-old led yorkshire to the county championship title last year.
sean maitland has undergone surgery on his injured shoulder. scotland winger is leaving glasgow warriors to play in the aviva premiership with london irish next season. the 26-year-old is facing a race against time to be fit for the rugby world cup. sam warburton has been named to start for cardiff blues against warriors.
jimmy anderson moved to within two wickets of sir ian botham's record of 383 test wickets. but he only took one wicket on day two of the first test in antigua. anderson bowled just four overs in the last session of play. chris jordan took a stunning catch to dismiss west indies vice-captain kraigg brathwaite.
west indies bowlers received a pep talk from bowling coach curtly ambrose on day two. chris jordan and jason holder battled it out with former barbados team-mate justin holder. shiv chanderpaul's test career for the west indies has lasted over 21 years. kevin pietersen suffered an injury scare during surrey's match against oxford mccu.
ben stokes was denied the wicket of jermaine blackwood after overstepping the line. the all-rounder thought he had claimed his 23rd test wicket in antigua. the decision was overturned by the umpire. stokes had overstepped the line when he thought he'd taken blackwood's wicket.
karen sharpe, the mother of north charleston police officer michael slager, defended her son in an interview. ms sharpe said she has not watched the video of the shooting or read any news reports or coverage of the incident. she also expressed sympathy for walter scott's family and said she will never watch the video footage of the fatal shooting. this as slager's wife, who is eight months pregnant, is devastated. slager has been charged with the murder of scott and has been fired from his job.
michael vaughan criticised the footwork and mindset of england's top order for just looking to survive. jonathan trott and alastair cook were both out early on in antigua. geoff boycott was also critical of the openers.
roberto martinez felt seamus coleman should have been awarded a free-kick. everton drew 1-1 with swansea at the liberty stadium on saturday. jonjo shelvey scored from the penalty spot to earn his old club a point. martinez said the defender was fouled by marvin emnes. but the referee michael oliver gave a penalty for handball.
newcastle united announced record profits last month of £18.7m for the 2013/14 season. club's full accounts reveal more than £34m was in the bank at the end of the last financial year. the magpies have lost their last five premier league matches. newcastle fans claim owner mike ashley has little ambition to stay in the top flight.
qpr manager chris ramsey condemned objects being thrown on the pitch at loftus road. chelsea beat queens park rangers 1-0 in the west london derby on sunday afternoon. branislav ivanovic was hit on the head by a lighter thrown by a fan. the football association will wait for referee andre marriner's report before investigating crowd control.
harry panayiotou scored three goals for leicester city in march. the 20-year-old scored a hat-trick on international duty for st kitts and nevis. the striker hopes to make leicester's first team in the premier league and has grown up nearby.
rangers boss stuart mccall wants his side to end their away-day blues at dumbarton on saturday. rangers have only won once in their last five away matches. ibrox boss watched his side draw 1-1 at bottom side livingston in their promotion bid. mccall's side are four points behind play-off rivals hibs.
west brom face leicester city at the hawthorns on 'astle day'   the baggies are commemorating the launch of the jeff astle foundation. astle died of chronic traumatic encephalopathy in 2002 at the age of 59. the leicester fixture was chosen by astle's widow laraine. west brom are wearing a replica of their 1968 fa cup winning kit.
diafra sakho came off after 58 minutes of west ham's 1-1 draw against stoke with a thigh strain. the striker could be out for the rest of the season with the injury. the 25-year-old has scored 12 goals this season for the hammers.
chelsea beat queens park rangers 1-0 at loftus road in the premier league. cesc fabregas scored an 87th minute winner for jose mourinho's side. thibaut courtois was man of the match for chelsea with a string of saves. didier drogba and eden hazard were both quiet for the home side. nedum onuoha and matt phillips impressed at the back for qpr.
shane ferguson finally joined up with the rangers squad this week. the newcastle united loanee has been out for five months with a knee injury. stuart mccall expects ferguson to be fit and ready to play for rangers. ferguson was one of five newcastle players sent north on loan to the ibrox.
rangers board have reassured fans that the club still owns trademarks and the badge. ibrox board launched a probe into claims mike ashley's firm had taken ownership of intellectual property. the club's trademarks are registered with sports direct and will be returned to the club when a £5million loan is repaid.
west bromwich albion host leicester city at the hawthorns (saturday 3pm) craig dawson is set to return after serving a one-match ban. matt upson and dean hammond are available for leicester's trip to west brom. ben foster and callum mcmanaman remain long-term absentees for the rock bottom side.
shane ferguson has been on loan at rangers from newcastle united since january. the winger has been out with a knee injury but is back training with the club. stuart mccall is confident he can play a role in rangers' push for promotion to the spl. the light blues boss says ferguson is 'desperate to play' for the club .
real madrid returned to training on wednesday ahead of return to la liga action on saturday. carlo ancelotti's side drew 0-0 with rivals atletico in the last eight of the champions league on tuesday. pepe and sami khedira were among the players that trained at the valdebebas complex. real madrid face malaga at the bernabeu in the premier league on saturday.
arsenal manager arsene wenger said he hopes burnley escape relegation from the premier league. arsenal beat sean dyche's side 1-0 at turf moor on saturday night. aaron ramsey scored the only goal of the game. dyche has been praised by wenger this season.
thibaut courtois wants to win the premier league title with chelsea this season. the belgian keeper has won the league cup and the capital one cup with the blues. the 22-year-old has spent three seasons on loan at atletico madrid. he won the la liga, the copa del rey and the europa league with atletico.
arsenal should target petr cech if he leaves stamford bridge in the summer, insists carlo cudicini. petr cech has made just five premier league appearances this season. thibaut courtois remains jose mourinho's first-choice goalkeeper at chelsea. cech is poised to leave the club at the end of the season.
barcelona beat paris saint-germain 3-1 in the first leg of the champions league quarter-final at the parc des princes. laurent blanc made no excuses for his side as they were beaten in paris. the psg manager said barcelona were superior to his side 'in virtually every department'    barcelona boss luis enrique was delighted with his side's performance and praised the performance of luis suarez.
today marks the 26th anniversary of the hillsborough disaster. a memorial service will be held at anfield to remember the 96 people who lost their lives. liverpool players have paid their respects to the victims. everton and everton fans marked the anniversary on twitter and instagram.
jermain defoe was the first player to take part in sunderland's keepy up challenge. the striker scored a stunning volley against newcastle in the tyne-wear derby on sunday. defoe sets an impressive score of 76 for his team-mates to beat in the challenge.
wales beat israel 3-0 in a euro 2016 qualifier to climb to world no 22 in april fifa rankings. gareth bale scored twice as real madrid beat the world no 3 side. germany remain top of the list with 153 points. anguilla are the lowest-ranked international side in the world at no 209.
luke shaw joined manchester united from southampton for £31.5million last summer. the 19-year-old has only made 17 appearances in all competitions for the red devils. luke shaw admits he has endured a 'frustrating' debut season at united. the defender has missed the last five premier league games with injuries. shaw doesn't know what he would do if he scored against boyhood club chelsea on saturday.
charterlie adam scored one of the best goals of his career at chelsea in the premier league. adam lobbed thibaut courtois to equalise for stoke at 1-1 at stamford bridge. but stoke lost 2-1 as loic remy scored a second-half winner. adam admitted he had mixed emotions after scoring the goal but losing the game.
charlie adam scored an incredible 66-yard goal against chelsea on easter weekend. the stoke midfielder scored a similar effort for blackpool reserves against accrington stanley in 2009. adam scored the goal from the halfway line against the opposition. adam has scored a goal from his own net before.
charlie adam scored a goal from inside his own half against chelsea at stamford bridge on saturday. the stoke man struck from behind halfway in the premier league. david beckham, jone samuelsen and moritz stoppelkamp are other players to have scored from behind half.
charlie adam scored a wonder-goal from inside his own half for stoke against chelsea at stamford bridge on saturday. it is the premier league's goal of the season. david beckham scored a similar goal against wimbledon in 1996. jose mourinho had to admit that adam's goal was better than beckham's. adam scored the goal from a direct shot from outside the box against thibaut courtois.
jose mourinho insists he will stick by cesc fabregas, nemanja matic and oscar. the midfield trio have been struggling in recent weeks. oscar was substituted at half time against stoke but manager insists he is not struggling. chelsea beat stoke 2-1 at home on saturday.
west ham united host stoke city at upton park (saturday, 3pm) enner valencia will be available for west ham after recovering from a toe injury. marc wilson is available for stoke despite a broken hand and is set to play with the potters. west ham are winless in three premier league games against stoke, drawing two and losing one.
lakenya hall, 35, of kenner, lousiana was arrested after driving six children to a fight where one was shot. a 14-year-old was shot in the upper thigh. hall's two sons, ages 15 and 11, were arrested on charges of disturbing the peace by fighting.
manchester united host manchester city in the manchester derby at old trafford on sunday. robin van persie has missed manchester united's last six games with an ankle injury. louis van gaal's side have won all five of their premier league games in his absence. the 31-year-old striker has declared himself fit for the derby after missing the last six. van persie has scored 10 goals in 24 league appearances and 1,993 minutes for united this season.
mamadou sakho will miss liverpool's visit of newcastle with a hamstring injury. newcastle defender daryl janmaat should be fit to face liverpool at anfield on monday night. daniel sturridge will be fit after complaining of muscle tightness. emre can will return from suspension for newcastle after serving three-match ban.
luis suarez has revealed that he once sneaked into the nou camp for a photo with his wife sofia. real madrid were'very' interested in signing him but he only wanted to play for barcelona. the striker opened up about the infamous bite on giorgio chiellini during the world cup.
mario balotelli missed liverpool's fa cup quarter-final win over blackburn rovers due to illness. robbie savage branded the liverpool striker 'pathetic' for missing the game. the italian striker was not included in the squad to face arsenal or blackburn. brendan rodgers revealed balotlli withdrew himself from the squad on saturday.    the striker posted a photo of himself with a temperature of 38.7c on instagram, which is above the normal body temperature of 37c.
mario balotelli has no future at liverpool after manager brendan rodgers lost patience with the striker. rodgers will admit he ignored the warning signs but had hoped he was maturing as he got older. the italian striker shared an image of a thermometer reading to prove he was too ill to play against blackburn on wednesday night.   rodgers is saddened by the fact    he appears to have no respect for liverpool and has scored just once in the premier league.
liverpool beat blackburn 1-0 in the fa cup quarter-final replay at ewood park. lucas leiva missed three trips to wembley in 2012 due to a knee injury. the midfielder can play his first game at the national stadium in the semi-final. liverpool face aston villa in the last-four of the competition on april 19. simon mignolet praised the liverpool supporters after the win at blackburn.
derry mathews was due to face richar abril on april 18 in liverpool for the lightweight world title. abril previously withdrew ahead of the original date of march 6. mathews may still fight for the title in his home city if the wba strip abril of his belt.
leo messi opened the scoring for barcelona at the nou camp in the 33rd minute with a curling effort. luis suarez doubled the barcelona lead after 55 minutes with a left-footed strike. defender marc bartra added a third with a headed goal before half-time. barcelona remain seven points clear at the top of la liga after a comfortable 4-0 victory over almeria.
dani alves is out of contract at the end of the season with barcelona. the defender has been linked with a move to manchester united. but barcelona want alves to stay at the nou camp and are offering him a two-year deal. alves' contract runs out on june 30 and he has been offered a three-year contract.
amir khan believes kell brook is just calling out for the 'one big payday'    khan has denied that he will face chris algieri next month, claiming there are'some more options' on the table. khan wants to fight brook within the next 12 months but claims he is not even a big name in the uk.
john carver admits newcastle united need to look at the 'dna' of their dressing-room this summer. newcastle lost 1-0 to sunderland at the stadium of light on sunday. head coach carver was 'embarrassed' by the performance. united travel to liverpool on monday.
sevilla coach unai emery has guided the club to fifth in the la liga table this season. barcelona travel to sevilla on saturday as leaders barcelona are in champions league action. emery is one of the most animated coaches in la l liga and is known for his touchline antics. the andalusian club are currently fifth in   the table ahead of the visit of barcelona.
fergal o'brien says alvarado is in better shape going into this weekend's grand national at aintree. the 10-year-old gelding has run only once this season, back in february at doncaster. last year's fourth at the grand national has run in only one race this season.
rory mcilroy has won all of his four majors after heavy rain at augusta national. the world no 1's huge hitting will play into his hands on a wet course. tiger woods has the skill set to win the masters for a fourth time. bubba watson and adam scott are two of the best big hitters at the masters.
liverpool and newcastle players took part in a minute silence before premier league game at anfield in memory of the 96 fans who died at hillsborough. former newcastle captain bobby moncur laid flowers at the hillsborough memorial before the game. 96 liverpool fans were crushed to death in hillsborough disaster on 15 april 1989.
porto face bayern munich in the champions league quarter-final first leg on wednesday night. porto are the only undefeated side in the tournament. julen lopetegui says porto come into the match able to enjoy their achievement of being undefeated. the porto boss says the team 'hasn't stopped growing'   pep guardiola labels his former barcelona team-mate lopettegui as 'a winner'
cindy crawford, yasmin le bon and christie brinkley were huge supermodel stars in 80s and 90s. now their daughters are making their own names in the fashion world.    the likes of georgia jagger and amber le bon have walked for designers like tommy hilfiger and chanel.
marc-andre ter stegen is yet to make his la liga debut for barcelona in the champions league. the 22-year-old is eager to impress manager luis enrique in the league. barcelona face paris saint germain in the quarter-final of the champions league.
one direction singer niall horan caddied for rory mcilroy in the traditional par-3 contest at augusta national. horan slipped while carrying mcilory's clubs on the par-three course. tiger woods also played in the masters par- 3 contest for the first time in 11 years. american kevin streelman won the masters after a play-off against camilo villegas.
eden hazard, thibaut courtois, kurt zouma and izzy brown celebrated the thai new year with a game of kick-ups. the blues quartet were joined by club mascot stamford the lion at their cobham training base. the quartet celebrated the songkran festival with the traditional activity of throwing water at each other.
riangers will play hearts at tynecastle in their final game of the championship season on may 3. the spfl moved the game back 24 hours to accommodate broadcasters. hibs and hearts have lodged formal complaints with the league over the decision. hibernian are also upset that rangers' final game has been pushed back.
rory mcilroy will caddie for niall horan at the masters on wednesday. the irishman is preparing for his first attempt to complete a career grand slam at augusta. niall will carry the bag for the world no 1 at the par-three masters tournament. mcil troy has a poor record on the par fives at the tournament.
gareth bale appears to have picked up a foot injury during real madrid's training session on tuesday. carlo ancelotti's side face rayo vallecano at the estadio de vallecas on wednesday. bale could miss out on real's game after injuring his left foot in training. the winger scored real's first goal in their 9-1 win over granada on sunday.
tiger woods is playing his 20th appearance at the masters at augusta this week. the former best player in the world arrives at the tournament ranked 111th in the game. woods has insisted he is in it to win the masters. the 39-year-old was all smiles as he played a practice round ahead of the tournament.
ben flower was the first player to be sent off in a super league grand final in october. he was banned for six months for twice punching st helens' lance hohaia. wigan coach shaun wane says he wants flower to be 'a bit more aggressive'   flower will return for wigan against warrington in the super league derby on thursday.
brazilian football clubs have been put on alert after dengue fever outbreak. three players were diagnosed with the mosquito-borne disease this week. players have been forced to use insect repellent during practice sessions. corinthians striker paolo guerrero is one of three players that have been diagnosed.
paris saint-germain face barcelona in the champions league quarter-final first leg on wednesday. the ligue 1 outfit will be without the suspended zlatan ibrahimovic and marco verratti. brazilian right back dani alves is suspended for the clash at the camp nou.
kylie leuluai faces another six weeks out of action for leeds rhinos after being told he needs shoulder surgery. the 37-year-old new zealander has not played since a month ago. leeds coach brian mcdermott feared the prop could be out for three months.
manchester united will offer robin van persie £5million to quit the club this summer. the 31-year-old striker has 14 months left on his £250,000-a-week contract at old trafford. manchester united have been linked with edinson cavani and memphis depay. radamel falcao and javier hernandez are also expected to leave the club in the summer.
world's first i'm a celebrity themed maze opened at thorpe park resort in chertsey, surrey on 27 march. new bush tucker trials maze is open to the public after six months of planning. the new attraction is inspired by the hit itv show. angela griffin and tamzin outhwaite have visited the new maze.
liverpool beat newcastle 2-0 at anfield to move within four points of the top four. raheem sterling and joe allen scored the goals for brendan rodgers' side. john carver's magpies have lost five games in a row. moussa sissoko was sent off for a second yellow card offence.
gianluigi buffon says it would be a waste to retire because he is still playing well. the italy goalkeeper says he will continue to play as long as he is in top form. juventus beat monaco 1-0 in the champions league quarter-final on tuesday night.
andy murray is set to marry fiancee kim sears in dunblane next saturday. world no 3 murray will marry his fiancee in his hometown of scotland. there are believed to be well over 100 people attending the wedding. murray arrived back in britain on monday after losing in the miami open final to novak djokovic.
ben flower said that he regrets every day his attack on lance hohaia in the super league grand final. flower was handed a six-month ban for the attack at old trafford in october. the wigan warriors forward is preparing to return to rugby league. flower said he is mentally scarred by the incident.
youtuber micahmedia has uploaded a video demonstrating how to peel a hardboiled egg using a glass of water. the video currently has over 16million views on youtube. the egg is placed in a glass before being filled quarter of the way with tap water. it is then vigorously shaken from left to right to loosen the shell of the egg.
ronald koeman's southampton side are currently seventh in the premier league on 53 points. southampton have scored just seven goals in their last 10 league games. koeman wants his team to rediscover their scoring form to make europa league. the saints face hull city at home on saturday and koeman could recall graziano pelle.
cristiano ronaldo showed off his skills ahead of real madrid's champions league quarter-final clash with atletico madrid. real face city rivals atletico on tuesday in a repeat of last year's final. real are seven points clear of their rivals in the la liga table and cut the gap to two points. gareth bale was back in training ahead of the clash after returning from injury.
newcastle fans are threatening to boycott the next home game against spurs in protest at mike ashley's running of the club. john carver says he would walk away from newcastle united if the club's hierarchy had not given him assurances of serious investment. newcastle lost 1-0 to rivals sunderland at the stadium of light on sunday.
eden hazard will make his 100th premier league appearance for chelsea at qpr on sunday. eden hazard has developed into one of the best players in the premier league. the winger has scored 17 goals for jose mourinho's team this season. hazard joined chelsea from lille for £32million in 2012.
cistiano ronaldo has scored 300 goals for real madrid in just six years with the la liga giants. the portuguese forward is seven goals shy of raul's club record for the club.   he is only seven goals behind raul and alfredo di stefano in the all-time goalscoring charts. lionel messi and dixie dean are among the top 10 one-club scorers of all time.
alan pardew was the first newcastle boss to suffer four successive defeats to sunderland. crystal palace boss pardew thinks fans should concentrate on his in-form side. pardew's side are 11th in the premier league after beating manchester city on monday.
mark selby, john higgins and ding junhui all moved into the last 16 of the china open. shaun murphy came from behind to beat anthony mcgill 5-4 at peking university. judd trump beat peter ebdon 5-1 in the second round.
mike tindall's horse monbeg dude was a fast-finishing third in the grand national at aintree. former england rugby star bought the horse for £12,000 at auction after a boozy dinner. he tweeted 'holy s***, i’m lost for words and emotions' after the 40-1 outsider's performance. zara phillips was there with him and called him an idiot after he bought horse. she coached the horse to seventh place in last year's grand national.
stoke city manager mark hughes is planning to extend the pitch at the britannia stadium for next season. the potters' current pitch is the joint smallest in the premier league at 100m x 66m. hughes wants to make the pitch bigger to suit his side's passing style of play. premier league wish to standardise pitch sizes at 105m x 68m.
manchester united face manchester city at old trafford in the premier league on sunday afternoon. louis van gaal's side trained in the sunshine on friday ahead of the derby. robin van persie could return to the squad after being declared fit to play. captain wayne rooney was the last player to score a winner for manchester united against city at home in 2011.
jose mourinho has won 21 major trophies during his 15-year career as a manager. real madrid boss has won premier league, serie a and la liga titles. sportsmail picks his best ever xi. john terry, didier drogba and frank lampard also make the list.
benaud died peacefully in his sleep surrounded by his wife daphne and family at a sydney hospice. he had been receiving radiation treatment for skin cancer since november. a veteran of 63 test matches, benaud played a key role in the formation of world series cricket in the 1970s. pm tony abbott has offered his family a state funeral.
adi viveash's chelsea u19s side beat roma 4-0 in the uefa youth league semi-final at the stadio olimpico. dominic solanke scored a brace, with tammy abraham also on target for the home side. chelsea will now face shakhtar donetsk's u19 team in the final of the competition.
rita, 24, has channeled passion for fashion into new adidas range. collection is inspired by her love of travel and travel. also recently unveiled beauty range for rimmel. is only 24 and is one of the world's most successful stars.    she says her style has evolved as a result of her transatlantic career.
chris smalling joined twitter just days before manchester united face manchester city at old trafford. the defender posted a photo of himself and his girlfriend sam cooke on the social networking site. his team-mate adnan januzaj has also joined twitter. united take on rivals manchester in the champions league on saturday.    united are currently top of the table, four points clear of arsenal.
lauren hill was diagnosed with diffuse intrinsic pontine glioma, a rare form of brain cancer, shortly after her 18th birthday. doctors told her she had less than two years to live and she was told she wouldn't live past december. she played four games for mount st. joseph university in cincinnati and raised more than $1.5 million for research into the cancer. as her condition worsened, she became an honorary coach and moved to cincinnati children's hospital, where she died on friday morning.
jonathan trott is set to make his 50th test appearance for england against the west indies on monday. trott thought his england career was over after he reached 'breaking point' in brisbane. the batsman was forced to quit the last ashes tour after being dismissed by mitchell johnson.
ross mccormack opened the scoring for fulham after just four minutes against wigan at craven cottage. jermaine pennant equalised for wigan with a stunning free-kick in the 22nd minute. matt smith scored fulham's second goal in the 35th minute to restore the home side's lead. sean pearce scored a late equaliser to earn gary caldwell's side a point in the championship match.
arsene wenger has challenged his squad to focus on winning at burnley on saturday. the gunners travel to turf moor in search of an eighth straight premier league victory. chelsea currently hold a seven-point lead at the top of the table. jack wilshere, abou diaby and mikel arteta are in line to return from injury.
video from the philadelphia office of transportation shows characters in'safety suits' talking to residents about the dangers of phone use. 37 people died from being hit by cars in the city last year. campaign is aimed at 18 to 25-year-olds who are most likely to be on their phones. some have criticized the campaign for focusing too much on pedestrians and blaming them for getting hit.
vincent kompany is an injury doubt for manchester city's clash against manchester united on sunday. manuel pellegrini's side have slipped into fourth place in the premier league. city captain and central defender will be assessed on saturday. city boss insists he does not fear for his job, despite his team's poor form. city lost 2-1 to crystal palace on monday and are without stevan jovetic and wilfried bony.
harry redknapp quit as qpr manager in february. the 68-year-old blamed knee problems for his decision to leave the club. but he has described the club as 'like a bit of a soap opera' after quitting. he believes 'people with their own agendas' had a hand in his resignation. the former west ham boss left the club second from bottom of the league.
queens park rangers manager chris ramsey will have no problem shaking john terry's hand. terry was banned for four games and fined £220,000 for racist comments directed at anton ferdinand in october 2011. rio ferdinand, brother of anton, will not be fit for sunday's match against chelsea.
gareth bale will be rested for real madrid's game at home to eibar on saturday. carlo ancelotti is to give young players jese and asier illarramendi a game. cristiano ronaldo will play and is the la liga's top scorer this season. toni kroos and james rodriguez are suspended for the game at the bernabeu.
arsenal players have revealed their ultimate pre-game playlist ahead of premier league clash with burnley. the gunners face burnley at turf moor on saturday evening. olivier giroud selected coldplay's 'every teardrop is a waterfall' as his track. nacho monreal, santi cazorla and laurent koscielny all opt for dance music.
chelsea captain john terry revealed his pfa team of the year on instagram. john named philippe coutinho as player of the season and harry kane as young player. kane has scored 19 league goals for tottenham this season. west brom midfielder youssouf mulumbu was mistakenly named best player by terry.
diego costa injured his hamstring in chelsea's 2-1 win over stoke city on saturday. jose mourinho hopes to have striker back for final four games of the season. the 26-year-old limped off after just 11 minutes with the injury. costa aggravated the hamstring against stoke and will miss four weeks.
chelsea have been top of the premier league table for 230 days of a single season. jose mourinho's side are on course to become the most dominant title-winners in premier league history. manchester united led the table for 262 days during the 1993/94 season. but chelsea can beat that record by 12 days if they stay top for the rest of the season.
niki lauda aimed a first verbal grenade at his driver nico rosberg ahead of the race in shanghai. lauda is chairman of mercedes f1 and has criticised his driver's performance in the first two races of the season. the german finished behind team-mate lewis hamilton in practice for the chinese grand prix.
gary neville believes manchester city would struggle to attract top players thanks to financial fair play regulations. the former manchester united defender believes a star player would always choose a premier league rival. manuel pellegrini's side are currently fourth in the premier league table.    but manchester have been reined in by uefa's ffp regulations and need to be bold and take on rivals.
ilkay gundogan expects to complete a £15million move to manchester united at the end of the season. mats hummels is also expected to sign for old trafford this summer. louis van gaal is looking to strengthen manchester's defence with a double signing. dortmund boss    the germany centre-back has indicated he's ready to join united.
lee westwood's shot of the day at the masters. tiger woods has his name inscribed on his putter. gary player is fit as a flea. the masters is one of the few sporting events which offers food at reasonable prices. sergio garcia's second round of 74 was a disappointment.
eden hazard has been in superb form for chelsea this season. jose mourinho insists eden hazard should win player of the season award. hazard is up against competition from harry kane and cesc fabregas. diego costa is set to be out for four weeks after aggravating a hamstring injury.
byron meth opened with a 74 on his masters debut at augusta on friday. padraig harrington returned to the course after a year's absence. jack nicklaus ice cream is now available for dessert at the club. the stats from the second day of play at the masters showed par fours were the best holes of the day.
justin rose bogeyed three of the first four holes of his opening round at augusta. the 2013 us open champion drew a pencil line on his scorecard after a disastrous start. rose now sits joint third, seven shots behind runaway leader jordan spieth.
kevin pietersen made 170 runs off 149 balls for surrey against oxford mccu at the parks on sunday. former england captains alec stewart and nasser hussain believe he could make it difficult for the england selectors. the 34-year-old made his return to county cricket 14 months after his sacking.
arsene wenger has slammed post season tours as a 'nightmare'    manchester united boss louis van gaal has successfully lobbied for a shorter tour of the us. tottenham will travel to australia and malaysia at the end of the premier league season.
michael jacobs opened the scoring for blackpool in the ninth minute. eidur gudjohnsen equalised for bolton wanderers in the final minute of stoppage time. it was blackpool's first away victory in 343 days for the bottom-of-the-table seasiders.
oxford women beat cambridge by six and a half lengths in the first women's boat race on the river thames. it was the first time in 88 years the women's race was held on the same course as the men's. the men won the 161st men's race by the same margin, also sharing the same winning margin.
richie benaud led his country in 28 of his 63 tests and never lost a series as captain.    benaud’s masterful analysis was universally revered as a player and commentator. he is meticulous in all things and is still as fit as a flea at 74.
alec stewart admitted he has had no contact with the ecb over the newly-created role of england cricket director. the surrey director of cricket is yet to speak to anyone at the england and wales cricket board about the position. stewart is in the frame to replace paul downton as managing director. andrew strauss and michael vaughan have also been linked to the job.
eden hazard and santi cazorla are both set to make their 100th premier league appearance this weekend. both players have been hugely influential for chelsea and arsenal this season. sportsmail's reporters choose the player they most enjoy watching in action. eden hazard is the man of the match at chelssea, while santi cazorla is arsenal's best player.
nico rosberg will start sunday's race behind team-mate lewis hamilton after missing out on pole by just 0.042secs. the german accused his mercedes team of putting him 'under pressure' during qualifying for the chinese grand prix. he will start behind hamilton at the front of the grid in shanghai.
alleged victim was gang raped on panama city beach, florida, during spring break last month. hundreds of people walked past but did not stop the attack. footage was found on a cell phone during an investigation into a shooting in troy, alabama. delone' martistee, 22, and ryan austin calhoun, 23, have been arrested in connection with the alleged rape.
arsenal beat burnley 1-0 at turf moor in the premier league. aaron ramsey opened the scoring for arsene wenger's side in the first half. the gunners moved further clear of chelsea in second place. ben mee made a superb block to deny ramsey a second goal.

arsene wenger's side have won seven straight games in the premier league this season. victory against burnley on saturday will ensure arsenal claim the longest winning streak in the top-flight. the gunners take on the clarets at turf moor. manchester city have a chance to surpass manchester's seven-game winning streak this season . the gunners hold the record for the most consecutive wins - winning 14 in a row to clinch the title in 2002.

charles manuel, a chiropractor in southern iowa, has surrendered his license to practice. he admitted to accepting sex as payment for his services and performing exorcisms on some patients. manuel signed an agreement admitting his misdeeds to the iowa board of chiropractic and pledging not to apply for reinstatement for at least 10 years. he listed his practice's addresses on a residential street.

deutsche bank survey shows australia to be the most expensive country in the world for the fourth year in a row. a luxurious hotel room in sydney costs $1126 per night, $640 more than in new york. australian prices are at 112 per cent of the us, meaning that we pay $1.12 to every $us1. sydney has the mostexpensive five star hotel rooms in the world. the united states remains the world's cheapest developed country.

jordan spieth has hailed the'most incredible week' of his life after winning the masters at augusta. the 21-year-old led from start to finish for the first time in 39 years. spieth is the second youngest masters winner of all time and the first start-to-finish winner of the tournament.   spieth held his nerve in sunday's final round and finished four shots clear of the field.
jordan spieth became the second youngest masters winner after tiger woods in 1997. the 21-year-old finished 18 under to beat justin rose and phil mickelson by four shots. rory mcilroy finished fourth after a final round 66 at the masters.

greg dyke admits football association's response to jeff astle's death was 'woefully inadequate'   fa and pfa promised a 10-year study to investigate the connection between head injuries and early on-set dementia. but research was never carried out. west brom paid tribute to the former baggies striker on 'astle day' at the hawthorns.
daniel wass is available for around £3.5million and has been watched by chelsea, liverpool and newcastle. mark hughes has opened talks with evian over a summer move for the full back. the 25-year-old can play at right back, left back or either wing for stoke.
the scottish professional football league moved rangers' final-day clash with hearts back to saturday, may 2. the league had originally moved the match to may 3 after hibs finished second in the championship. but sky sports decided to screen the match live and moved the kick-off to tynecastle. but the league has now decided to move the match back to its original date. all other championship fixtures will now be moved to 12.15pm on saturday.
celtic face closest rivals aberdeen at pittodrie on sunday, may 10. the parkhead side could win the scottish premiership title if they win all their remaining games. celtic face kilmarnock at parkhead on wednesday night. aberdeen play st johnstone in their final game of the season. celtic will not play a saturday league tie this season.

barcelona have reached the landmark in 202 champions league matches since 1992. luis suarez's two goals against psg took barcelona past 400 champions league goals. real madrid still have the record with 436 goals scored in the competition. barcelona have found the net most against ac milan (22) and manchester united.

four-time olympic champion bradley wiggins will attempt to break cycling's hour record on june 7. the briton will race in front of a sell-out crowd at london's olympics velodrome.    the current hour record is 52.491km, set by australian rohan dennis in february.

arsene wenger's side record eighth win in a row at turf moor. aaron ramsey scored the opening goal of the game in the 12th minute. the welsh midfielder fired arsenal into a 1-0 lead after 12 minutes at the home of burnley. the win is the best run for arsene's side since the invincibles in 2004.
jordan spieth leads charley hoffman by five strokes at the halfway stage of the masters. spieth carded a 66 to finish 36 holes at a 14-under 130, matching the lowest 36-hole score in masters history. the 21-year-old leads the field by five shots after the first two days of the tournament.   spieth has the lowest two-round score at augusta and the largest halfway lead in masters' history.
dustin johnson became the first man ever to have three eagles in one round at the masters. jordan spieth was the youngest first-round leader in masters history after a 66 on friday. johnson set a new 36-hole record total of 14 under par at augusta national. tiger woods shot a commendable 69, his first score in the sixties in 15 rounds in majors.
