manchester united travel to chelsea for premier league clash at stamford bridge on saturday. louis van gaal faces selection dilemmas after michael carrick and daley blind are ruled out. captain wayne rooney may have to play in holding midfield role against the blues. radamel falcao or robin van persie could start up front for manchester united. phil jones and marcos rojo also missing from the squad due to injury.
philippe coutinho moved from vasco de gama to inter milan for £8.5million in 2013. the brazilian playmaker made his debut at 18, but was underused at the san siro. piero ausilio says the club lost patience and sold coutinho to liverpool. coutinho has been nominated for the pfa player of the season award this term.
luke shaw was substituted at half time against arsenal in the fa cup. louis van gaal told shaw he was not fit enough to play for manchester united. shaw has not played since and was withdrawn from the england squad as he struggles at united. the £28million defender is struggling to come to terms with his new life and has turned to united's psychologist of late.
john carver has won just two games in 14 games since replacing alan pardew as newcastle manager. newcastle have lost their last five premier league games under carver. carver says he's enjoying his role at st james' park and believes he's getting the best out of players.
chris zebroski admitted four charges of robbery, attempted robbery and assault. the 28-year-old was jailed for four years and four months at swindon crown court. newport county striker played for the league two side as recently as tuesday. the striker has been sacked by the club.
aaron ramsey admits the banter with the english team-mates at arsenal is already flying. chris coleman's side are currently unbeaten in euro 2016 qualifying. wales climbed to 22 in the april world rankings, eight places above england. ramsey says he has told his team-mate to beware of wales overtaking them in the fifa rankings.
ash handley scored a hat-trick of tries as leeds beat reigning champions st helens 41-16. the rhinos are six points clear at the top of super league after the win. leeds have now played every other team in the league. saints have now lost four of their last five matches.
mesut ozil says he is playing his best football since joining arsenal in the summer of 2013. ozil was off the pace at the start of this season, but is now back to his best. the german star was injured for three months, but says it 'worked in his favour'   ozil said 10 years of playing football had taken their toll, but he has come to terms with the premier league.
ramiul sheikh, 50, was violently knocked to the ground after desperately trying to outrun the animal. herd of elephants invaded the village in murshidabad district of india, destroying crops and houses. locals were trying to coax the animals back into the forest when one turned violent. the elephant charged at mr ramiul twice after villagers tried to encourage the herd to move on.
the pilot was trying to land the twin-engine plane at fort lauderdale executive airport in south florida. the pilot declared an emergency before the plane crashed in a wooded area close to the runway. the cause of the crash is not yet known. four people died in the tragic incident on sunday.
rademenes is the resident feline nurse at an animal shelter in bydgoszcz, northern poland. the green-eyed cat was brought into the shelter after getting an inflamed respiratory tract infection. he was left at the shelter because his owner thought he was too unwell to be saved. rademenes first fell sick as a two-month-old kitten and is now nursing other abandoned cats and dogs back to health.
the recorded cell phone conversation shows ex-trainer john hargrove using the n-word seven times while talking on the phone with a female friend. he was a trainer at seaworld for 14 years and spoke out against the company in the highly critical documentary blackfish. he says seaworld is mounting a smear campaign against him in an attempt to distract from his message.
author martin fletcher claims the valley parade fire was not an accident and was caused by a cigarette.    he has spent 15 years researching the disaster and claims former chairman stafford heginbotham was linked to eight other fires. west yorkshire police say they will review any fresh evidence surrounding the tragedy. the fire at bradford city's valley parade claimed 56 victims and injured 265 on may 11, 1985. it was the worst stadium fire in the history of british football and prompted safety changes.
the fire began around 11:30 a.m. sunday on tupper street in downtown buffalo. a buffalo fire department official has said the second of three explosions sent one of the manhole covers 200 to 300 feet into the air. police evacuated two buildings as smoke came out of manholes. a television news photographer was interviewing a man on the street when the second blast occurred. the cover landed near a firefighter and a utility truck. there were no injuries.
video maker and artist used four plastic cups and a marker pen to create the video. he claims to have been influenced by japanese comics. the video maker rotates through the various hairstyles and outfits drawn on the cups. there are a total of 294 possible combinations that can be made from rotating the cups .
the jury that sentenced former new england patriots star aaron hernandez to life in prison for murdering odin lloyd sat down for a group interview on thursday. the seven women and five men who voted to convict her of murder sat down with cnn to talk about the decision. most of the jurors said they knew who hernanderez was before the trial, but maintained that his notoriety didn't have an impact on their decision.    the group deliberated for 35 hours over the course of a week, and decided on wednesday that the 25-year-old was guilty of murder.
brian the lar gibbon, who is 50-years-old, was captured by a visitor to lake district wildlife park. the video has been compared to running across the landing naked when you forget your towel. video was shared over 130,000 times and viewed nine million times.
gemma the pit bull was filmed at home in california being fed some treats. but in a bid to trick her, her owner throws a broccoli spear into the mix. immediately the canine pulls a look of disgust as she chomps on the vegetable. she then proceeds to spit it out on the floor.
former melbourne woman dullel kassab fled to raqqa in syria with her children last year. the children's paternal grandparents say they are worried she is 'brainwashing' the children. her four-year-old daughter and son sleep with toy guns next to their beds and watch videos of'muslims killing bad ppl'    she regularly posts pictures to twitter of airstrikes hitting blocks away from their apartment in the islamic state capital.
the bronze sculpture of yu the great's wife has been worn down and discolored by tourists. officials in wuhan, central china, say tourists have been fondling the statue for ten years. statue is to honour yu, who founded china's first dynasty in 2070 bc. tourists have kept touching yu's hand, fox's back, and wife's exposed breast.
kristina patrick from alaska filmed her german shepherd pakak performing a very skillful trick. video footage shows the pup lying on her back with a tennis ball neatly clutched between her front paws. she then lifts it into the air being careful not to drop it.
thomas piermayr has been training with blackpool this week. the defender is a free agent and had been playing for colorado rapids. the 25-year-old is in talks to sign for the championship club.    the former austria u21 international had a spell with inverness caledonian thistle.
jessica ennis-hill won heptathlon gold at the london 2012 olympics. she has not competed since 2013 as she took time off to become a mother. the 29-year-old will return to competition at the sainsbury's anniversary games this july.
aaron ramsey has scored 25 goals for arsenal since the start of last season. the welsh midfielder dedicated his goal against burnley to his late gran who passed away. ramsey scored an extra-time winner in the fa cup final against hull city. the gunners face reading in the bbc fa cup semi-final at wembley today.
the dog named stains had its coat trimmed to resemble a lion's when its owners sent it to the groomers. the dog is a sheep-herding breed and its owner said it was uncomfortable with its thick coat. the owner filmed himself laughing hysterically as he filmed the dog's new look.
manchester city are keen to sign anderlecht teenager evangelos patoulidis. the 14-year-old playmaker is regarded as one of the best talents to emerge from the club's youth set-up. manuel pellegrini is looking to sign the starlet. arsenal and barcelona are also interested in the youngster.
manchester city will resist any attempt by valencia to pull out of a £24million deal for alvaro negredo. there had been suggestions that valencia were trying to finance a move for radamel falcao. negredo joined valencia on loan last summer. the striker refused to celebrate after scoring against levante on monday.
roland giroux plays with his blood parrot cichlid for at least 15 minutes each day. the fish is a hybrid of the midas and the redhead and was first bred in 1986. the man strokes the fish with his hand and plays with it in the fish tank.
adam galloway, 23, was on a half-term city break to prague when he left his camera on the seat. ryanair steward fernando miguel andrade viseu begged teacher aaron not to report him to police. when he got home, aaron found his camera for sale on ebay with 35 minutes to go. he reported the drug-addicted steward to police and officers raided his home and found the camera.
tottenham manager mauricio pochettino believes another season in the europa league could hamper tottenham's top four hopes. spurs are out of next season's champions league and face newcastle on saturday. john carver has been in charge of newcastle since the end of last season.
rory mcilroy and tiger woods were paired together for the final round of the masters at augusta. the world no 1 finished in fourth place, six shots behind jordan spieth. jordan won his first ever major title with victory at the masters on sunday.
angelique kerber beat madison keys 6-2, 4-6, 7-5 in the final of the family circle cup in charleston on sunday. kerber won six of the last seven games to win the title. it was kerber's fourth wta title and first since linz in 2013. keys lost the final set 4-1 before winning the final six games in a row.
maria sharapova has pulled out of russia's fed cup semi-final against germany with a leg injury. venus williams has withdrawn from the usa's world group play-off against italy due to personal reasons. the world no 2 has not played since the miami open in march.
jon flanagan will speak to liverpool about a new contract in the summer. the defender's deal is set to expire at the end of the season. liverpool manager brendan rodgers is keen to keep the full back at the club. flangan has not played for liverpool this season due to a knee injury. the 22-year-old was a revelation at anfield last season but has become a forgotten man.
sania mirza became the first indian to reach the top of the wta doubles ranking. mirza teamed up with martina hingis to win the family circle cup title in charleston on sunday. the 28-year-old beat casey dellacqua and darija jurak 6-0, 6-4 in the final.   only three other asian women have achieved the top doubles ranking .
lewis hamilton beat nico rosberg to win the chinese grand prix. nico accused hamilton of being selfish by driving too slow and compromising his second place. former world champion mika hakkinen says hamilton was well within his rights to look after himself. hamilton is bidding to win a third world championship title this season.
lewis hamilton won the chinese grand prix in shanghai on sunday. nico rosberg accused hamilton of being'selfish' as tension rose between the two team-mates. mercedes boss toto wolff is confident the matter has been dealt with.
mercedes boss toto wolff says nico rosberg and lewis hamilton will have to deal with 'unpopular calls'    the team may have to make decisions on the pit wall if they are risking a win against ferrari.   'we have a big responsibility to the team and the brand'
lewis hamilton won the chinese grand prix in shanghai on sunday. mercedes team-mate nico rosberg criticised hamilton after the race. the british driver insists he is prepared for further criticism from his colleague. hamilton leads the drivers' championship by 13 points.
tom varndell scored a hat-trick as wasps beat london welsh 40-13 at the kassam stadium. ashley johnson, sailosi tagicakibau and alapati leiua also scored tries for wasps. wasps won away from home in the aviva premiership for the first time in 2015. the exiles trailed 12-5 at half-time, but fought back well.
lewis hamilton won the chinese grand prix on sunday. nico rosberg hit out at his team-mate after the race and accused him of being'selfish' in press conference. the two drivers barely spoke to each other the following day. but hamilton and nico have both had their say on the row.
aaron cook's application to switch allegiances to represent moldova has been approved. cook is ranked no 2 in the world in the sub-80kg taekwondo class. cook has been granted moldovan citizenship. cook plans to fight for british olympic association at rio 2016.
raheem sterling has been pictured smoking a shisha pipe with liverpool team-mate jordon ibe. jack wilshere was photographed holding a pipe during a night out in london earlier this season. the arsenal midfielder is not the first premier league star to be caught smoking. sportsmail details five other misbehaving stars involved in similar incidents.
newcastle owner mike ashley owns a 9.8 per cent stake in rangers and loaned the club £5million. ashley's close associate derek llambias sat as director as ashley exerted his influence. rangers admitted the previous board breached 'dual ownership' rules by allowing ashley into ibrox.
home kit to feature three grey stripes and yellow trim. away kit will feature yellow trim and a greyed-out badge. pink touches from this season's shirts will also be dropped. real madrid will play in a grey and yellow away kit for next year. the club world cup badge will be moved to the centre of the kit.
celtic came from a goal down to beat kilmarnock 4-1 at parkhead on wednesday night. leigh griffiths scored a hat-trick after coming off the bench in the second-half. kris commons and darryl westlake scored for the visitors. celtic are eight points clear at the top of the premiership after the win.
leicester are just three points from safety in the premier league after back-to-back wins. nigel pearson has urged his players to focus on their own job and not worry about relegation rivals. foxes host swansea at the king power stadium on saturday.
michael phelps is aiming to compete in a fifth olympics next year in rio. the 18-time olympic champion won't swim in the world championships this summer. phelps will be competing in mesa for the first time since serving a six-month suspension by usa swimming after a second drunken driving arrest.
michael phelps is entered in five events at this week's arena pro swim series in mesa, arizona. it will be his first meet since serving a six-month ban following a drunk-driving conviction. phelps was suspended by usa swimming after his arrest on drunk driving charges.
obama said he 'had to say hi' to bolt when he became the first american president to visit jamaica since 1982. president obama joined the world-class sprinter in striking his signature 'lightning pose'   obama praised bolt saying that 'nobody's ever been faster' than the six-time olympic champion. jamaican prime minister portia simpson-miller told obama that he is 'well-loved in the country'
juan mata scored both goals as manchester united beat liverpool 2-1 at anfield. mata has been excluded from the spain squad since the world cup. the midfielder has collected his player of the month award for his performances. louis van gaal's side return to premier league action against aston villa on saturday.
emmanuel adebayor takes to twitter to pledge his future to tottenham. the 31-year-old striker insists he is happy to stay and fight for his place at white hart lane. has made just 16 appearances in all competitions this season and scored only twice. the striker joined spurs in 2011 from manchester city.
manchester united head to chelsea on saturday in top form, having won six successive matches. edwin van der sar is convinced louis van gaal will bring the glory days back to manchester united. the former goalkeeper admits the title is probably beyond united's grasp this season. united boss van gaal is looking to strengthen in the summer.
manchester united manager louis van gaal was stunned to find players could not train after dark at the club's carrington training ground. the meticulous manchester united boss wants players to train under lights ahead of a night match to replicate match conditions. trafford council have granted planning application to install floodlights at the swish complex.
maria sharapova will play for the russia team against germany in the fed cup semi-finals next week. the world no 2 rarely plays fed cup but will be part of the team in sochi. playing in the team event helps her become eligible for next year's olympics. andrea petkovic is also part of russia's fed cup team.
andy murray will marry his long-term girlfriend kim sears in dunblane cathedral on saturday afternoon. the world no 3 posted a series of 'emojis' on twitter on the morning of his wedding day. the pair have been together for 10 years. the scot will jet off to barcelona after his nuptials to kick-start his clay court season.
wolfsburg beat freiburg 1-0 to reach the german cup semi-finals. ricardo rodriguez scored a second-half penalty to secure the win for wolfsburg. they join borussia dortmund in the final four of the competition. the swiss defender scored from the penalty spot in the 72nd minute.
usain bolt will compete at the iaaf/btc world relays in the bahamas on may 2 and 3. the six-time olympic gold medallist will be part of jamaica's team. bolt insists he is 'fit, healthy and ready to run' at the event.
tottenham will subsidise emmanuel adebayor's £100,000-per-week wages in order for him to leave the club. the togolese striker is out of favour at white hart lane under mauricio pochettino. the 31-year-old has made just nine league starts this season for spurs. tottenham will pay a percentage of the striker's wages next season.
andre schurrle scored his first goal for wolfsburg since joining from chelsea in february. the 24-year-old thanked wolfsburg supporters for their patience as he netted on saturday.    the ex-chelsea forward admitted not scoring for the german side was 'eating away' at him.
glenn hoddle described david luiz as a 'liability at the back' after psg's 3-1 defeat against barcelona. the ex-chelsea defender was nutmegged twice by luis suarez in champions league quarter-final first leg. hoddles said luz defended like an 'eight-year-old who hasn't been coached'    former arsenal striker thierry henry questioned the player's fitness after the game.
torpedo supporters showed the flag during the club's 3-1 win over arsenal tula on sunday. club must play next two home games behind closed doors. torpedo are already required to play their next two games behind doors for monkey chants. club's previous three racism-related punishments this season involved monkey chants against opposition players.
bayern munich were beaten 3-1 by porto in the champions league quarter-final first leg on wednesday. the german champions travelled with only 15 outfield players to portugal. pep guardiola's squad flew back to bavaria on thursday after the defeat. arjen robben, franck ribery, bastian schweinsteiger and manuel neuer all missed out.
belgium striker christian benteke has scored eight goals in his last six matches for aston villa. the striker has scored a goal every 87 minutes for tim sherwood's side under the new manager.   the striker admits he surprised himself by taking a free-kick to rescue a point against qpr last week.
pep guardiola remains manchester city's first choice to replace manuel pellegrini as manager. guardiola saw his bayern munich side lose 3-1 against porto in portugal on wednesday. he has a year remaining on his contract in germany but a quarter-final champions league exit could be a problem for manchester. the 44-year-old is seen as a natural fit given his close relationship with manchester's executives.

john wild was found guilty of racially abusing former wales goalkeeper jason brown. kick it out welcomed the successful prosecution of john wild. john wild was banned for three years and ordered to pay compensation. but former dartford keeper criticised football association and pfa for not doing enough to help him.
two goals from ricardo quaresma and jackson martinez saw porto beat bayern munich 3-1 in champions league quarter-final. portugal's record opted for the pun 'fantasporto' as their headline for the next day. pep guardiola's team lost the first leg at the allianz arena.
ben flower led wigan's victory song after returning from a six-month suspension. the forward was sent off in the warriors' grand final defeat by st helens last october. dom manfredi scored a hat-trick of tries as wigan beat warrington 30-20 in super league derby.
chelsea midfielder oriol romeu is currently on loan at stuttgart. he predicts the scores for the weekend's premier league and fa cup matches. sportsmail's martin keown goes up against the on loan midfielder to predict the scores. chelsea host manchester united at stamford bridge on saturday.
sam tomkins has agreed to rejoin wigan after cutting short his stay in the nrl with new zealand warriors. the 26-year-old rejected an offer from warrington to return to his home-town club. tomkins left wigan at the end of the 2013 season after becoming homesick . he made 129 super league appearances, scoring 107 tries, during his four-year stint at wigan.
kevin pietersen's agents have helped him outplay the ecb without any help from outside experts. andy flower continues to earn £300,000-a-year as ecb's technical director despite ashes humiliation. shivnarine chanderpaul wants to continue playing test cricket so that he can play with his son. tehsin nayani has written a book about his time as a manchester united spokesman.
manchester city's james milner could leave on a free transfer this summer. gerhard tremmel, glen johnson and ron vlaar are other players set to leave their premier league clubs. tom clever and tom j gutierrez could also leave aston villa and manchester united.
former queens park rangers chairman gianni paladini has registered as a director of a new bradford city holding company. he left loftus road in 2011 and has attempted to buy birmingham from carson yeung. phil parkinson's side have been one of the league one success stories of the season .
nigel pearson has turned to former manager howard wilkinson for advice. leicester host swansea on saturday looking for a third straight win in the premier league. the foxes have beaten west ham and west brom in their last two games. pearson played under wilkinson at sheffield wednesday.
winger dom manfredi scored a hat-trick for the second time in five days as wigan beat warrington 30-20. ben flower returned to action after serving six-month ban for punching lance hohaia in grand final defeat by st helens. sam tomkins also scored a try for the hosts at the dw stadium.
diafra sakho limped off after 59 minutes against stoke city on saturday. the west ham striker tore a thigh muscle and is out for the rest of the season. the 25-year-old is west ham's top scorer this season with 12 goals. sam allardyce's current deal at the club expires at the end of the year.
gareth bale was verbally abused by supporters outside real madrid's training ground after 0-0 draw with atletico madrid. it came almost a month after the world's most expensive footballer's white bentley was attacked by fans. the £86million signing was blamed for his one-on-one miss in the champions league. spanish media gave bale five out of 10 for his performance and labelled him lazy.
alex oxlade-chamberlain could miss the remainder of the season with a groin injury. the england midfielder has been ruled out of the fa cup semi-final against reading. jack wilshere will be in arsenal's squad for the match at wembley.
jenna louise driscoll was due to appear at brisbane magistrates court on monday but didn't show up. the 25-year-old was charged with three counts of bestiality and seven drug charges. police were carrying out checks on her phone for suspected drug trafficking when they found three videos of her allegedly having sex with a dog . the woman was remanded on bail to appear in court but failed to show up and police have issued a warrant for her arrest. she was charged last year with seven charges of supplying or trafficking drugs, one of unlawful wounding and three charges of bestialsity with her dog.
leeds' sporting director nicola salerno has resigned from his role at the club. massimo cellino is banned from having executive influence at leeds due to a tax conviction in italy. leeds' assistant head coach steve thompson was suspended by the club last week.

patient - known only as alex s - had all 19 of his teeth removed over four weeks in munich, germany. dentist - known as k - claimed to be a'recognised healer' and was charged 2,000 euros (£1,435)   he believed the series of operations would help him regain his vitality and cure his schizophrenia. but judge said he was not a 'normal dentist' and ordered k to pay the cost of the patient's implants.
jimmy anderson will play his 100th test for england on monday. anderson needs just four wickets to become the leading test wicket-taker in england's history. the 32-year-old says he wants to continue playing test cricket for as long as possible.    anderson says he has been motivated by the memories of being marginalised in the early stages of his career.
stuart broad admits he was sorry to see paul downton leave his role in the ecb. broad has backed alastair cook to score big runs during the series in the caribbean. broad insists he twisted his ankle during the warm-up match but insists he feels fine now. broad says it will be a great achievement for jimmy anderson to become england's leading wicket taker.

former gunners striker thierry henry said francis coquelin was his man of the match in arsenal's 1-0 win over burnley at turf moor. the 23-year-old midfielder played a key role in aaron ramsey's goal. arsenal manager arsene wenger also praised the display of francis.

michael owen was a pundit on bt sport's fletch and sav show on saturday. the former england striker said he didn't believe charlie adam's 66-yard goal was goal of the season contender. robbie savage and steve mcmanaman were also in the studio to debate owen's opinion. adam responded to the comments on twitter, saying owen couldn't have scored the goal.
manchester city manager manuel pellegrini admits he could be sacked if he finishes outside the champions league places this season. the reigning champions have lost four of their last five games in the premier league. city face west ham united at the etihad stadium on sunday .
sarah sparkman, a lawyer from arkansas, tweeted about how female sports reporters are sexualized on screen. britt mchenry, 28, found the tweet and began berating her - despite not tagging her in the tweet. she used similar language to berate a women's rights campaigner on twitter a month earlier. the espn reporter has been suspended for a week after attacking a single mother-of-three gina michelle.
deputy michael hubbard from the spartanburg county sheriff's office is seen approaching the woman sitting on overpass on the i-26. dashcam footage shows a patrol car stopping in south carolina after she threatened to jump. she says she was 'just looking for my way out and being at peace' before being dragged away from the edge of the bridge and taken to hospital for evaluation.
the university of southern california women's tennis team won the pac-12 championship on thursday. the team defeated the university of california -los angeles 4-3. after the win, they smashed and broke the trophy. usc finishes the season 21-2, while ucla is 18-4.
officer jeffrey swett was allegedly run over by william bogard in january after the suspect stole his car while it was running . swett suffered two broken arms, a broken leg and severe head and neck trauma. suspect has pleaded not guilty after being charged with attempted murder, assault and vehicle theft. officer swett testified that bogard was smiling behind the wheel while running him down.
crowd tried to storm the club tsunami in the chilean capital santiago to see british punk band doom. crush outside the club caused a structure inside the building to fall killing three people. seven people were critically injured in the crush and seven are in a critical condition.
stephen taylor, went missing in the solent after leaving lee-on-solent in hampshire at 11.30am yesterday. the 54-year-old kayaker was in touch with his partner michelle fuller, 49, throughout the day. but he failed to return home late in the evening. coastguard helicopter, rescue teams and lifeboats were launched to search off hill head. police confirmed at midday today that a body had been found.
jacob polyakov cracked his head on the floor after plunging off the edge of the sec 'globe' centre in kiev, ukraine. his friend jamal maslow broke his coccyx after landing on the corner of one of the steps. both 17-year-olds are in intensive care after the accident at the shopping centre.
the bbc covered arsenal v reading in the fa cup semi-final on saturday night. gary lineker was the best presenter of live football on tv. sky's premier league coverage was a little predictable. the bbc may miss out on the premier league's weekly thrills, but took the biscuit in fa cup.

the creatures were discovered at blairgowrie pier but are fast on the move to their proper migration spot. spider crabs migrate once a year in the port phillip bay area in southern victoria. the full migration is expected to occur in two to five weeks.

the fire crew in boise, idaho, thought they were chasing human voices when they found the two parrots. both are expected to survive. the birds were found in a burning home and treated with oxygen masks. no people were found inside the home. the cause of the fire is being investigated.

youtube user elman511 cracked open the over-sized egg that was laid by one of his hens.   it’s caused when the hen is in the process of forming an egg in her oviduct and another oocyte is released too soon. in the video, ‘elman511’ cracks the egg, which is double the size of a normal one, to reveal another fully formed egg inside. the unusual occurrence is down to a counter-peristalsis contraction . this is when a second oocyte (yolk) is released by the hen's ovary before the first egg has been laid.
surveillance footage from philadelphia's 15th street station platform shows a man slip and fall on the tracks at 6.40pm on wednesday. a man in an eagles jacket jumped onto the tracks and pulled the man to safety. both men are expected to survive.
the month-old cubs were captured on video sitting before press and public at leningrad zoo in saint petersburg. one black and one spotty are the fifth brood of mother and father agnes and rock. the two young cats have both reached an ideal weight of 3kg and their teeth have already started to grow.
airbus a330 took off from sydney airport bound for perth but was back on the tarmac by 12.30pm. the safety light showed a possible issue with the rear cargo doors. passengers will be moved to another flight due to depart sunday afternoon.

villagers in ansai, central china, dug a 46m well to get fresh drinking water for their home. after pumping the water to the surface they found it was so polluted it could be set on fire. locals said they could smell petrol and gas coming from the well, and blamed a leak from a petrol station. local officials say they have launched an investigation into how the water became so polluted.
real madrid are keeping tabs on liverpool winger raheem sterling. zinedine zidane has revealed the la liga giants are monitoring the liverpool starlet. sterling has rejected an offer of £100,000 a week to sign a new deal at anfield. brendan rodgers has admitted liverpool may struggle to attract top players.
denis cuspert, 39, dubbed the 'goebbels of isis', sings about planning attacks in britain, germany and france. british police have raised security levels ahead of world war i commemorative events. the propaganda video is filled with footage of prisoners being beheaded and executions. he calls on jihadist sleeper cells in europe to carry out terrorist attacks. the german rapper was a successful rapper under the name deso dogg before joining isis.
manchester united scouts are due to watch inter milan striker mauro icardi against verona at the weekend. chelsea, manchester city and arsenal have also watched the 22-year-old. icardi has turned down inter's latest contract offer. the argentine is the joint-third top scorer in serie a this season.
aston villa beat liverpool 3-2 in the fa cup semi-final at wembley. christian benteke, fabian delph and jack grealish starred for the visitors. tim sherwood's side will face arsenal in the final of the competition.
gareth bale is a huge doubt for real madrid's champions league quarter-final second leg match against atletico madrid. welsh forward lasted just a few minutes before limping off with a calf injury against malaga on saturday. los blancos are also without croatian midfielder luka modric, who suffered a knee ligament strain.
jonathas scored to give elche a 1-0 win over real sociedad in la liga on monday night. the striker took advantage of a defensive blunder to score his 10th goal of the season. real sociedad manager david moyes' side remain in 12th place in the league.
hazel the bulldog puppy named hazel is filmed trying to get the better of a washing basket. the dog lands inside the basket and leans up against the side of it. her weight causes the basket to fall onto its side sending her and some clothes to the floor. the video was filmed in a front room by her owner.
nottingham forest manager dougie freedman wants to sign blackburn striker jordan rhodes. the striker has scored 70 goals in the last three seasons for the rovers. forest are keen on signing the 25-year-old on loan, but it could cost £10m.
jay hart, 24, could be heard laughing on the mobile phone footage as he was caught having sex with a fan in the manager's dugout. he was wearing a clitheroe fc tracksuit and was filmed by a fan at mossley afc. the player was dismissed after the clip of his tryst was shared on social media. clit heroe chairwoman anne barker said the player had 'brought the club into disrepute'   he was sacked by the non-league side within hours of the footage being shared to fans.
hannover have gone 13 games without a win in the bundesliga. tayfun korkut was sacked after a 4-0 loss to bayer leverkusen on saturday. michael frontzek will take over at hannover and has five games left to avoid relegation.
manchester city under 18s boss jason wilcox wants to deliver local players to the first team. manchester city face chelsea in the fa youth cup final on monday. wilcox hopes to emulate manchester united's 'class of 92' but says it will be very difficult. he was let go by his current club as a teenager.
lucas matthysse won a majority decision against ruslan provodnikov in a 12-round super lightweight bout on saturday night. don ackerman and john mckaie scored the fight 114-114 and 115-113 in favor of the argentine. matthyse landed the majority of the punches in the first round.
derry mathews beat tony luis by unanimous points decision at echo arena in liverpool. mathews won the interim wba lightweight title after richar abril and ismael barroso both pulled out of the fight. mathew was handed a 114-112, 114- 112, 115-112 decision. lu is was drafted in after mathews saw out the fight at the last minute.
lukas podolski is currently on loan at inter milan from parent club arsenal. the german forward says he wants to play for arsene wenger's side next season. the 29-year-old has failed to score in 12 appearances since arriving in serie a in january. the world cup winner struggled for first-team opportunities at arsenal.
terence crawford defeated thomas dulorme in the sixth round to win the vacant wbo junior welterweight title. crawford knocked down the puerto rican three times before the referee stopped the fight. it was crawford's first fight since moving up in class. he is now 26-0 with 18 knockouts.
paddy barnes and michael conlan are one win away from qualifying for the 2016 summer games in rio. the irish pair have travelled 34,000 miles during the current olympiad. barnes has boxed 29 rounds in 12 weeks and conlan 28. the pair face native opposition in maiquetia on saturday night.
nicola adams is hoping to become a double olympic gold medallist in rio next year. natasha jonas announced her retirement from boxing on april 7. adams has no intention of following her britain team-mate into retirement. the 32-year-old is preparing to return to the ring at the national championships.
caroline wozniacki congratulated golf sensation jordan spieth on twitter following his masters success. tennis star was quick to ensure fans it wasn't a dig at her former love interest rory mcilroy. spieth won the first major of his career with a four-shot victory at augusta.
gael monfils beat former world no 1 roger federer 6-4, 7-6 at the monte carlo masters. the world no 18 beat the 33-year-old in a last-16 thriller in monaco. the frenchman will face grigor dimitrov in the quarter-finals.
freddie roach says that floyd mayweather has picked and chosen his fights during his career. roach rates super middleweight andre ward and gennady golovkin higher than he does undefeated mayweather. manny pacquiao's trainer says that mayweather cannot be considered the best ever.
jack nicklaus believes it is time for the 'young guys to take over' after jordan spieth's masters victory. spieth and rory mcilroy have a combined age of 46, while phil mickelson is 44 and tiger woods 39. the 21-year-old equalled tiger woods' 72-hole record and became the first man to reach 19-under par at augusta.
roger federer beat jeremy chardy 6-2, 6-1 to reach the last 16 of the monte carlo masters. it was federer's first match since his loss in the indian wells final in march. the 17-time major champion spent less than one hour on court.
billy vunipola was cleared of intentionally headbutting mathew tait. the england no 8 had been cited for striking leicester full back matehw tait with his head. billy is free to face clermont auvergne in saturday's champions cup semi-final. maro itoje has signed a new long-term contract at saracens.
james anderson claimed his 384th test wicket on friday in the first test in antigua. sir ian botham's record had stood for 23 years. anderson believes he can still improve as a bowler and take more wickets for england.
lewis hamilton insists that he will do his talking 'on the track' ahead of the bahrain grand prix. nico rosberg is 17 points behind his team-mate ahead of sunday's race. the two drivers will renew their rivalry in the desert.
former england rugby captain mike tindall watched his horse monbeg dude finish third in the grand national at aintree. many clouds won the race and many clouds' jockey liam treadwell won £88,400 for his efforts. the horse's trainer michael scudamore and owner james simpson-daniel were also celebrating.
australia captain michael clarke believes kevin pietersen could play in this summer's ashes test series. the 34-year-old has not played for his country since the fifth test in sydney. he was unceremoniously sacked by england 14 months ago.
mcc reveals plans to replace the 'tired' tavern and allen stands at lord's. new stand will increase overall capacity of the home of cricket to almost 30,000. mcc's'masterplan' redevelopment of lord's has a projected budget of £80million. completion scheduled for spring 2019, in time for world cup and ashes.
billy vunipola was cited for an alleged butt on monday night. the saracens full back could miss champions cup semi-final against clermont on saturday. toulon are plotting a move for quade cooper after missing out on danny cipriani.
siobhan-marie o'connor won gold in the 200 metres individual medley at the british championships. her time of two minutes 09:51 seconds was the fastest recorded in the world this year. hannah miley took the silver medal and aimee willmott claimed bronze. jazz carlin claimed two gold medals despite missing world championships qualifying time.
tottenham travel to st james' park to face newcastle on sunday afternoon. newcastle fans are staging a mass protest against the current regime at the club. mauricio pochettino is unsure whether a boycott by fans will help or hinder his side. the spurs boss is in an upbeat mood ahead of the trip to newcastle. he will come up against his countryman jonas guiterrez.
former qpr manager harry redknapp says he would consider a return to management as long as it's at the right club. the 68-year-old resigned as queens park rangers manager in february citing knee problems. the former bournemouth boss turned down a'mind-blowing' offer to coach abroad. he leads men united xi against leyton orient legends at the matchroom stadium on sunday.
ronny deila believes teams should have more of a say on kick-off times. celtic face inverness at hampden park in the scottish cup semi-final on sunday at 12.15. the spfl sparked a furious row this week over kick-offs. deila says that television should not control football, rather than teams.
karim benzema will miss real madrid's clash against atletico madrid on wednesday. carlo ancelotti is 'hesitating' over whether to play a 4-4-2 or 4-3-3 formation. gareth bale and luka modric are also set to miss the champions league clash. barcelona coach luis enrique is hailed as the best coach in history in his first 50 games.
toni duggan posted a picture on instagram of her with manchester united manager louis van gaal. the 23-year-old was at wing's restaurant after manchester city's win over united. duggan has apologised to fans and removed the photo from instagram. the england forward has also issued an apology on her facebook page.
charlie austin has scored 17 goals for queens park rangers this season. harry kane will be with gareth southgate's under-21 team. england manager roy hodgson will be monitoring the striker for the rest of the season. austin is in contention for a surprise call up to the national team.
southampton manager ronald koeman accepts it will be difficult to keep hold of nathaniel clyne this summer. manchester united are interested in signing the right back. southampton boss koeman wants to keep his star man at the club until the end of the season. koeman's side are currently fourth in the premier league.
eniola aluko, lucy bronze, karen carney, jess clarke, kelly smith and ji so-yun have been nominated for the pfa women's player of the year award. manchester city defender bronze is the current holder of the award. chelsea and england forward aluko has been nominated.
celtic lost 2-1 to inverness in the scottish cup semi-final on sunday. leigh griffiths says celtic have been 'robbed' by the officials. no penalty or red card was given for josh meekings' handball in the box. celtics keeper craig gordon was sent off for a foul on marley watkins.
inverness beat celtic 3-2 in the scottish cup semi-final at the weekend. john hughes says the break was a turning point in the game. inverness missed a penalty and craig gordon was sent off at the break .
steve mcclaren's derby side will make sure of a play-off place with victory at huddersfield. bristol city boss steve cotterill will win the league one trophy with victory against coventry. burton will be promoted with a win at morecambe in league two.
eddie howe has called on supporters to inspire bournemouth to win promotion from the championship. watford boss slavisa jokanovic is not looking beyond birmingham as they chase automatic promotion. norwich face middlesbrough on friday night in the title race.
nathaniel clyne has been linked with a move away from southampton this season. the right back has impressed for the saints this season and has been capped four times by england. manchester united target has admitted he wants to play champions league football. ronald koeman has admitted it may be hard to keep the defender at the club.
morgan schneiderlin, yannick bolasie and nathaniel clyne are wanted men in the premier league.    danny ings is out of contract at burnley and is a target for top clubs. aaron cresswell is wanted by manchester city, chelsea and manchester united.
ryan mason made his senior england debut against italy on tuesday night. the 23-year-old was celebrating team-mate andros townsend's equalising goal. ryan mason's tattoo became popular online during the celebration. twitter user compared it to a photograph of himself at 12 years old. england escaped turin with a 1-1 draw.
leeds president massimo cellino insists he had nothing to do with the events that led to six players pulling out of the squad. mirco antenucci, giuseppe bellusci, dario del fabro, marco silvestri, souleymane doukara and edgar cani were among the players to withdraw.    cellino has been banned since january after being found guilty of not paying tax on a yacht.
jose mourinho is on the cusp of winning his third premier league title with chelsea. former defender paulo ferreira expects the manager to stay at stamford bridge for 'a long, long time'   the 52-year-old is leading the blues towards their fourth title in his second spell at the club. didier drogba would also like to extend his stay at the blues for another season.
manchester city must have eight homegrown players in their premier league squad of 25. roberto mancini was not happy with the quality of players signed by the club. manchester have six premier league homegrown players and only three of them are english.   the club are being linked with players like danny rose and aaron cresswell.
brendan rodgers says a move to manchester city would not be a step up for raheem sterling. city have been heavily linked with a £50million move for the midfielder this summer. sterling is wanted by manchester for £50m as he stalls over new contract. rodgers believes manchester are bigger than manchester united.
jermaine beckford scored his 10th goal of the season as preston were held to a 2-2 draw by gillingham. mk dons closed the gap on second-placed preston to three points after a 4-2 win at rochdale. crewe move out of the bottom four after a 1-1 draw at peterborough.
danny rose has attracted interest from manchester city after a strong season with tottenham. mauricio pochettino will resist any offers for the left back. manchester have considered signing the 24-year-old as a homegrown player. rose is currently at tottenham hotspur and signed a five-year deal last summer.
aaron cresswell has proved a good fit for the premier league since signing for west ham in july 2014. john stones signed for everton from barnsley for just £3m. leonardo ulloa is the top scorer in the league for leicester city this season. andrew robertson joined hull from dundee for £2.85m. dwight gayleeterborough moved from crystal palace to crystal palace for £4m.
liverpool lost 2-1 to aston villa in the fa cup semi-final at wembley on may 30. steven gerrard was deployed in a number of different roles by brendan rodgers. the midfielder was playing his final game in a liverpool shirt before leaving the club in the summer. his header was cleared off the line with four minutes to play.
arsenal goalkeeper wojciech szczesny says he feels sorry for adam federici after his mistake in the fa cup semi-final. federici let alexis sanchez's shot slip through his hands in extra-time. arsenal beat hull 2-1 at wembley to reach their second consecutive final.
malky mackay's tenure at wigan athletic came to an end on monday after a 2-0 defeat by derby. dave whelan was appointed manager of wigan in november 2014 but has arguably harmed the football club. whelan failed to win a single home game in six months in charge of the club.   whelan's decision to appoint the controversial scot has cost him his reputation and damaged the club's image.
tony mccoy is riding in his 20th grand national at aintree this week. the greatest ever jump jockey is guaranteed a great send-off during the grand national. the royal liver building in liverpool was lit up with a good luck message for the jockey. mccoys won the world famous grand national on don't push it in 2010.
wojciech szczesny hasn't played a premier league game for arsenal since january. arsene wenger's side are second in the premier league after eight straight wins. david seaman believes sz czesny must use his spell out of the side as a catalyst to become a better goalkeeper. the former arsenal goalkeeper has backed david ospina to become number one for the club.
over 45,000 ladies have descended on aintree for day two of the grand national - the crabbies grand national. the popular event has seen more than 40,000 racegoers descend on the racecourse for the day. ladies' day is the perfect build-up to saturday's main day of racing - crabbie's grand national . the first race of the day was the doom bar maghull novices' chase, with saphir du rheu winning.
lionel messi and cristiano ronaldo could play together in a uefa all-star match. a marketing company has proposed the annual fixture. the proposed match would be a clash of the best of european stars.    the proposed game would be inspired by the nba all-stars game between the western and eastern conferences.
lionel messi has scored 45 goals in 44 games for barcelona this season. barcelona face psg in the champions league quarter-final first leg at the parc des princes on wednesday. manager laurent blanc has described messi as 'unstoppable'   blanc says his side will need to be 'aggressive defensively' to stop messi and his team-mates.
lionel messi says he is happy again after a disappointing and trophy-free 2014. the four-time ballon d'or winner was hampered by injury and off-field drama. messi is top of the la liga and his personal goal tally's at 45 from 44 games. barcelona face paris saint-germain in the champions league quarter final on wednesday.
randy lerner has hardly seen villa play in person during his nine-year ownership of the club. american owner will attend fa cup semi-final with liverpool at wembley on sunday. villa owner has been trying to sell the club since last may.
christian benteke scored the opening goal for aston villa in the 35th minute against tottenham. tim sherwood's team took the lead after a goal from the striker in the premier league. sanchez was sent off at the end of the first half for a second bookable offence. the striker has now scored six goals in eight games for the villa.
paul gascoigne scored the goal 24 years ago today against arsenal in the fa cup semi-final at wembley. it is one of the best goals ever scored at the home of football. the then spurs midfielder scored a 35-yard free-kick five minutes into the match. gascoigna's goal set spurs on their way to a 3-1 victory.
manchester city currently have a four-point lead over liverpool in the race for the final champions league place. liverpool are top of the premier league with six games to go. manuel pellegrini's side have lost four of their past six premier league games. but liverpool have not collapsed and are looking strong.
christian benteke scored the opening goal of the game for aston villa in the 35th minute against tottenham hotspur . carlos sanchez was sent off for a second bookable offence in the first half. tim sherwood's team moved up to 10th in the premier league table after the win.
harry redknapp was at the emirates to watch arsenal beat liverpool 4-1 in the premier league on april 4. after the game, he claims he was attacked with coins and verbally abused by some fans. the former queens park rangers boss was stuck in traffic after leaving the stadium. redkapp is currently out of work after leaving his position as manager of queens park.
alexis sanchez has scored 20 goals for arsenal this season and is second in the premier league. scottish defender frank mclintock made 403 appearances for the club between 1964 and 1973. the chilean striker is the only current player good enough to get into the great arsenal teams of yesteryear.
bayern munich face porto in the champions league quarter-final, first leg on wednesday. thomas muller believes his team are stronger for their recent injuries. arjen robben, franck ribery, bastian schweinsteiger and david alaba are all out. porto host bayern at the estadio do dragao in portugal.
manchester united midfielder michael carrick wants to take up a career in motorsport. the 34-year-old says he wants to be an f1 driver when his playing days are over. carrick hopes to be playing for many more years, and wants to emulate ryan giggs. the former west ham star has enjoyed a renaissance this season at manchester united.
jack wilshere continued his return from injury in arsenal u21's 1-0 defeat by reading at the emirates stadium. long-term absentee abou diaby managed to last 56minutes of his own return. former arsenal defender martin keown's son niall scored the winner for the royals after eight minutes. german forward serge gnabry and other first team players also played for the hosts.
serge gnabry played 90 minutes for arsenal under 21s against reading on monday. the 19-year-old has not featured for the first team since march last year after suffering a serious knee injury. the midfielder impressed for the gunners last season but has not played since.
arsenal have won 16 of their last 18 games in the premier league. arsene wenger admits he could not have predicted his side's impressive run of results. the gunners are currently second in the league table. arsenal face championship side reading in the fa cup semi-final this weekend.
raheem sterling is stalling on a new £100,000-a-week contract offer at liverpool. the 20-year-old insists it has nothing to do with money. sterling has revealed he hopes liverpool fans create a chant for him. sterling is hoping to stay at anfield for the rest of the season.
newcastle have slipped out of the top four and out of champions league contention. john carver's side face liverpool at crystal palace on monday night. brendan rodgers' side are seven points adrift of fourth-placed manchester city. carver says his players need to relieve the pressure on their shoulders with a win.
tomas francis impressed up against alex corbisiero as exeter beat northampton saints at sandy park. chiefs prop qualifies for england and wales and could be fast-tracked through the ranks to face england at the world cup. northampton were unbeaten for three months in the aviva premiership. wasps beat london welsh 40-13 as tom varndell scored a hat-trick of tries.
david 'flats' flatman has been driving around the rugby world cup venues preparing for the tournament. former bath, saracens and england prop is on bt sport's 'tour de flats'   flats says the buzz around the tournament is palpable in rugby-mad parts of england. flats says picking the likes of danny cipriani is key to winning new fans at the world cup.
tom arscott scored a brace of tries for sale at the madejski stadium. danny cipriani kicked two penalties and a conversion for irish. irish scored three tries through alex lewington and andrew fenby. sale remain in seventh position in the aviva premiership.
jordan ibe has been out for the last six weeks with a knee injury. the liverpool winger damaged his knee ligaments against besiktas in the europa league. brendan rodgers' side face newcastle at anfield on monday night. mario balotelli remains sidelined with illness and will miss monday's visit to newcastle.
raheem sterling is stalling on a new £100,000-a-week contract at liverpool. daniel sturridge believes sterling will only be happy if he plays regularly for the club. sterling was at the launch of liverpool's new home kit for next season. the 20-year-old has been linked with a number of clubs.
real madrid face atletico madrid in the european derby on tuesday night. carlo ancelotti's team must accommodate cristiano ronaldo, gareth bale and karim benzema in a 4-3-3. atletico boss diego simeone will flood the midfield for the clash of styles. real madrid and atletico are level with inter and ac milan in number of city derbies.
bayern munich host porto in the champions league quarter-final on wednesday. porto coach julen lopetegui does not believe bayern's injury list will play a role in the game. pep guardiola has praised his former barcelona team-mate for porto's brand of football. jackson martinez has returned to the porto squad for the first leg at dragao.
philippe coutinho is becoming liverpool's go-to guy, according to jamie carragher. liverpool sold star striker luis suarez to barcelona for £75million during the summer. coutinho starred for liverpool in their 2-0 win against newcastle united on monday night.
manchester united face manchester united at stamford bridge on saturday in the premier league. jamie carragher and gary neville believe jose mourinho will have a plan to stop marouane fellaini. united have won their last six league games and are top of the table. carraghers believes mour mourinho will bring kurt zouma into his midfield to stop fellainsi.
marouane fellaini has enjoyed an upturn in fortunes at manchester united this season. louis van gaal described him as almost undroppable at the start of the season. marouane is one of the best in world football at the moment. wayne rooney has hailed his belgian team-mate as a handful for defences.
sampdoria president massimo ferrero says mario balotelli has lost his desire for football. the italian striker is set to leave liverpool at the end of the season. liverpool have been willing to sell the 24-year-old but he wants to take a pay cut.   he has only scored once in the premier league since his move to liverpool last summer.
ipswich drew 1-1 with rivals wolves at molineux on saturday. benik afobe scored a late equaliser for wolves after richard stearman's own goal. mick mccarthy hails the 'belligerent, stubborn and hard working' qualities of his 'horrible bunch' of ipswich players. kenny jackett is still hopeful his wolves side can secure a championship play-off spot.
more than 400 extra officers have been drafted in by british transport police. officers will be stationed on trains travelling from the north and the midlands. rivals manchester united, leeds and liverpool will all be in london over the weekend. united take on chelsea at stamford bridge on saturday.
leicester boss nigel pearson is not taking anything for granted in the chase for survival. the foxes face swansea at home on saturday in the premier league. leicester will escape the drop zone if they win and burnley fail to win at everton. everton boss roberto martinez believes sean dyche will help burnley survive.
emile heskey, eidur gudjohnsen and adam bogdan will be offered new contracts by bolton manager neil lennon. heskey has scored just one goal in the championship for bolton this season. goalkeeper adam bogdan has also been rewarded with a new deal.
paul mcgowan was handed his third conviction for assaulting a police officer last week. dundee manager paul hartley says he will not risk playing the troubled midfielder again this season. mc gowan has a police curfew and is under a restriction of liberty order. hartsley fears playing the midfielder could see him break his curfew and end up in prison.
jose mourinho and pep guardiola are two of the coaches of the last eight in the champions league from barcelona. laurent blanc and julen lopetegui were part of the barcelona xi that won the spanish super cup under bobby robson in 1996.   four of the eight coaches of this season’s champions league are from the same club.
sean bowen maintained his three-winner lead (45-42) over cheltenham gold cup winner nico de boinville in the conditional jockeys title race. bowen scored on abidjan at newton abbot and nico on one lucky lady. the season ends at sandown on saturday.
manchester city manager manuel pellegrini has the most difficult job in football, says sam allardyce. west ham united boss believes manchester city boss is under pressure to win back-to-back premier league titles. city have lost six of their last eight league games and sit fourth in the table.
lyon drew 2-2 with saint-etienne in the rhone valley derby at the stade de gerland on sunday night. clinton n'jie and christophe jallet scored for the hosts. lyon are level on points with paris st germain at the top of the ligue 1 table. lille kept fourth place in sight with a 2-0 win over bordeaux at the pierre mauroy. montpellier beat caen 1-0 to move up to seventh in the table after a narrow victory.
portland timbers beat new york city fc 1-0 in major league soccer. dairon asprilla scored the only goal of the game. teal bunbury scored one and set up another as the new england revolution beat the philadelphia union 2-1.
aston villa owner randy lerner was expected to appear at wembley on sunday. tim sherwood's side beat liverpool to reach the fa cup final. but the american's aunt passed away. lerne is rarely seen at the club's games, but was due to attend.
football in turkey has been suspended for one week following the armed attack on fenerbahce's team bus on saturday. police have detained two people suspected of involvement in the attack. the decision affects both next weekend's super lig fixtures and the midweek cup quarter-finals. the bus came under armed attack as it drove to the airport after a 5-1 win over rizespor.
manny pacquiao shared a video of his early morning jog ahead of his mega-fight with floyd mayweather on may 2. the champion boxer is preparing for the bout at the mgm grand in las vegas. mayweather posted a video showing him going for a late night jog. the two boxers will meet in a $300million showdown at the beginning of next month.
ken doherty trails mark davis 8-1 in third-round qualifier at ponds forge in sheffield. doherty won the world championships in 1997. graeme dott is a former world champion and trails yu delu 5-4 in the crucible.
ronnie o'sullivan will play 32-year-old debutant craig steadman in the first round of the betfred world championship. five-time winner o'ssullivan will play manchester’s debutant at the crucible on saturday. defending champion mark selby will play norwegian kurt maflin at the world championship .
manny pacquiao took to the mountains to train ahead of his mega-fight with floyd mayweather jnr on may 2. the boxer trained at griffith park summit in california ahead of the bout. the 36-year-old is preparing to take on his opponent in las vegas. the two boxers will go head-to-head in the richest bout in boxing history.
ronnie o'sullivan is a five time world champion and world no 2 in snooker. the 39-year-old admits his mind wanders while waiting for his opponent to finish at the table. 'the rocket' thinks about whether he's going to make his dinner or not. o'ssullivan has openly questioned his commitment to the sport in the past.
manchester city lost 4-2 to manchester united in the premier league derby on sunday. joe hart was disappointed with his side's display. manchester city are four points behind rivals united and 12 behind chelsea. hart said it was one of his 'worst days in a man city shirt'   hart is at a loss to explain why his side are struggling for form.
manchester city lost 4-2 at manchester united in the derby at old trafford on sunday. pablo zabaleta admits the champions are facing a battle to finish in the top four. manuel pellegrini's side have lost six of their last eight games in all competitions.
homeowners on hickory island in bonita springs, florida, captured footage of a nine foot bull shark swimming past their back yard. residents say fishermen throwing bait into the water is attracting the predators to their homes. bull sharks are considered among the most dangerous sharks in the world, and are among most likely to attack humans.
manchester united beat neighbours city 4-0 in the premier league derby. louis van gaal's team sit top of the table with two points per game against the current top seven teams. sportsmail's alternative table shows every club's total points gained against the top seven. united face chelsea at stamford bridge on saturday.
manchester united beat city 4-2 at old trafford in the premier league derby on sunday. manchester's official website claimed the city were red again after the win. louis van gaal's side are currently third in the league table, four points behind chelsea. but city are still four points adrift of united with six premier league games remaining.
vanessa moe's debut collection at mercedes benz fashion week australia featured plastic bag-like headwear. models charged down the runway in masks and headpieces that looked remarkably like sheets of plastic blowing against their faces. front row guests couldn't drag their eyes away from the polarising accessories.
scott quigg offered super-bantamweight world champion carl frampton £1.5m to fight. eddie hearn made the offer via his promoter barry mcguigan. but frampton has dismissed the offer as a 'publicity stunt'   frampton said hearn should make a more realistic offer to fight quigg at the manchester arena.
eathan cruse, 19, was one of five men taken into custody after anti-terror raids in melbourne on saturday morning. eathan said officers assaulted him after he had been handcuffed. his father, glen, also said he was brutally attacked by police during the raid. it comes after the father of another man arrested said his family was traumatised by the level of force used by police.
alan stubbs did not know what to make of peter houston's recent post-match comments. hibernian manager was angered by the falkirk manager's comments about his team. hibs boss said he has a lot of respect for houston and his comments. houston said falk kirk scored all of their goals against hibernian from crosses.
andy lee faces peter quillin at the barclays center in new york on saturday night. quillin failed to make the 160lb weight to fight for the wbo middleweight title. lee was hoping to make his first defence of the title. the irishman beat matt korobov to win the title in december last year.
josh warrington admitted he was bored by the end of his fight against dennis tubieron in leeds. the 24-year-old has been billed as the next ricky hatton due to his impressive fan base. warrington won the vacant wbc international featherweight title on points. the featherweight was awarded scores of 119-109 twice and and 119-110.
australian olympian jana pittman is believed to have given birth to her second child. the two-time world champion hurdler has a daughter named emily. the 32-year-old was filmed training for the 2016 rio olympics the day before going into labour. the athlete's new daughter was conceived with an anonymous sperm donor. she plans to compete in both the beijing world championships and the 2016 olympic games.
lilly pulitzer's diffusion collection sold out almost immediately online and in stores on sunday morning. the 250-piece collection of clothing, accessories, and homeware is now officially sold out by target. pieces from the collection have popped up on ebay with prices up to ten times the retail price.
fiorentina lost 1-0 at home to hellas verona in the europa league on monday. mounir obbadi scored in the 90th minute after alessandro diamanti missed a penalty for the home side. the defeat leaves the viola nine points behind third-placed roma in the table.
diego simeone has admitted his surprise at the fact there are no premier league clubs in the last eight of the champions league. chelsea, arsenal and manchester city were eliminated at the last 16 stage. atletico madrid face real madrid in the second leg of their champions league quarter-final on wednesday. the atletico boss believes the failure of english clubs in europe should be a 'wake-up call' for the premier league.
grayson hand, who is battling leukemia, joins the huskies with the help of team impact, an organization that matches children with life-threatening and chronic illness to college sports teams. hand's sister sophie, 7, was also taken on as an honorary cheerleader. father nate hand called the partnership a 'physical representation' of the support.

the 53-second video, posted on youtube, features footage of the unnamed woman recording an incident involving multiple officers in south gate on sunday. about 25 seconds into the clip, the woman is approached by a tall man strapped with a riffle who suddenly lunges at her. the man is later identified as a deputy u.s. marshal. he grabs her cell phone, throws it to the ground and then kicks it away in a fit of rage. south gate police chief randy davis has confirmed that the man who is seen kicking the phone is with the marshals.

this year's vivid sydney festival starts on may 22 and runs until june 8 from 6pm-midnight each night. each winter since 2009 the city's iconic buildings have been lit up with light installations. this year's festival will feature over 60 light installations and 140 artists. the festival has expanded to include pop-up bars and interactive skyscraper illumination.

caster semenya reclaimed the south african 800-meter title on saturday. the former 800 world title-holder and 2012 olympic silver medalist won in 2 minutes, 5.05 seconds in stellenbosch. semenya's winning time was just over four seconds off the qualifying mark for the world championships. she has run sparingly over the last three years because of injury problems.
