newcastle owner mike ashley has been urged to invest in the club or risk losing a generation of fans. thousands of newcastle fans boycotted the club's last game, a 3-1 defeat by tottenham. mark jensen warns ashley he risks creating a lost generation of supporters if he fails to invest.
alan pardew's five-game winning run was crucial to newcastle's season. without it, they would have only been on 20 points. newcastle were bottom of the premier league after a poor start to the season. pardew won 26 of the five games and kept his players on side. john carver's side are currently on six consecutive defeats.
leicester foxes beat swansea 2-0 at the king power stadium on saturday. leicester have now won three premier league games in a row for the first time since 2000. nigel pearson's side moved up to 17th in the premier league after the win. the foxes had only won two of their previous 24 games in the league.
dele alli was crowned the football league young player of the year on sunday night. the mk dons midfielder signed for mauricio pochettino for £5million in january. the 19-year-old believes tottenham are the 'perfect' club for him. alli is yet to play for spurs after being loaned back to his boyhood club.
west ham manager sam allardyce is out of contract at the end of the season and could leave the club. garry monk has been touted as a potential replacement but insists he is the perfect man for the job. monk has led swansea to a record-equalling 47 premier league points this season.
ryan hardie scored a brace on his full debut for rangers against dumbarton on saturday. it was the 18-year-old's first ever light blues start. rangers boss stuart mccall's side beat dumbarton 3-1 at dumbarton at the dumbarton stadium. hardie had made just four substitute appearances before the game .
stuart mccall is relaxed about the prospect of rangers finishing third in the scottish championship. rangers currently lead the race for second spot in the league. the gers travel to dumbarton on saturday as they look to hold on to second spot. mccall insists it will not be a disaster if rangers have to play two extra games in the play-offs.
yannick bolasie scored a second-half hat-trick for crystal palace at the stadium of light. glenn murray opened the scoring for the eagles in the 48th minute at the premier league clash. connor wickham scored a late consolation goal for sunderland. palace boss alan pardew's side moved up to fifth in the table after the comprehensive win.
dave king must convince the sfa that he is a 'fit and proper' person to be chairman of rangers. king ousted the previous directors at ibrox last month. the businessman has 41 convictions under south african tax law. stewart regan says king must give evidence to support his case to become chairman.
liverpool lost to aston villa in the fa cup semi-final and miss out on champions league qualification. brendan rodgers needs to sign five players this summer. danny ings, james milner, petr cech, memphis depay and asier illarramendi are all targets for liverpool. mario balotelli and rickie lambert appear set to depart liverpool at the end of the season.
aaron cresswell has been linked with a move to manchester city but sam allardyce has warned him to stay at west ham. the full back has been a star of the premier league for west ham this season. manchester have signed jack rodwell and scott sinclair from the club.
former spokesman for the glazer family, tehsin nayani, has written 'the glazer gatekeeper: six years speaking for manchester united's silent owners'   he claims the family were 'completely unruffled' by the protests that greeted their takeover of the club in 2005. sir alex ferguson regularly invited the family into his dressing room and was a huge fan of the manager.    malcolm glazer had little to do with the takeover, leaving it to his sons.
arsenal goalkeeper wojciech szczesny turned 25 on saturday. the gunners beat reading 2-1 in extra-time in the fa cup semi-final. after the game, sz czesny was treated to a birthday surprise at his home. his singer-songwriter girlfriend mariana luczenko presented him with a cake. the poland international was joined by family and friends for a private birthday performance by his favourite rock band, lemon.
ross mccormack gave charlton athletic the lead after eight minutes at the valley. matt smith headed the visitors in front after just eight minutes. but johann gudmundsson equalised for the visitors with a first-half goal. kit symons' side now sit 20th in the league table, eight points clear of rivals millwall.
barcelona and real madrid are looking to loan players out on loan next season. barcelona want limited departures from the first team but young players to gain experience.    pedro could be on his way out of barcelona after falling down the pecking order at the club. real mad madrid's boy wonder martin odegaard is expected to go on loan to a higher league club . munir el haddadi could also be loaned out next season at the nou camp.
fc united of manchester's new 5,000-capacity stadium broadhurst park is nearing completion. the new ground cost the democratic club a whopping £6.5m. the ground will host benfica for the official opening on may 29. general manager andy walsh says the ground is a'statement' to the fans.
john carver says he has the hardest job in football as head coach of newcastle united. thousands of supporters are planning to boycott sunday's home match against spurs. fans are unhappy at how newcastle are being run under mike ashley. steve mcclaren has already been tipped as a replacement for carver. carver has urged fans to get behind the team.
tottenham boss mauricio pochettino believes harry kane and ryan mason have been affected by the england call-up. the pair have struggled since returning from international duty. tottenham boss hopes to see improvement against newcastle at the weekend.
ashley young moved to old trafford in june 2011 from aston villa. the 29-year-old acknowledges it took time for him to come into his own at the club. young feels he has an important role under louis van gaal at manchester united. the winger feels he is finally feeling like a senior member of the squad.
juventus beat monaco 1-0 in the champions league quarter-final first leg on tuesday night. massimiliano allegri's starting line-up had an average age of 30years 64 days. italian giants are the second oldest side in champions league history. portsmouth hold the record for fielding the oldest ever starting line up in the premier league.
manny pacquiao meets up with saved by the bell actor mario lopez and nba superstar jeremy lin. welterweight boxer takes to instagram to show off his ripped physique ahead of his fight against floyd mayweather. mayweather takes on the filipino boxer in las vegas on may 2. may mayweather has admitted he has fallen out of love with boxing.
newcastle keeper tim krul congratulated sunderland striker jermain defoe on his goal at half-time in the wear-tyne derby. some have criticised the dutchman for his display of sportsmanship. pele and bobby moore's famous hug with pele in 1970 is often held up as the peak of football sportsmanship . but is football really so leeched of humanity that a pro can't congratulate a fellow professional?
tomas berdych advanced to the semi-finals of the monte carlo masters after milos raonic retired with a foot injury. raonic called a trainer after dropping serve in the first set. the canadian had to retire from his quarter-final clash with berdych. berdy ch will face either grigor dimitrov or gael monfils in the semis.
chelsea are weighing up a move for west ham striker enner valencia. jose mourinho is interested in signing the ecuadorian in the summer. chelsea are offering a new contract to patrick bamford but he will go on loan at middlesbrough. raheem sterling is also a transfer target for the club but they know it will be tough.
steve clarke insists his reading side must be 'perfect' to have any chance of beating arsenal at wembley. arsene wenger's side face reading in the fa cup semi-final on saturday. clarke has yet to see a perfect performance from one of his teams as a manager. he has never beaten wenger as a boss.
amir khan has admitted he does not know who he will fight on may 30. he announced chris algieri as his opponent last week. khan rejected the chance to fight kell brook at wembley in june 13. the welterweight has been criticised on social media.
jessica ennis-hill, mo farah and greg rutherford will compete at the anniversary games at the olympic stadium. all three gold medallists won gold at the london 2012 olympics. the three-day extravaganza is part of the sainsbury's anniversary games.
arsene wenger confirms wojciech szczesny will start in goal for arsenal against reading in the fa cup semi-final. the poland goalkeeper has lost his place to david ospina after a number of errors this season. arsene admits he's working hard to win back his place at the club.
manchester city players trained at their etihad campus base on wednesday. manuel pellegrini's side are preparing for their game at home to west ham united on sunday. yaya toure and samir nasri are reportedly two players who could leave the club in the summer. sergio aguero took part in shooting practice ahead of the game.
adrian heath is manager of the newest mls team orlando city. heath has been in charge of the club for eight years. the former everton and manchester city midfielder is currently in the usl. frank lampard and steven gerrard are set to join the mls in the summer.
david villa cheered on former club atletico madrid during champions league clash with real madrid. new york city fc forward joined mls newcomers    the world cup-winning star spent a year at vicente calderon last season. the quarter-final first-leg tie finished goalless with real's gareth bale missing a glorious chance.
ufc women's champion ronda rousey paid a visit to manny pacquiao's training camp in los angeles. she was 'truly honoured to meet such a humble and genuine person' in manny. manny is preparing for his may 2 megafight against floyd mayweather in las vegas. pacqu qiao and mayweather face each other in the richest fight in history.
patrick bamford has scored 19 goals on loan for middlesbrough this season. the 21-year-old striker is in talks with parent club chelsea to open talks over a new deal. jose mourinho has been impressed with the striker's attitude and development. romelu lukaku was sold to everton in the summer after failing to make the grade at the club.
nbc host rebecca lowe is a lifelong crystal palace fan and is married to former cheltenham manager paul buckle. nbc have more than doubled us interest in the premier league in the past two years.   nbc transported their entire premier league production from their hq in stamford to england for this weekend's round of matches.
floyd mayweather holds open workout for the media ahead of manny pacquiao fight on may 2. the american will be in las vegas on tuesday night. the session will be streamed live from 12am uk (7pm edt)    mayweather will be training ahead of his showdown with mannypacquiao.
manny pacquiao will be put through his paces at the wild card gym in los angeles this evening. floyd mayweather jnr was two hours late for his workout at the same venue. the welterweight boxer is training with trainer freddie roach.
floyd mayweather rang his car dealer at 3am to order a £1.5million bugatti to be delivered in 12 hours. the super-car was delivered just 11 hours later. obi okele, owner of fusion luxury motors, was given the task of ordering the car. mayweather has previously ordered a ferrari enzo at 2am.
stan wawrinka was beaten 6-1, 6-2 by grigor dimitrov at monte carlo masters. the defending champion made 41 unforced errors in the match. dimitrova will face gael monfils in the quarter-finals of the masters.
rafael nadal beat john isner 7-6 (8-6) 4-6 6-3 to reach the quarter-finals of the monte carlo masters. second seed roger federer was knocked out in straight sets by gael monfils. the world number two was beaten 6-4 7-7 (7-5) by the frenchman. david ferrer and grigor dimitrov also through to the last eight.
the referee for floyd mayweather's fight with manny pacquiao will earn $10,000 (£6,800) on may 2 in las vegas. kenny bayless and tony weeks are both frontrunners for the job. the fight is expected to draw revenue of around $400m (£273m)   mayweather recently revealed he is within three pounds of the welterweight limit already.
manny pacquiao has directed and performed in a music video for 'i'm fighting for filipinos'   the boxer is joined by several of his compatriots as he sings and performs in the video. the 36-year-old is preparing to face floyd mayweather on may 2 in las vegas.

real madrid drew 0-0 with atletico madrid at the vicente calderon on tuesday night. cristiano ronaldo and gareth bale missed the best chances of the match in the first half. bale was the only player to score for real madrid in the match.
mario mandzukic appeared to be punched and bitten by real madrid's daniel carvajal during champions league quarter-final first leg. atletico madrid drew 0-0 with real at the vicente calderon. paul scholes criticised the croatian striker for'making a meal' of many of his second-half clashes. the former manchester united midfielder claimed he was over reacting to challenges.

tire changer todd phillips, a front-outside tire changer for dayle coyne racing, was injured during the indycar grand prix of louisiana. he was struck by the car of francesco dracone, who had come in on lap 25 for tyres and fuel. drac one spun while exiting his put box and clipped the pit crew member's leg. phillip was flipped upside down by the force of the impact but escaped with minor injuries.
arjen robben has missed bayern munich's last three games due to an abdominal injury. the holland international has missed his side's last four matches due to the injury. robben said he has felt 'physically disabled' during his time on the sidelines. the winger is close to returning to full fitness and will start running again in a few days.
jurgen k klopp announced he would be leaving borussia dortmund at the end of the season. k klopp has been manager of dortmund for seven seasons. he has won two bundesliga titles, the german cup and reached the champions league final. klopp was emotional during his farewell press conference on wednesday.
real madrid trio alvaro arbeloa, asier illarramendi and nacho gave adidas a tour of their ciudad real madrid training complex. the trio were joined by adidas presenter roman kemp for the behind-the-scenes tour. each player has their own personalised room at the club's hq. the players are allowed 24-hour access to the complex and can relax in communal suites.
some manchester city fans have seen the cost of their season tickets at the etihad stadium double. some fans will now have to pay over £1,700 for a ticket, up from £885. the club claim the change is due to upgrades at the stadium. city are currently fourth in the premier league table.
david silva was caught in the face by cheikhou kouyate's elbow during manchester city's 2-0 win over west ham. the spaniard was taken off on a stretcher and taken to hospital for treatment. he was feared to have fractured his cheekbone after being given oxygen. but tests showed no fracture and silva declared himself fit on sunday night.
montenegro v russia euro 2016 qualifier was abandoned after 67 minutes in podgorica on march 27. russia goalkeeper igor akinfeev was struck by a lit flare. uefa have awarded russia a 3-0 walkover victory. montenegro have been ordered to play their next two qualifying games behind closed doors. one of those games is suspended for two years and montenegrin fans fined £36,280.

sean reardon was pulled over for suspected drink driving in chico in california. claims he was wrestled to the floor by two police officers as he lay on the ground. video footage shows the 30-year-old being repeatedly hit with a baton or stick. reardon claims he suffered respiratory failure and broken bones and ribs after the beating. the video footage has emerged as tensions over police brutality have increased in america.

commercial diver johnny debnam was free diving four metres beneath the ocean floor off the coast of western australia when he had a peaceful encounter with a stingray. the ray nibbled at his head as he lay still on the water. mr debnam says he was completely at ease with the ray. the stingray swam over him three times before he let all his air out. he was filming a mini documentary for his production company.

barcelona won the champions league, la liga and the copa del rey in 2009. former defender eric abidal believes barcelona can win the treble this season. barcelona face bayern munich in the semi-finals of the champions league. abidal was speaking at the launch of the eric abidal foundation in barcelona.
sergio ramos opened the scoring for real madrid in the 24th-minute at the bernabeu. gareth bale went down injured after less than five minutes. luka modric and cristiano ronaldo were also substituted for carlo ancelotti's side. james rodriguez made it 2-0 before half-time. malaga pulled a goal back through juanmi in the 71st-minute. crismiano ronsaldo missed a penalty but scored a late goal to make it 3-1.
richie benaud's small private funeral was attended by close family and friends in sydney on wednesday. ex-players shane warne and ian chappell were among those in attendance at the service. benaud died last friday at the age of 84 of complications from skin cancer. australian prime minister tony abbott extended the offer of a state funeral to benaut's wife daphne.
nacer chadli opened the scoring for tottenham after 30 minutes at st james' park. jack colback equalised for newcastle but christian eriksen and harry kane scored in the second half. newcastle suffered a sixth loss on the bounce as john carver's side fell to a 10th defeat in 14 league games.
divock origi signed for liverpool for £10million last summer before being loaned back to former club lille. belgium striker has scored nine goals during his season-long loan at french side. simon mignolet has been advising his compatriot about life at the club and in liverpool. the 20-year-old striker has received messages from members of the club's management team.
inverness defender josh meekings has been banned from the scottish cup final. he was charged for an unpunished handball against celtic in the semi-final on sunday. jim boyce says the suspension of a player for a handball is wrong. inverness are appealing the one-match suspension.
greece's football federation could be suspended from international competition over government interference. the government wants to crack down on violence at sports events. a proposed new set of regulations is opposed by fifa and uefa. football's governing bodies have strict rules aimed at protecting member federations' independence.
sergio aguero scored his 20th league goal of the season to put manchester city 2-0 up against west ham at the etihad. west ham defender james collins put the home side ahead in the 18th minute with an own goal. manuel pellegrini's side have now won three of their last nine games in the premier league.
david moyes was sacked as manchester united manager exactly a year ago. louis van gaal has taken the club back into the top four after a dismal season. moyedes was in charge of a team that finished seventh in the premier league last season. united lost seven of their 19 league games at old trafford .
carlo ancelotti and diego simeone were runners-up at the ballon d'or in january. real madrid face atletico madrid in the champions league semi-final first leg on sunday. carlo reportedly told diego that life in madrid would be easier if atletico weren't around. real have struggled against atletico in recent years and were beaten 4-0 in la liga in february.
a 4wd has burst into flames in the middle of sydney airport's busy international terminal car park. the outdoor car park at the terminal was closed after authorities were alerted to the blaze just after 8am on thursday. the red 4wd was fully engulfed in flames when authorities arrived. the fire caused traffic delays throughout the international terminal due to thick smoke.
the 50-year-old man collapsed and died at his hotel in the tourist town of kuta in bali on wednesday. he was holidaying with a friend and was ordering breakfast at a rooftop restaurant. he told a waitress that he was not feeling well and then collapsed to the floor. he could not be revived and a doctor at the scene said it was likely he died of a heart attack. it's believed that the man is from seymour in victoria and was from seymour.
baggage pushers are used at airports all over the world to separate luggage. the video shows a mechanical arm thrusting luggage onto a different conveyor belt. it is not known where the video was taken, but believed to be at an airport. the machine is used to separate bags on the conveyor belts at airports.
tegan peters, 22, from auckland new zealand found a tennis ball deliberately covered in sharp pins in ti rakau park, south of auckland. she was ‘shocked’ and ‘disgusted’ to find a ball that she thinks was purpose designed to harm animals or children. there were 20 needles in the tennis ball. ms peters shared it with animal welfare pages in the area to alert people of the 'dangerous' ball. she walks her dog odin in the same park she made the discovery.
michael j from michigan filmed his 11-month-old daughter leighton in floods of tears before she was handed a french fry to lure over the family pup, zayla. she's then handed another fry - but this time she breaks it in half to make it last longer.
insurers are increasingly checking people's social media accounts following a break-in to see if they are away. holidaymakers who announce they are going on holiday online could find insurer refusing to pay out. most firms include'reasonable care' clause in contracts and are now using against people who advertise breaks online.

paul warren smith, 61, was identified as the man in a white marshall independent school district van seen in surveillance video tossing five puppies over a six-foot fence at the humane society of harrison county's the pet place in marshall, texas. all five puppies are healthy and uninjured. smith was taken into custody monday morning and charged with cruelty to animals.

adam federici's error in extra time cost reading the fa cup semi-final against arsenal. alexis sanchez's shot squirmed through his legs and over the line in the 106th minute of the game. reading keeper federici left the field in tears and was inconsolable after the error. reading goalkeeper federici had been in superb form to keep the game level at 1-1 in the first half of extra time.

newcastle united fans refused to enter st james' park in protest at owner mike ashley's running of the club. protest group ashleyout.com had urged fans to boycott the game against spurs. sunderland fans rented a plane and banner to fly over the stadium to boast about their derby wins.
manchester city face west ham at the etihad stadium on sunday. winston reid says west ham no longer suffer from a fear of facing manchester city. city had won their last five games against west ham - by an aggregate score of 14-1 - before suffering only their second league defeat of the season at upton park in october. reid signed a new six-year deal with west ham this year.
real madrid manager carlo ancelotti will remain in charge at the santiago bernabeu next season. barcelona, real, atletico madrid and valencia all play within six hours of each other in la liga on saturday. massimiliano allegri tells juventus players to 'get rid of the ghosts'   luis enrique has called on the home supporters to make the camp nou 'tremble' ahead of malaga match.
rafa benitez was made chelsea interim manager in 2012 but the fans never warmed to him. he was given a frosty reception at stamford bridge. rafa is set to leave napoli this summer and could return to the premier league. he knows english football inside out and would be perfect for several clubs.
yaya toure's agent dimitri seluk has called manchester city boss manuel pellegrini a 'weak manager'    seluks has criticised the club's chief executive ferran soriano and director of football txiki begiristain. he said it was wrong to criticise toure and blamed the manager and executives.
chelsea beat manchester united 1-0 at stamford bridge in the premier league on saturday. jose mourinho's side held the ball for just 29 per cent of the match.    the blues extended their lead at the top of the table to 10 points after the win.
real madrid have been linked with a summer move for stoke keeper asmir begovic. mark hughes has played down reports of begovic leaving the club. begovic is out of contract at stoke and is expected to sign a new deal. stoke host southampton at home on saturday in the premier league.
luis suarez scored his second goal of the game after 67 minutes to make it 3-0 to barcelona. the uruguayan scored a stunning goal to put the game beyond paris saint-germain. neymar opened the scoring for barcelona in the 18th minute with a brilliant strike. suarez added a second goal for the catalans in the 67th minute to make the score 3-1 to the visitors. paris st-germa scored a late consolation goal through salvatore sirigu but it was not enough to progress.
barcelona president josep maria bartomeu says the club are'very happy' with luis enrique. barcelona manager only took charge at the club last summer and has impressed. enrique has no plans to be replaced in the summer. barca beat valencia 2-0 at the nou camp on saturday.
cristiano ronaldo scored his 300th goal for real madrid against rayo vallecano on april 8. the portuguese striker only needed 288 games to reach the landmark figure for the club. real mad madrid club president florentino perez presented ronaldo with a special shirt. french striker karim benzema will miss real's clash against malaga on saturday with a knee injury.
lionel messi has a place at barcelona until 'he decides to retire', claims club president josep maria bartomeu. the argentine forward was linked with a move away from the club earlier this year. messi scored his 400th goal for barcelona against valencia on saturday.
monaco vice-president vadim vasilyev claims manchester united bosses have yet to decide whether to sign radamel falcao on a permanent deal. colombia striker joined united on a one-year loan deal in september but has failed to shine at old trafford.    united are keeping their options open and have the opportunity to talk to the striker at the end of the season.
monaco host juventus at the stade louis ii in champions league quarter-finals on wednesday. leonardo jardim insists he is proud after his side reached the last eight without big investment. monaco are bidding to overturn a 1-0 deficit after losing to juventus in the first leg in turin.
manny pacquiao's conference call about his fight with floyd mayweather jnr was cancelled due to technical difficulties. the filipino could only answer one question due to the cancellation. a spokesman blamed the cancellation on the large number of boxing writers and broadcasters on the call. mayweather is due to have his own conference call on wednesday.
jordan henderson is set to sign a new long-term contract at liverpool. the midfielder's new deal is worth around £100,000-a-week and will run until the summer of 2020. liverpool vice-captain had 14 months remaining on his current contract. he could replace steven gerrard as liverpool captain when he leaves this summer.
rafa benitez tried to sign andre schurrle before he joined wolfsburg in january. the former chelsea boss won the europa league as blues boss in 2013. napoli travel to wolfsburg for the quarter-final of the competition in wolfsburg on thursday.   napoli manager also admitted to trying to sign ivan perisic and luiz gustavo.
luis suarez has scored 19 goals in all competitions for barcelona since joining the club this season. brazilian ace neymar kneeed the uruguayan striker where it hurts during a barcelona training session. earlier this week, suarez admitted he was nervous at the prospect of playing alongside neymar at barcelona.
werder bremen beat bottom club hamburg sv 1-0 in the northern derby. franco di santo scored an 84th-minute penalty to keep their europa league hopes alive. hamburg are bottom of the bundesliga on 25 points with five games to play. new coach bruno labbadia has been tasked with saving hamburg's record.
arsenal manager arsene wenger accepted his side were 'a bit lucky' to beat reading 2-1 in the fa cup semi-final. alexis sanchez scored the winning goal in extra time after adam federici's error. federici let the ball roll through his legs and over the line in the 106th minute of extra time. reading goalkeeper federici was distraught after the goal.
divock origi was voted the second most overrated player in ligue 1 in a poll by france football. the 19-year-old joined liverpool after the world cup but was loaned back to lille this season. simon mignolet has backed belgian striker to be a success at liverpool next season.
jose mourinho has the best clean sheets percentage record in premier league history. the chelsea boss has kept 101 clean sheets from 189 premier league matches. mourino also heads the list of managers with the lowest average of goals conceded per game. sir alex ferguson and arsene wenger also have impressive defensive records.
the 38-year-old boxer has shared a 15-second video on his instagram account showing off his extravagant lifestyle. video shows off diamond-encrusted watches, fleet of super-cars and carpets of cash. video was shot by director james 'jp' dayap, a member of mayweather's money team brand. five-division champion hits back at his supposed 'haters' ahead of bout with manny pacquiao next month.
atletico madrid are in talks to sign palermo's paulo dybala, according to reports in spain. porto coach julen lopetegui is linked with the real madrid job. real boss carlo ancelotti has upset isco by telling him to be more defensive. barcelona are favourites to win the champions league.
manchester city have 'let themselves down' this season, says premier league champions goalkeeper joe hart. manuel pellegrini's side are currently fourth in the league, 12 points behind chelsea. hart and team-mates have had 'honest conversations' since 4-2 defeat at manchester united.
anderson silva will meet with brazilian taekwondo officials in the hope of competing in next year's olympics. mixed martial arts fighter is currently suspended by ufc after failing drug tests. the 40-year-old is currently facing a possible doping ban. silva has expressed his desire to represent brazil in the 2016 games.
ap mccoy rode don cossack to victory in the melling chase race at aintree on friday. irishman gordon elliott trains cause of causes and is preparing for his final grand national on saturday. eastlake was pulled up in the topham chase.
juventus have made a move for paulo dybala, according to reports in italy. manchester united and arsenal have also been linked with the palermo striker. real madrid beat rayo vallecano 2-0 while barcelona beat almeria 4-0 in la liga. cristiano ronaldo scored his 300th goal for the club on wednesday.
andy flower is now technical director of elite coaching at the ecb. former england team director is now running the england cricket academy at loughborough. kevin pietersen is back playing cricket for surrey. andrew strauss is a front-runner to become director of england cricket. sepp blatter's smooth procession to a fifth term continues.
bayern munich doctor hans-wilhelm muller-wohlfahrt has served the club for almost 40 years. the 72-year-old is renowned as a world leader in his field and has been at bayern for years. he has quit in the fall-out of their shock champions league defeat by porto . his son kilian, peter ueblacker and lutz hansel have also resigned from the german champions. pep guardiola said 'the bond of trust is damaged' after the 3-1 first-leg defeat in porto.
ander herrera has played down comparisons with paul scholes. the manchester united midfielder said 'there will never be another'    scholes scored 107 goals in 499 games for united. herrera's favourite goal for united came against yeovil in the fa cup third round.
eugene in the united states has been awarded the rights to host the 2021 iaaf world championships. the decision was taken by the international association of athletics federations council. eugene failed in its bid to host the 2019 event and was instead awarded to doha.
jessica ennis-hill will compete against katarina johnson-thompson at the great city games in manchester in may. the heptathlete will return to the track nine months after the birth of her son reggie. the 29-year-old admits juggling motherhood with her olympic aspirations poses a big challenge.  ennis-hill has struggled to balance the demands of being a mother with returning to fitness.
liverpool are making a rival push for manchester united target memphis depay. liverpool hope to convince 21-year-old depay that he would get more regular football with them. psv eindhoven value depay at £25million and have made enquiries for the holland international. ed van steijn believes depay could one day rival cristiano ronaldo.
tatyana chernova failed a drugs test two years before beating jessica ennis-hill at the world championships in 2011. the russian champion was banned but allowed to keep her world title. ennis hill has written to the iaaf to ask to be rewarded with world championship gold from 2011. she believes it is unfair that chernovova was banned and kept her title.
mario mandzukic is still bruised from champions league quarter-final first leg clash with real madrid. croatian striker suffered a cut to the top of the nose from an elbow by sergio ramos. but manager diego simeone says he should be fit for the second leg on wednesday. atletico madrid drew 0-0 at the calderon in the bernabeu.
real madrid face city rivals atletico madrid in the second leg of their champions league quarter-final on wednesday night. carlo ancelotti is adamant his side can cope without injured trio luka modric, gareth bale and karim benzema. real boss could start isco, jese and javier hernandez in the absence of the trio. the italian manager has hailed his players as the best in the world.
real madrid face rivals atletico madrid in the champions league quarter-final second leg on wednesday. carlo ancelotti's side drew 0-0 at home in the first leg of the tie last week. dani carvajal, isco, sergio ramos and nacho looked in high spirits during training. karim benzema will miss the clash through injury.
traveller alex elenes went on a trip to see the amazon rainforest with his cousin roxy de la rosa. but he missed the whole thing as he slept through the entire trip. he even missed a trip piranha fishing and a pink dolphin watching tour. the trip cost upwards of £1,000 ($1,600) and he missed out on the jungle trek.
jessica carey had her husband aaron carey tattoo a childhood portrait of her grandmother patty lawing on her forearm. she drove three hours to see her grandmother and surprised her with the tattoo. patty's reaction to the tattoo was captured on film by a relative. she was overcome with emotion at the tattoo and shouted 'oh my god'
adam johnson was charged with three counts of sexual activity with an underage girl and one of grooming. johnson scored seven goals in seven games for sunderland last season. he was considered a prospect for roy hodgson as recently as a year ago. the manchester city winger has scored five goals from 31 appearances this season.
aston villa could sign cordoba striker florin andone for as little as £2.5million. the romanian has scored six goals in 17 games for the struggling spanish side this season. cordoba are poised to be relegated and need to raise funds.
shaheen pirouz from denton, texas, filmed her tiny pet canine being propped up and repeatedly falling forwards. footage shows him being positioned on his back legs, with his eyes immediately starting to close. he was filmed by a friend of the filmer.
match was organised to help motor neurone disease campaigner gordon aikman in his fight against the terminal condition. labour's football-mad scottish leader jim murphy scored the winning goal in the friendly match against the tories in edinburgh. labour leader ed miliband said the shoot-out was 'not the first time conservatives have been put on the spot'
ronald koeman spoke to victor wanyama to refocus his players on european qualification. southampton face former boss mauricio pochettino at tottenham on saturday. koeman says his players must remain focused on the last five league games. there has been speculation about the futures of wanyamas and nathaniel clyne.
inverness defender josh meekings has been cleared to play in the scottish cup final. sfa panel dismissed a charge of deliberate handball against celtic in the semi-final. the defender was not sent off and no penalty was given for the incident. the charge was dismissed by a three-man judicial panel.
manchester city accused of trying to relocate disabled fans by hiking up season ticket prices by 283 per cent. premier league champions have increased prices of some season tickets by £345 to £975. some disabled fans claim club are trying to force migration to other parts of the stadium. club have increased season tickets for able-bodied fans from £870 to £1,700.
blackpool fan frank knight was sued by the oyston family for alleged defamatory comments on his facebook page. fans have raised close to £15,000 for the pensioner in under three days. knight settled before court proceedings with the owners of the club. a fellow blackpool fan has also started a fundraising page for knight.
juventus beat lazio 2-0 to move 15 points clear at the top of serie a. carlos tevez scored the opening goal and celebrated by dancing like a chicken. lionel messi scored a late winner for barcelona against valencia in la liga. paris saint-germain went top of ligue 1 after beating nice 3-1.
daniel sturridge met up with comedian darren farley ahead of liverpool's fa cup semi-final against aston villa. the reds face villa at wembley on sunday. daniel was left in stitches by farley's impression of michael owen as part of a promotional video for bt sport. the striker is a major doubt to feature in the game.
cristiano ronaldo has scored eight goals in the champions league this season. lionel messi also has eight, but luiz adriano has scored nine in europe. real madrid and barcelona have reached the semi-finals of the competition.
kurt zouma was deployed in a defensive midfield role for chelsea against manchester united. jose mourinho asked the 20-year-old to stop marouane fellaini from continuing his good form. mour mourinho's side won 1-0 at stamford bridge in the premier league. the former saint-etienne man was man-marked by manchester's star man.
zinedine zidane says eden hazard excites him more than cristiano ronaldo and lionel messi. hazard has signed a new five-year deal at stamford bridge. the real madrid reserve boss has revealed his admiration for the belgian.
manchester united missed out on the champions league last season for the first time in 19 years. but six players from old trafford are in the final four of the competition. patrice evra, javier hernandez, cristiano ronaldo, carlos tevez, paul pogba and gerard pique are all in the semi-finals.    united's david moyes left the club at the end of the season and is currently on loan at real madrid.
chelsea midfielder oscar hopes that winning the premier league title can kick-start a period of dominance in england. jose mourinho's side are 10 points clear of second-placed arsenal at the top of the league. arsenal have won eight matches in a row in the league and travel to chelsea on sunday.
on friday it will be 100 years since 50,000 gathered at old trafford for the fa cup final. it was the last football match to be played in england for four years. many soldiers were already wounded from war or in uniform for training. the match was christened the khaki cup final by the national football museum. sheffield united beat chelsea 3-0 in the final at the home of manchester united.
qatar have unveiled the design for their fifth world cup stadium, the al rayyan stadium. the 40,000-seater ground is inspired by sand dunes and will be built in 'the gateway to the desert'   the stadium is expected to host matches up to the quarter-final stage of the 2022 tournament in 2022.
john hughes was ready to walk away from his post at inverness after josh meekings was cleared to play in the scottish cup final. the caley thistle boss was sick of the controversy surrounding the defender. hughes set off on a bike ride after learning of the incident. only messages of support from footballing friends brought him back from the brink of quitting.
jockey blake shinn rode his pants off in the opening race of a meeting in sydney. he was forced to ride more than 200 metres to the finish line with his pants down. acting chief steward greg rudolph said he had never seen anything like it in his time in racing.
jordan henderson has signed a new five-year contract with liverpool until 2020. the midfielder could be handed the captain's armband when steven gerrard leaves at the end of the season. he was nearly leaving liverpool in summer of 2012. brendan rodgers hopes other liverpool players will follow his lead and sign new deals. heanderson arrived from sunderland in a £16million deal in 2011.
mila kunis is to counter-sue the woman who is suing her for stealing her chicken 25 years ago. kristina karo claims she was a seven-year-old friend of mila's and accused her of the crime. the actress and her fiance ashton kutcher posted a tongue-in-cheek video claiming she will file a lawsuit for watching her music video . kun is currently being sued for $5,000 by a woman claiming to be her former childhood friend. the woman claims she suffered emotional trauma when a seven year-old mila stole her pet chicken.
terri hernandez is opening up about the bond she shared with ursula lloyd during her son's murder trial. terri says she grew close to the mother of odin lloyd over the course of the trial and even thought about her after the verdict. odin was convicted of first degree murder and sentenced to life in prison without the possibility of parole .
the video was filmed in moon park, odessa, ukraine, and has gone viral on social media. film-makers hide in the bushes while the 'vampire girl' pranks late-night walkers. some of the victims have been tracked down after the video went viral.
san bernardino county has approved a $650,000 settlement to avoid a lawsuit from 30-year-old francis pusok after his beating by deputies after a horse chase was captured on video. pusok's arrest was recorded by a tv news helicopter and led to an fbi civil rights investigation and 10 deputies being placed on leave pending an internal probe.
jonathan pitre was born with epidermolysis bullosa - or 'butterfly skin' - and has a life expectancy of 25. one in every 17,000 people suffer from the genetic condition. he is covered with deep blistering wounds that will never heal. he can even feel pain when he is asleep but is trying to 'live in the moment'   he has turned his focus to sportscasting and has appeared as a sportscaster on tv shows.
the footage captured at spring garden station in philadelphia on tuesday shows the group of youngsters viciously attacking the victims. they then pull them to the ground, punch them and repeatedly stamp on their heads. the brawl, involving students from benjamin franklin high school, spilled onto the tracks.
the 20,000 square foot mansion serves as the backdrop to the hit show empire. it took five years to build the house, which sits by two lakes in eight acres of manicured gardens. the five bedroom, nine bathroom mansion is listed at $13 million, having failed to find a buyer. it is in the ritzy suburb of barrington.
california-based youtube user lionel hutz filmed his young son chasing the family feline around the garden in a bid to get some rest. footage shows the cat licking his fur before his human friend plonks himself on top. the cat immediately gets up and scurries to another spot.
authorities were called to an industrial site in wetherill park, west of sydney, shortly after 11am on thursday. police found three men trapped inside a shipping container after timber fell on top of them. two men died at the scene and the surviving man was taken to fairfield hospital in a serious condition.
four people wrapped the pup in a blanket and left in a car around 3:20 a.m. from dockweiler state beach. marine animal rescue managed to save another young sea lion shortly after the animal escaped several people said to be harassing it. though small pups are cute they can be very dangerous.
bayern munich manager pep guardiola split his pants during 6-1 victory over porto. he was wearing a tight-fitting grey suit by russell brand. other stars guilty of wearing a suit that is a little on the snug side include dermot o'leary and olly murs.
a little girl named anya brodie asked michelle obama her age during a question and answer session at the white house for their annual take our daughter's and son's to work day. when obama told her she was 51-years-old the little girl yelled in amazement, 'you look too young'   michelle obama was so flattered by the compliment that she called her up on stage to give her a big hug.
tottenham forward harry kane wants to play for england at the european u21 championships. fa chairman greg dyke has revealed that kane has told england he wants to do so. tottenham boss mauricio pochettino would like kane to be rested at the end of his breakthrough season. kane is in superb form this season, scoring 30 goals for the club.
liverpool manager brendan rodgers has backed himself to improve the club next season. liverpool lost to aston villa in the fa cup semi-final at wembley last weekend. rodgers insists he is the right man to lead liverpool next season . adam lallana was back in training as liverpool prepare to take on west brom on saturday.
ronald koeman has praised the 'great job' of his predecessor mauricio pochettino at st mary's. the southampton boss is preparing for a'special' match against tottenham hotspur on saturday. koeman managed at the club between 2013 and 2014 before leaving for spurs. the saints boss says the game at white hart lane will be 'decided between the white lines'
spartak moscow were fined £2,500 after their supporters allegedly displayed a racist banner. spartak fans were banned from attending the club's next two away games. the club appealed against the sanctions but the appeal was rejected by the russian football union.
truck driver rear-ended by huge armoured vehicle in rush hour accident in china. pictures and videos of the dramatic collision have gone viral on chinese internet. it is being dubbed the 'craziest rear-end collision in the country'   it's unclear if this is a military tank but people inside the vehicle were wearing camouflage uniforms.
'first of its kind' equipment will be able to detect activity at a distance using a series of sensors. decision comes after israeli army considered more than 700 proposals to combat tunnel threat. it is thought the system will cost around £2.3million ($3.5m) per mile to install.
marouane fellaini has praised steven gerrard as the best passer he has played against at manchester united. the belgian was speaking in an official club interview for manutd. phil jagielka is the toughest tackler he has faced since leaving everton. wayne rooney is the best finisher he has shared a dressing-room with at united.
tottenham defender kyle walker injured his foot against burnley earlier this month. scans showed walker had not broken his foot but he faces another four weeks out. walker sustained the injury after a heavy collision with kieran trippier. the england international faces another month out of action.
jordon ibe is poised to sign a new five-year contract with liverpool by the end of the week. the 19-year-old spent the first half of this season on loan at derby county. ibe has impressed since returning to liverpool this season. he will sign the new deal which will keep him at anfield until 2020.
brendan rodgers is under pressure at liverpool after a third straight season without a trophy. jamie carragher has backed rodgers to stay at anfield after collecting a beacon award for his community work on merseyside. liverpool finished outside the top four and are seven points behind manchester city.
jack grealish is the third premier league starlet caught on camera apparently inhaling nitrous oxide. the 19-year-old starred for aston villa in their fa cup semi-final win over liverpool on sunday. the midfielder has been photographed inhaling from a balloon believed to be filled with laughing gas. grealishes is ready to commit his international future to england.
girl was walking home from music school when she was attacked by the lion in siberian village of namtsy. circus entertainers were walking the animal around using a makeshift leash. the nine-year-old girl is in hospital after she was savaged by the animal. the circus is believed to have abruptly left the village after the attack.
ciro immobile of dortmund has struggled in germany and is wanted by liverpool. manchester united and man city are also interested in the italy striker. spartak moscow want to rescue nemanja vidic from his nightmare spell at inter milan. alex mccarthy could be a target for man city after impressing at qpr.
andrea dossena was arrested on suspicion of shoplifting at harrods in knightsbridge on april 7. the 33-year-old defender will face no further action after being released by police. he was accused of stealing items from the knightsbridge store. the italian is now with league one strugglers leyton orient. liverpool paid £7million for the defender in 2008.
julian weigl has a buy-out clause of £2.5million for 1860 munich midfielder. the 19-year-old is attracting interest from several european clubs. juventus and borussia dortmund are also said to be interested in the germany starlet. tottenham are chasing the midfielder .
paris saint-germain owner nasser al-khelaifi has ruled out selling edinson cavani this summer. manchester united are considering a bid for the uruguayan striker. radamel falcao and robin van persie could both leave old trafford. cavani scored twice in the french league cup final against bastia.
nike's new kits for the us women's national team do not represent the american flag. nike's vice president charlie brooks has been forced to defend the decision. he says 'not every team pays homage to the flag'   the new designs will be worn at this summer's world cup and are a tribute to canada.
sir alex ferguson has spent his retirement devoting himself to a number of causes. the former manchester united boss has no 'obsessions' now. the 73-year-old says his life has slowed down since leaving the club in 2013. but he is still doing a lot of work for charities and foundations.
ronald koeman held a meeting with southampton's players to refocus their minds on european qualification. victor wanyama's future came under question after an interview where he seemed to hint at a move to arsenal. morgan schneiderlin, nathaniel clyne and jay rodriguez have been linked with a move away. koeman spoke to all of his players to focus on the last five premier league games. southampton face mauricio pochettino at home on saturday.
teresa bullock captured the two-minute clip at her house in ohio on the birthday of her 18-year-old macaque monkey named angel. the video shows the monkey sitting up on a sink having its eyebrows plucked with tweezers. owner then applies moisturising cream, eye-liner, mascara and red lipstick. the clip has been met with some concern from people who think it is cruel and cute.
paul doyle, 56, moved his family into an £820,000 home in altrincham, cheshire, despite having never worked. put down £200,000 deposit and obtained a £600,000 mortgage on the property. falsely claimed his wife jeanette, 49, worked as a company executive. he was jailed for 16 years after being unmasked as the head of drugs ring. doyle admitted supplying class a and b drugs, money laundering and benefit fraud offences.
rules over use of video evidence to retrospectively ban players changed after gary deegan's challenge on gary irvine. pfa scotland chief executive fraser wishart believes the rules have gone too far. inverness defender josh meekings was cleared to play in the scottish cup semi-final.
qpr manager chris ramsey is convinced he is the right man to bring long-term success to loftus road. sam allardyce and eddie howe have been linked with ramsey's job in the summer. rangers are two points adrift of safety in the scottish premier league.
celtic lost 3-2 to inverness in the scottish cup semi-final at hampden on sunday. josh meekings handled leigh griffiths' goal-bound header but none of the officials saw it. celtic centre backvirgil van dijk believes it was the worst refereeing decision of his career. the dutchman was sent off against inter milan in the champions league.
john carver and jonas gutierrez were involved in a training-ground bust-up last week. gutierrez was left out of the squad for newcastle united's defeat by spurs. carver says that he and gutierrez have shaken hands 'like two grown men' and moved on from the incident. newcastle travel to swansea on saturday in the premier league.
chris ramsey insists he's happy at queens park rangers and will stay at the club for as long as they want him. the 52-year-old was handed the manager's job until the end of the season. director of football les ferdinand wants ramsey to get the job on a permanent basis. ramsey could link up with friend tim sherwood at aston villa in the summer.
ferrari's kimi raikkonen finished first in friday's practice session for the bahrain grand prix. jenson button stalled his car during the practice session. lewis hamilton and nico rosberg finished 16th and 23rd respectively.
manny pacquiao says he has to be a warrior against floyd mayweather at the mgm grand on may 2. the $300m mega-fight in las vegas is billed as the biggest sporting event in history. the filipino says he will have to fight like it is the last fight of his life to beat the undefeated american.
trucker lets rip after a car towing a caravan moves into his lane and the two vehicles collide on the m6 near birmingham. footage was shot from a dashboard camera and shows the van driver abusing the car driver. the car was blocked in the slip road after the accident, blocking the road. the trucker was filmed swearing at the driver after the crash on sunday.
jonny may was dropped by england for the last three rounds of the rbs 6 nations. gloucester beat exeter 30-19 in the challenge cup final. may hopes to boost his world cup selection chances with victory in next month's final. the cherry and whites face edinburgh at twickenham.
justin rose was joint runner-up at the masters and pushed jordan speith all the way. the englishman is back training on his state-of-the-art indoor golf simulator. rose was pictured using his £30,000 simulator ahead of his next pga tour event.
belardo is more likely to head to the french 2,000 guineas rather than the british equivalent at newmarket. roger varian insists he has not lost faith in the 2014 dewhurst stakes winner. belardo beat only one home in saturday's greenham stakes.
ap mccoy finished fifth in the grand national, but will not ride in the coral scottish national at ayr. benvolio has withdrawn from the race. the 20-time champion will retire next week, but had been hoping for a final national success.
nico rosberg finished ahead of lewis hamilton in second practice for bahrain grand prix. hamilton was slower in sectors one and two of fp2 but a mistake from his team-mate gifted him first place. sebastian vettel finished fourth, with kimi raikkonen in third and jenson button 16th.
aaron cruden has ruptured the anterior cruciate ligament in his left knee. fly-half will be out for six months. cruden is almost certain to miss the world cup after undergoing knee surgery. new zealand coach steve hansen says cruden will be a loss to the all blacks.
frankie dettori made it six winners in four days after riding three flying dismounts at newbury on saturday. the italian jockey has nine winners from 29 rides so far this season. he has won the aon greenham stakes and the be wiser insurance spring cup.
saracens director of rugby mark mccall has no intention of overspending in the post-world cup transfer market. saracens lost 13-9 to clermont in the european final on saturday. the club contained five england-qualified forwards in the starting pack.
mohammad hafeez was banned from bowling after being reported for a suspect action five months ago. the pakistan all-rounder missed out on the world cup in australia and new zealand . the 34-year-old then injured his calf and missed the one-day internationals. but the off-spinner is free to resume bowling after remedial work and a re-test on his action.
alastair cook needs something different to draw on in his same-same pace bowling attack . leg-spinner adil rashid could offer what is needed but by all accounts he hasn't been bowling well enough. mark wood seems to have a different trajectory which should suit overseas pitches. ben stokes was the pick of the bowlers on day one in antigua.
steven finn was overlooked for the west indies tour. finn believes he's rediscovered his best form and is ready to push for an england place. he admits he's 'had his trials and tribulations over the last 12 months'   finn says he's been watching footage of when he was on the top of his form.
ben stokes was at the centre of everything on the first day of the second test at the grenada national stadium. the durham all-rounder injured himself before coming on to bowl. devon smith was caught behind after missing the ball. james anderson took two wickets for england in the first session of play.
sir bradley wiggins will ride for his eponymous team at the inaugural tour de yorkshire next month. the four-time olympic champion left team sky after paris-roubaix on april 12. wiggins was not selected in team sky's 2014 squad for the race.
west indies openers devon smith and kraigg brathwaite both fall in rain-shortened first session of second test. chris jordan takes first wicket of the day as smith is caught behind. hosts go to lunch at 36 for two after choosing to bowl first in grenada. play was delayed by an hour and 45 minutes.
graeme dott fears exhaustion will kill off his hopes of winning the world championship. the 37-year-old beat ricky walden 10-8 in the first round at the crucible in sheffield. john higgins impressed with a 10-5 victory over robert milkins in his first-round clash.
kyrie irving scored 30 points in his playoff debut as cleveland cavaliers beat boston celtics 113-100. lebron james added 20 points as the cavs took a 1-0 lead in their best-of-seven series. los angeles clippers' point guard chris paul scored 32 points as they beat san antonio spurs 102-97. kyle korver scored 21 points as atlanta hawks defeated brooklyn nets 99-92 in their eastern conference playoff series. memphis grizzlies beat portland trail blazers 100-86 in game 1 of their series.
graziano pelle scored his first premier league goal since december to seal victory for southampton at st mary's. james ward-prowse came on at half-time to score a penalty for the home side. hull city manager steve bruce was furious with alex bruce for a clash with pelle.
james morrison headed west brom ahead after two minutes against crystal palace at selhurst park on saturday afternoon. crystal palace boss alan pardew was returning to his former club for the first time since leaving crystal palace in the summer. craig gardner scored a fine long range effort to make it 2-0 for the away side.
tonny vilhena wants to quit feyenoord this summer. ronald koeman made enquiries for the 20-year-old in january. southampton boss koeman is keen to bring him to st mary's. the saints are also monitoring his team-mate jordy clasie.
everton defender leighton baines is friends with rocker miles kane and arctic monkeys' front-man alex turner. the england international is a big music lover and regularly plays the guitar. but he admits he doesn't know any of one direction's hit songs. mark ronson and bruno mars' uptown funk is regularly played in everton's dressing room. ed sheeran, meghan trainor and avicii also feature in match of the day magazine interview.
franco di santo has scored 13 goals in 22 games for werder bremen this season. the argentine striker previously played for chelsea but struggled to make an impact at stamford bridge. sunderland want £8million for the 26-year-old and are considering a summer move for him. he played for wigan for three seasons before being released.
morgan schneiderlin gave champions league chasing southampton the lead at the britannia stadium. mame biram diouf equalised for ronald koeman's side in the second half. but charlie adam scored a late winner as stoke city came from behind to earn all three points at home to southampton.
jack grealish is wanted by the republic of ireland and england. the 19-year-old must choose between the two at the end of the season. tim sherwood wants him to focus on his aston villa career rather than his international future. sherwood has been impressed with grealishes performance against liverpool.
walter smith spent two spells in charge as manager of rangers and has praised stuart mccall's impact at ibrox. but smith maintains ally mccoist was given little chance of succeeding at the club. smith insists the club was too badly run to be a success at rangers.   smith attended a golf day to raise money for testicular cancer awareness.
brendan rodgers was convicted of leaving a property in accrington, lancashire, to rot. he and co-owner judith o'hagan were ordered to fix the windows, doors and roof. but rodgers did not receive a summons and was found guilty at blackburn magistrates' court. but he had his conviction overturned because he did not get a summons. the anfield manager was fined for leaving the £69,950 terrace house to rot .
andres iniesta set up neymar for the opening goal in barcelona's 2-0 champions league win over paris saint-germain. the world cup winner is yet to score or create a goal for barcelona this season. iniesta admits he has been unhappy with his form for the catalan giants. barcelona face espanyol at the camp nou on saturday.
west brom beat crystal palace 2-0 in the premier league on saturday. tony pulis led his side to a win over his former club at the weekend. james morrison and craig gardner scored the goals for west brom. pulis said he will never change his touchline attire and insists on wearing his cap.
per mertesacker limped off in arsenal's fa cup semi-final win over reading on saturday with ankle injury. german defender will miss premier league derby against chelsea on sunday due to ankle injury . scans showed merteacker had a minor ankle sprain but no serious ligament damage.
clayton donaldson scored a late headed winner for birmingham city as they defeated reading 1-0 in the sky bet championship. reading lost their second game in as many matches after losing to arsenal in fa cup semi-final. reading keeper adam federici was retained for the match after his blunder at wembley on saturday.
gary gardner will report to aston villa for pre-season training to be assessed by tim sherwood. gardner has been on loan at nottingham forest this season. the 22-year-old scored a stunning free-kick against watford. sherwood is keen to see gardner train day-to-day before making a decision.
shay given will keep his place in aston villa's side for the fa cup final at wembley against arsenal. brad guzan lost out to given for the semi-final victory against liverpool. tim sherwood is under pressure for the no 1 jersey in the premier league.
blackpool fans pelted the directors' box and main reception area at bloomfield road with eggs before their game with reading. the seasiders were relegated to the third tier after being relegated to league one. blackpool drew 1-1 with rotherham on tuesday night. chairman karl oyston was the target of the protest.
real madrid forward cristiano ronaldo ended his playing career in 2011. the 38-year-old now co-owns fort lauderdale strikers, a north american league side. brazil legend ron ronaldo says he would relish playing alongside his namesake. but he admits a return to top level football is past him.
joe lewis wore an autographed shirt in last week's championship match with reading. blackpool goalkeeper had to wear the shirt because the club had no spares. the signed shirt was meant to be put aside for a club sponsor but blackpool have no kitman. the tangerines were relegated from the championship last week.
richard stearman scored an own goal for ipswich in the 21st minute to hand the hosts the lead at molineux. wolves striker benik afobe scored an equaliser after 50 minutes to keep wolves in the championship play-off hunt. tommy smith's header was deflected in by    for the opening goal of the game.
lee clark admitted blackpool face a challenge to win back their stay-away fans after relegation. blackpool drew 1-1 with reading at bloomfield road in sky bet league one. fans pelted eggs at the directors' boxes windows before the game. grant hall scored an own goal after half-time to earn the royals a point.
micky adams became the 42nd manager to be dismissed this season when he was fired by tranmere on sunday. forty managers have been sacked in the football league this season. the previous record of 46 was set in 2006-07. arsene wenger is the longest serving manager in the premier league at 18 years.
barcelona midfielder andres iniesta suffered a bruised pelvis in the champions league win against psg. iniesta was substituted eight minutes into the second half after a clash with javier pastore. tests confirmed he suffered heavy bruising in the sacroiliac joint. barca midfielder could miss saturday's la liga game at home to valencia.
british transport police chief constable paul crowther warns of 'casual thuggery' on trains on a weekly basis. btp has recorded 630 football-related incidents so far this season. police believe the scale of the problem may be higher than figures show. a summit has been organised to determine scale of problem.
massimo luongo was player of the tournament during australia's successful asian cup in january.tim sherwood wants to make swindon town midfielder one of his first summer signings at aston villa. the 22-year-old is currently on loan at the county ground from spurs.
kevin pietersen was taken off the field as a precaution after being hit on the hand while fielding for surrey against oxford university. the former england batsman was fielding close-in during the second innings of oxford mccu's match. the batsman is fine but was advised to miss the final session of the match. he was injured while fielding in the field while playing for oxford against surrey. pieterson is hoping to win back his test place with a return to red ball cricket.
aston villa manager tim sherwood revealed his 'win bonus' to the assembled media on friday. sherwood replied to a letter from six-year-old fan charlie pye. pye wanted a chocolate bar as a win bonus for paul lambert's sacking.   pye applied for the role when paul was sacked but was pipped to the post by sherwood.
raheem sterling opened the scoring for liverpool in the first half at anfield. newcastle united's newcastle striker mousa sissoko was sent off in the 71st minute for a second bookable offence. john alberto alberto allen scored a late consolation goal for newcastle at the end of the game.
giorgio chiellini committed a deliberate handball in the first minute of juventus' champions league quarter-final second-leg against monaco on wednesday. the italy international was shown a yellow card after slipping on the turf . the 30-year-old centre-half committed the foul after slipping during the game at the stade louis ii. juve progressed to the champions league's last four on aggregate after a 0-0 draw.
gareth bale has come under fire from fans in his second season at real madrid. the welshman has been linked with a return to the premier league. former wales manager mark hughes has urged bale to stay at the bernabeu. hughes regrets only spending a single season at barcelona in 1988.
jamie carragher does not feel diego simeone plays the type of football which would attract arsenal, manchester united or city. sportsmail's columnist insists the style of play atletico madrid showed against real madrid would not impress the premier league giants. atletico were beaten 1-0 at the bernabeu in the champions league.
daniel sturridge failed to train again for liverpool's fa cup semi-final with aston villa on thursday. the england striker faces a fight to be fit for sunday's game at wembley. steven gerrard could return after serving a three-match suspension. sturridges missed monday's win over newcastle with tightness in his hip.
richard eckersley is currently training with la liga side elche. the former manchester united and burnley full-back is a free agent. the 26-year-old began his career at old trafford but made only two premier league appearances for united. he spent time on loan at toronto fc and new york red bulls.
the 214th derby della madonnina was a goalless first half at the san siro. both sides struggled to create any clear-cut chances in the first half. philippe mexes thought he had scored an own goal, but it was ruled out. the game finished 0-0, with both sides struggling to create chances.
psv eindhoven beat heerenveen 4-1 at the philips stadion to win the dutch championship. luuk de jong scored two headed first half goals to seal the title for psv. it is psv's first title in seven years and their 22nd in the eredivisie. ajax amsterdam have lost the title after four successive years as champions.
bayern munich beat hoffenheim 2-0 to open a 13-point lead at the top of the bundesliga. sebastian rode scored andreas beck scored an own goal in stoppage time. the german champions were without half a dozen starters .
emad sahabi suffered a gruesome broken ankle while playing for his club al orubah against al shoalah. the midfielder suffered the injury while chasing a ball down after just 19 minutes of the game. the ankle twisted 180 degrees and appeared to dislocate as he tumbled over. the club went on to win the game 2-0.
john terry made a strong challenge from behind on manchester united striker radamel falcao in the build-up to eden hazard's opening goal for chelsea. sky sports pundits jamie redknapp, thierry henry and graeme souness agree terry fouled the striker. terry's challenge led to a loose ball for oscar to score at stamford bridge.
borussia dortmund beat paderborn 3-0 at signal iduna park. henrikh mkhitaryan, pierre-emerick aubameyang and shinji kagawa scored for the home side. the win came three days after manager jurgen klopp announced he will quit the club in the summer. dortmund moved up to eighth in the bundesliga table after the win.
chelsea are the worst behaved team in the premier league when it comes to respecting referees. jose mourinho's team are the most likely to protest decisions. table compiled by football association fair play delegates who attend every premier league match. liverpool show the greatest respect towards match officials, followed by burnley and west brom.
bayern munich lost 3-1 to porto in champions league quarter-final first leg on wednesday. franz beckenbauer accused dante of playing as if he was wearing'ski boots'    the germans conceded twice in the opening 10minutes before losing the game at the allianz arena.
nile ranger joined blackpool at the start of the season on a one-year deal. the former newcastle striker has been awol since early in december. ranger says the club took the mick out of him with his low-paid contract. ranger has not featured for the seasiders since end of november.
chelsea beat manchester united 1-0 at stamford bridge in the premier league. eden hazard scored the only goal of the game in the first-half. jose mourinho's side extended their lead at the top of the table. nemanja matic was back at his commanding best in midfield for chelsea.
newcastle host garry monk's side at st james' park on saturday. daryl janmaat has compared newcastle's premier league match to playing in the world cup semi-final. john carver's side have lost their last six premier league games. newcastle sit seven points clear of relegation - having lost to swansea.
fifa presidential candidate prince ali bin al hussein wants to see the world cup rotated between nations. prince ali is standing against sepp blatter to replace the current president. he has warned against expanding the tournament from its current 32 teams. the prince could see a tournament being jointly hosted by several different nations.
professor john warren discovered avocado trees switch from male to female in a matter of hours. the plants display 'unique flowering behaviour' at the university of aberystwyth, wales. during the day they flower with their 'female parts' ready to be pollinated by bees. but the next day they switch to'male parts' to spread their pollen.
protest will take place outside stamford bridge at 3pm on saturday ahead of manchester united game. photo organised by chelsea supporters trust and playfair qatar. more than 1,400 confirmed deaths of construction workers in qatar since 2022 world cup.
eden hazard and harry kane have been nominated for pfa player of the year. hazard has scored 19 premier league goals for chelsea this season. diego costa, alexis sanchez, philippe coutinho and david de gea are also up for the award. kane is the favourite to win the young player award for tottenham hotspur.
amal clooney, 37, married george clooney in venice, italy, last september. the human rights lawyer's wardrobe has gone from strength-to-strength since the wedding. several of her outfits cost at least £1,000. she has spent £66,900 alone on the clothes she has been photographed in.
porto beat bundesliga champions bayern munich 3-1 in the champions league first leg at porto's estadio do dragao on wednesday night. jackson martinez opened the scoring for porto from the penalty spot after just three minutes. thiago equalised for bayern in the 28th minute with a header from a thiago cross. porto defender ricardo quaresma scored a third minute penalty to put porto 2-0 up after manuel neuer gave away a penalty in the first half.    pep guardiola's team failed to improve in the second half and were reduced to 10 men as porto went on to win
blackpool fan frank knight, 67, posted an apology on his facebook account last week to blackpool and the oyston family. he is being sued by the club over allegations he made about the club. a campaign was set up to raise money for the pensioner. over 1,000 fans donated to the gofundme account in just three days.
harry kane and eden harzard have been nominated for pfa young player of the year. thibaut courtois, david de gea, raheem sterling and philippe coutinho complete the six-man shortlist. last year's winner eden hazard has been nominated again for the award. the professional footballers' association will announce the winners on april 26.
alexis sanchez scored the only goal of the game in extra time for arsenal. garath mccleary equalised for reading with a deflected volley. reading goalkeeper adam federici fumbled sanchez's shot through his legs and over the line. the royals keeper made a string of excellent saves to keep the score at 1-1.
swansea city host everton in the premier league on saturday at 12.45pm. swansea are second in the table after a 2-0 win overeverton at the weekend.    swanssea face a trip to the south coast to take on everton at swanssea city.  liverpool host newcastle united at liverpool on monday night.
