steve davis and dennis taylor played in the world snooker final in 1985. davis was leading 8-0 when he missed a shot on the green that he has rued to this day. the final was watched by 18.5million viewers, a bbc2 record.   davis led 14-11 but taylor fought back to lead 9-7 overnight.
mauricio pochettino expects a'very good reception' for aston villa manager tim sherwood on his return to white hart lane. sherwood was in charge of tottenham hotspur for five months last year. he was shown the door by daniel levy and left the club.   spurs host villa in the barclays premier league on saturday afternoon.
chris jordan took a stunning catch to dismiss joe root on day four of the first test at the sir vivian richards stadium. west indies finished the day on 98 for two after setting england a world record target of 438 to win. gary ballance scored a fourth test century in only his ninth match for england. jimmy anderson is still waiting for the wicket to move level with sir ian botham's test record.
the video, titled 'we will burn america', includes footage of the 9/11 terror attacks and recent atrocities. it claims the u.s. citizens' sense of safety is a'mirage' and claims the country will burn in another attack. previous jihadis managed to carry out the attacks with 'less resources' than isis, the video claims.
tottenham chairman daniel levy tried to persuade tim sherwood to stay on at the club after sacking him. levy sacked sherwood last may to bring in mauricio pochettino. sherwood will return to white hart lane for the first time with aston villa on saturday.
john goodwin, 75, shot himself outside of rockingham county superior courthouse on friday morning while jurors were deliberating claims that goodwin had sexually assaulted an underage student. goodwin was airlifted to a hospital with life-threatening injuries. he was not in custody at the time and his health status has not been disclosed. he went on trial this week on six counts of aggravated felonious sexual assault.
the body farm is a joint project between the university of south florida institute of anthropology and the hillsborough county sheriff's office. it would be a forensic research facility for research into how human bodies are affected by elements. the research could potentially help solve cold cases in hillsborough, pasco and pinellas counties. but residents of lithia are opposed to the project, fearing strong odors and the reputation it could bring to the community. hillsborough commissioner stacy white has taken a stand against the project.
tourist diovani de jesus posted the photo on earth day as a reminder that we can all co-exist. the green sea turtle appeared in a group photo at apo island in the philippines. the shallow water is a feeding ground for the endangered animals.
jiang min says she has run out of cash and can't even afford food for baby mengyu and her older daughter. her husband told her he was going out to work to earn money for baby's surgery. he hasn't been heard from since the start of the year. baby's hands and feet are severely deformed and doctors recommend corrective surgery. local media in binzhou city have compared the baby's webbed hands to 'trotters'
stan cole, an iraq veteran, captured the wall of wind in loraine, western texas, on wednesday evening. he was driving a tractor when he spotted the tornado from just 100 yards away. landspouts are not part of a thunderstorm and can be difficult to capture on film.
pablo mandado, 27, and ilze zebolde, 31, have been cycling around the world for 356 days. they've covered almost 7,000 miles and been through 16 countries in their open-ended odyssey. they live on less than three euros each a day and rely on free accommodation. the couple quit their restaurant jobs in manchester to go on the journey.
lewis hamilton is top of the 2015 sunday times sport rich list with a fortune of £88million. manchester united captain wayne rooney has moved up into second place with wealth of £72m. formula one driver jenson button is just £1m behind rooney with £71m. andy murray takes up fourth place on the list with wealth put at £48m.
singer melissa plancarte was filmed dancing in the mexico's michoacan state courthouse for her music video'since you left'   her father, enrique plancarte, was in charge of a drugs cartel known for hanging its victims by the neck from bridges. she lives in a mansion in the town of nueva italia and has three pet tigers. officials say she didn't have permission to film at the courthouse.
ben stokes and marlon samuels bury the hatchet as west indies dominate on day four of second test in grenada. joe root was left stranded on 182 not out after being run out by jason holder. jimmy anderson's careless mistake cost him a chance of a double century. west indians end the fourth day on 202 for two, a lead of 37, with kraigg brathwaite unbeaten on 101.
daniel sturridge has played just 12 league games for liverpool this season. brendan rodgers is keen on signing a striker who can 'play every week'   liverpool are on course to be 60 goals down on last season's total. divock origi, danny ings and memphis depay will return to liverpool in the summer.
louis van gaal expects ryan giggs to succeed him as manchester united manager. the dutchman has been giggs' assistant at old trafford since last summer. giggs was in temporary charge of united for four games last season after david moyes was sacked. van gaal has previously likened giggs to his own former assistant - now chelsea manager jose mourinho.
britt mchenry, 28, was suspended for a week after being filmed attacking a towing clerk at a chinese restaurant parking lot in virginia. her car had been towed overnight after she left it in the parking lot of a bar.   she was filmed insulting the woman's looks, intelligence, and social status. but espn has reinstated the sports reporter to her role with a spot on sportscenter this weekend.
david rush, 33, from lisburn, northern ireland, weighed 34st at his heaviest. he 'hated leaving the house' and felt he'shouldn't go out' because of his size. his diet consisted of twice-daily takeaways topped up with six bags of crisps and two bottles of coca-cola. he started cycling after having problems walking and lost 18st 10lb in just one year. now weighs a slimline 15st 4lbs and is training for a half-marathon and 115-mile bike ride.
andrew caldwell, 21, became famous last year for saying god cured his homosexuality and that he was 'delivered' by god. on wednesday, a cashier at a froyo in st. louis threw a bowl of yogurt in the face of andrew. he claims the employee, stephanie diaz, recognized him from a video of him saying he 'don't like mens no more' and attacked him. diaz admits to throwing the yogurt, but said he is a liar and called her a 'dog' and a 'b----'   diaz has been charged with third-degree assault, but has not been fired.
adam johnson has been charged with three offences of sexual activity with a 15-year-old girl. the sunderland midfielder could face up to 14 years in prison if found guilty. johnson, 27, has not been suspended by the premier league club despite the charges. the midfielder is set to feature at stoke on apr 25.
the video has been viewed 600,000 times and features new parents sharing their parenting tips. blends practical advice with the odd tear-jerking moment. all of the parents are based in the us and the clip has already been viewed by viewers. viewers are encouraged to submit their own parenting advice.
manchester united are closing in on a deal to sign borussia dortmund ace ilkay gundogan. louis van gaal believes the midfielder is the perfect replacement for michael carrick. united are eyeing a £20.5million deal for the central midfielder.
wladimir klitschko faces bryant jennings at madison square garden on friday night. reigning heavyweight champion will make his return to us soil for the first time in seven years. the 39-year-old recalls his rise to the top after winning olympic gold in 1996.   the ukrainian superstar believes age has no bearing on how long he can go on for.
manchester united have offered goalkeeper david de gea £200,000-a-week to stay at the club. there has been speculation that the 24-year-old will move back to spain to join real madrid this summer. louis van gaal admitted that the club have offered the goalkeeper 'a lot of money'    it is believed that de gea will move to replace iker casillas at the bernabeu.
ap mccoy will have two rides on his final day as a professional jockey at sandown on saturday. the 20-time champion jockey's last ever mount will be box office in the bet365 handicap hurdle. mccoys' penultimate race comes on mr mole in the grade one ap mccoy celebration chase at 3.15.
spanish midfielder isco is unhappy with his current role and playing time at real madrid. manuel pellegrini worked with isco at malaga and wanted him to join manchester city. but isco chose to move to manchester madrid instead. isco rarely starts for carlo ancelotti's side when all of his main options are fit.
red mazda careered off the road and crashed into the front door of a house in crossgates, leeds. the car hit the property with such force it became stuck in the wall but no-one was injured in the accident. police said the occupants of the house only suffered minor injuries.
eden hazard joined chelsea for £32million in 2012, but arsene wenger could not afford to sign him. hazard's agent discussed terms with wenger in the arsenal manager's house. hazard has had a standout season for chelsea and is favourite for player of the season. wenger insists that alexis sanchez will run hazard close in the vote.
jose mourinho was asked how hard arsene wenger pushed him at his chelsea press conference. the portuguese manager was visibly surprised by the question. he was asked the question at the end of his pre-match press conference on sunday. he gave an ambiguous answer to the question about wenger's push. arsenal host arsenal at stamford bridge in the premier league sunday afternoon.
patrick vieira's manchester city elite development side lost to west ham under 21s at upton park. dan potts scored the opener for west ham before an own goal doubled their lead. adam drury scored a second goal for the hosts before olivier ntcham pulled one back for city.
jesse o'brien has to take a daily dose of 45 pills to treat cystic fibrosis. video was taken by his mother heidi, 37, to encourage the brave youngster to take his pills. heidi posted it on facebook to encourage jesse to take the drugs to battle his condition. the video of jesse has had more than one million hits in just a week.
study of 1,302 german couples found men do just two hours of housework a day while working, which increases to 3.9 after they retire. but it is still far less than the amount carried out by their stay-at-home wives. men were also less likely to do the 'female' chores.
pep guardiola will be reintroduced to barcelona in the champions league semi-finals. the bayern munich coach must think of a way to stop lionel messi . guardiola nurtured messi into the best player in the world while manager at the nou camp.
pupil william webb ellis picked up a football and ran with it during a rugby match at rugby school in 1823. the game of rugby was born at the historic independent school in warwickshire. the world cup trophy is named in honour of the schoolboy who played the game. rugby school is known as the spiritual home of the game and is steeped in the traditions of the sport. its headmaster dr thomas arnold is credited with transforming the school's values.
bayern munich face barcelona in the champions league semi-finals. pep guardiola is to return to the nou camp for the first time since leaving in 2012. real madrid face juventus in the other semi-final. the draw was made at uefa's headquarters on friday morning. the first legs will take place on may 5/6.
tottenham are ready to grant emmanuel adebayor a free transfer in the summer. the club's chairman daniel levy will subsidies the striker's wages to ensure he leaves. tottenham want to receive a fee for the striker but want rid of his massive wage bill. the striker is currently earning £5.2million-per-season at north london club.
arsene wenger said it was easier to set up a team designed to defend. jose mourinho hit back at the arsenal boss after losing 3-1 to monaco in the champions league. the two clubs meet at stamford bridge on wednesday in the premier league.
gunners face chelsea at the emirates stadium on sunday. francis coquelin has made 23 appearances for arsenal this season since returning from loan spell at charlton. the frenchman is looking forward to playing against nemanja matic. arsenal boss arsene wenger says matic has been 'unbelievable' this season.
anthony mcgill beat defending champion mark selby 13-9 at the betfred world championships. it is the rookie scot's first world championship victory. mcgills was a 150/1 outsider to beat the world champion at the crucible . no maiden winner of the world championship has returned a year later to retain the trophy.
joe root scored 182 not out on day four of the second test in grenada. west indies finished 37 runs ahead of england on 202 for two at stumps. root admitted that the flat pitch made it too easy to score runs and tough to take wickets. root said england need early wickets with the new ball to win the game.
mayweather v manny pacquiao will be the biggest fight of all time financially and significant this century. sugar ray leonard v roberto duran is one of the greatest fights in boxing history. the no mas fight was the most humiliating defeat for roberto. george foreman v muhammad ali and jack johnson are two of the other greats.
the europa league semi-final draw was made at uefa's headquarters in nyon on friday. rafa benitez's napoli will face dnipro in the warsaw final. fiorentina will face holders sevilla over two legs in the last four of the competition. the semi-finals will be played on may 7 and 14.
bath moved within one point of aviva premiership leaders northampton with victory at the rec. sam burgess was man-of-the-match for the home side. fly half george ford kicked five penalties and two conversions for bath. london irish loosehead tom court scored a try for the exiles.
floyd mayweather and manny pacquiao's weigh-in tickets sold out within minutes on friday evening. tickets for the mega-fight went on sale from mgm property box offices in las vegas at 3pm. one ticket for the fight sold for $128,705 (£85,508) on stubhub. ticketmaster tickets for may-pacquiao sell out within a minute of going on sale on thursday night.
joe root scored 182 runs on day four of the second test in grenada. the england batsman was denied the chance of scoring a double century against the west indies. root was run out by james anderson after anderson failed to run his bat into the ground. root threw down his helmet and gloves as he returned to the pavilion.
joe root becomes second-youngest england batsman to reach 2,000 test runs after alastair cook. peter moores and paul farbrace will fly straight from barbados to dublin after the third test. stuart broad fails to score a run after yet another wasted review. marlon samuels gives ben stokes a comedy salute after dismissing him.
divock origi was signed by liverpool in a £10million deal after impressing at the 2014 world cup. the belgium striker said the progress of jordon ibe and raheem sterling has heightened his excitement at joining the club. origi was loaned back to lille for the 2014-15 season. the striker believes the challenges he has faced at lille will make him a better player.
paula radcliffe will run the final competitive marathon of her career at the london marathon on sunday. the world record holder says she is likely to cry at the end of the race. radcliffe set the record for the 2hr 15min 25sec world record in london in 2003.
shaun andrew mckerry, 31, tried to rob a post office in shildon, county durham, with an axe. he was jumped on by shopkeeper sab dhillon and wrestled to the floor. as the men wrestled, sab's wife sam hit him with a baseball bat to disarm him. ex-juvenile offender was dubbed boomerang boy or homing pigeon boy in his youth. he has been jailed for six years after pleading guilty to attempted robbery.
usain bolt says tyson gay's reduced ban is 'the stupidest thing i've ever heard' after his doping suspension. bolt said he used to respect gay as a competitor, but is no longer looking forward to racing against him. gay had his suspension reduced after he agreed to co-operate with authorities. bolt is the fastest man of all time, but gay is now returning to the sport.
jurgen klopp has announced he will leave borussia dortmund at the end of the season. the manager has refused to comment on whether he is bound for the premier league. manchester city are on the lookout for a new manager. brendan rodgers is also under pressure at liverpool as he faces a third trophyless season.

floyd mayweather vs manny pacquiao will be the biggest fight of all time financially and significant this century. jack johnson v james j jeffries is one of boxing's 12 most significant fights. white america hated it when johnson beat tommy burns to become the first black heavyweight champion in 1908. johnson took on jim jeffry for a purse of £3m at the grand garden in 1910.

researchers found that male 5,000 metre runners are more competitive than women. men are more driven by the desire to beat the competition than female athletes. but women are more committed to aspects of their lives outside sport, such as academic studies. men have a dimmer view of their colleagues' ability than women and are more likely to be part of a team.

audrey nethery, from kentucky, has diamond blackfan anemia, a life-threatening bone marrow condition that affects her ability to produce red blood cells. her parents are posting videos of her dancing at her zumba class to raise awareness about the disorder. audrey, six, has a rare illness called diamond black fan anemia.

real housewives of orange county star katie hamilton said there was no 'big fight or blow up' which caused her marriage to la angel josh hamilton to end. hamilton filed for divorce from his wife two months ago - around the same time he admitted to an alcohol and drugs relapse. the divorce petition was filed in late february and comes after his self-reported relapse. he is not allowed to see his four daughters without supervision. the couple have not listed the reasons for the split, citing only 'conflict' just months after celebrating 10 years together.
the husky has an injury to his right rear leg, possibly the result of being hit by a car. he is also extremely underweight and is suffering from a long-standing case of mange. the husky was picked up by rspca inspectors in adelaide. he has been named hero by his carers.
mick schumacher made his official pre-season test debut in formula 4 with van amersfoort racing. the 16-year-old is the son of seven-time f1 world champion michael. mick was involved in a minor crash last month at the oschersleben circuit in germany. his father michael has won a record seven 91 races in formula 1.
texas was hit with more than two inches of rain and tennis ball-sized hail stones in 15 minutes. more than 1000 homes lost power between houston and dallas on saturday. cars were left floating in half a foot of rain water in harris county. hundreds were evacuated from a circus big top after rain ripped through the sides.
nico rosberg finished third in sunday's bahrain grand prix. lewis hamilton secured his third win in four races this season. mercedes boss toto wolff believes nico was back to his best in the race. hamilton and kimi raikkonen both had brake failures on the final lap.
a 66-year-old man has been charged with a 'breach of the peace' and public nuisance. he allegedly set an australian flag on fire at the shrine of remembrance in brisbane's anzac square. the man was arrested and charged with one count of public nuisance on friday afternoon. he was taken into custody and will face court on saturday morning. tens of thousands are set to gather at the site for anzac day commemoration services.
floyd mayweather and manny pacquiao go head-to-head in las vegas on saturday, may 2. the two boxers have revealed a dozen oddities about themselves in the build-up to the mega fight. mayweather averages over 1000 sit-ups a day during training camp. manny pacquiao eats five meals and consumes 8,000 calories daily.
the fox cub had been stuck in a garden fence for around 40 minutes and was in desperate need of being set free. wildlife expert simon cowell runs the wildlife aid foundation in leatherhead, surrey. he travelled to the fox's location in his car to set it free. the fox cub is clearly distressed and spits at the wildlife expert's hand before lunging at him with its mouth open. mr cowell manages to distract the fox with a stick before pulling it free and releasing it.
schoolboy frankie franz watched martin montoya pull off the trick shot in a video recorded at barcelona's training ground. nine-year-old is an academy player with dagenham and redbridge football club. he scored a 27-yard goal into a basketball hoop - twice. the youngster decided to have a go at the shot after watching montoya in the video.
shannon hayes, 12, believes her pet hen has laid the world's smallest chicken egg in capel iwan, carmarthenshire. the egg measures just 1.8cm in length and is smaller than a five pence piece. she keeps seven hens at her family home and believes one of them laid the tiny egg.
lewis hamilton took to the water after winning the bahrain grand prix on sunday. jenson button is training for the london marathon and went for a run with his wife. the mercedes driver is preparing for sunday's race in the capital.
us-born jeb corliss jumped over the 562m high ball's pyramid at lord howe island, just off the coast of australia. the wing-suit pilot has described the world's tallest volcanic stack as 'the single most beautiful place i have ever been'    the us-born thrill-seeker has been base-jumping since the age of 22 and has dedicated his life to flight.
manchester united striker james wilson says he would take wayne rooney's free-kick-taking ability. the 19-year-old says rooney practices his free-kicks every day and often hits the target. wilson said he would also take robin van persie's movement and radamel falcao's instincts. the striker played alongside van persie for the under 21s on monday.
lewis hamilton has won nine of the last 11 grands prix. the mercedes driver is 27 points clear in the drivers' standings. hamilton won the bahrain grand prix on sunday. the briton says he feels more powerful than at any point in his career.
paul downton has left his role as managing director of england and wales cricket board. nasser hussain believes the system of english cricket is broken and needs fixing. english cricket needs to learn to embrace the maverick player and stop looking at individuals.    the sacking of alastair cook as one-day captain was a slow and protracted affair.
adam johnson has been charged with grooming and three counts of sexual activity with a 15-year-old girl. the england international will appear at peterlee magistrates court on may 20. johnson was suspended by sunderland after his arrest on march 2. the club are under pressure to suspend johnson for the rest of the season.
luis suarez was handed a four-month ban for biting giorgio chiellini during the world cup. the uruguayan striker was condemned by world football for the incident. suarez told his wife sofia that he didn't bite the italian defender. the barcelona striker then admitted the truth 10 days later.   suarez didn't believe that he had done anything but the television replays suggested otherwise.
stan collymore was in full fan mode as he celebrated villa's 3-3 premier league draw with qpr. talksport pundit called joey barton a 'f*****g rat' after he fell down to win a free-kick. yorkshire's championship winning coach jason gillespie is preparing for the season with a new diet. fa chairman greg dyke faces a challenge to convince over homegrown quota.
the worst storm in a decade in nsw has killed three people and left 215,000 homes without power. a staggering 312mm of rain fell in 24 hours in dungog, in the hunter region of new south wales, where three elderly people were found dead. the storm is the worst to hit the eastern seaboard of nsw in more than a decade. three surfers attempted to scale huge waves at manly's deadman's point in sydney on tuesday.
wladimir klitschko faces bryant jennings on april 25 at new york's madison square garden.    the ukrainian is closing in on the record number of successful defences of the heavyweight title set by joe louis and larry holmes. klutschko is keen to face deontay wilder in a unification clash later in his career.
adam johnson has been charged with three offences of sexual activity with a 15-year-old girl and one of grooming. the sunderland winger answered bail at peterlee police station in county durham on thursday. johnson, 27, will now appear at court on may 20. he was initially arrested at his £1.85million mansion on march 2 on suspicion of the offences. the england international was suspended by sunderlands pending the outcome of the investigation.
eden hazard is favourite to pick up the pfa player of the year award this season. the chelsea playmaker is closing in on a first premier league title. but paul scholes believes hazard needs to be more ruthless to be compared with cristiano ronaldo and lionel messi. hazard has scored 13 goals and made eight assists for manchester united.

wladimir klitschko faces american bryant jennings at madison square garden on saturday. the 39-year-old ukrainian will fight for his 27th heavyweight title. the veteran boxer has 17 successful title defenses in a row since 2006.    jennyings is 19-0 since taking up boxing six years ago.
chris gayle is currently in india ahead of royal challengers bangalore's ipl season. the batsman posted an instagram picture behind the dj decks ahead of the tournament. gayle will be hoping to win royal challengers' first-ever ipl crown this year. the 35-year-old posted a picture of himself behind some decks on tuesday.
manny pacquiao appeared on friend mario lopez’s extra programme at universal studios. the boxer is preparing for his superfight against floyd mayweather on may 2 in las vegas. he and lopez are friends from training at the same gym in los angeles. the pair sang a duet of lionel ritchie's hello on the show.
ap mccoy will retire at sandown after 20 years as a champion jockey. the legendary jockey has won 20 consecutive champion jump jockey titles. he has won the grand national and two cheltenham gold cups in his career. mccoys has lost the equivalent weight of two african elephants in his 25-year career. he spends up to six hours in a sauna six days a week to keep in shape.
paris saint-germain star david luiz and ezequiel lavezzi played a prank on birthday boy zoumana camara. camara was dunked into his cake ahead of psg's trip to face marseille in ligue 1 on sunday. the 36-year-old is a fringe player at psg and is unlikely to feature in the game.
manchester united striker wayne rooney has been interviewed by little ant and dec for itv's takeaway programme. the england captain enjoyed a kick-around with neil overend and hayden reid. rooney admitted that he can find it a little tiresome to have fans chant his name in the street. the interview will be aired on saturday night takeaway at 7pm on itv.
diego maradona guided argentina to world cup glory in 1986. the 54-year-old has not worked since leaving united arab emirates club al-wasl in 2012. since retiring from football he keeps in shape by taking part in boxing training. he is widely considered one of the greatest players of all time.

stevan jovetic has made just 39 appearances for manchester city this season. inter milan will propose a loan with view to a permanent £15million deal for the striker. joveic has started just 11 premier league games for the club. inter are also keen on manchester team-mate yaya toure.
javier hernandez scored the winner against atletico madrid in the champions league quarter-final. but real madrid are unlikely to take up their option to buy the manchester united striker. the mexico striker has attracted interest from a number of clubs home and abroad.
victor wanyama claims he has never spoken to arsene wenger over a move to arsenal. the saints midfielder was linked with a summer move to the emirates club. the 23-year-old moved from celtic to southampton for £12.5million in 2013. he has not ruled out a reunion with former saints boss mauricio pochettino.

radamel falcao has scored only four goals since arriving on loan at manchester united from monaco. the colombian striker is expected to leave the club in the summer. juventus general manager beppe marotta says the serie a champions cannot afford the striker's wages. the italians are interested in paulo dybala and edinson cavani.
alan pardew is disappointed to be linked with a move for tim krul. the crystal palace manager insists he is happy with current no 1 goalkeeper julian speroni. pardew left newcastle for crystal palace in january. the 53-year-old says he has had no contact with newcastle over a transfer.
kevin de bruyne has attracted interest from manchester city, bayern munich and paris saint-germain. patrick de koster says he could receive 20 phone calls a day about the wolfsburg midfielder. the agent expects to go 'around the world' discussing his client with other clubs. manchestercity are keen to sign the 23-year-old but de bruyne's agent insists no decision has been made.
gareth bale is adamant that he wants to stay at real madrid beyond the end of this season. manchester united are interested in signing the world's most expensive player. carlo ancelotti wants bale to become the best player in the world at madrid. bale has scored 17 goals for real this season but is out of wednesday's champions league clash with atletico madrid with a calf injury. realmadrid want to sign david de gea to be long-term successor to iker casillas at the club.

arsenal must make a swift decision on petr cech this summer or risk losing out on the goalkeeper. the chelsea stopper looks certain to leave stamford bridge at the end of the season. arsene wenger has lost the no 1 spot to thibaut courtois. cech will hold talks with jose mourinho to confirm his decision to leave.
yaya toure has hinted that he is open to leaving manchester city this summer. the premier league champions want to offload the 31-year-old midfielder. toure is wanted by inter milan boss roberto mancini. the argentine midfielder says he will not stay at the club just to earn his wages. manuel pellegrini's side are fourth in the league table after a disappointing season.
west ham are showing interest in crystal palace midfielder james mcarthur. the 27-year-old joined palace last summer in a deal worth £7million from wigan athletic. the scotland international has scored twice in 27 premier league appearances for the eagles this season.
manchester united have made an official approach for memphis depay. louis van gaal is keen to make the psv eindhoven winger one of his first signings this summer. the 21-year-old has scored 20 goals in 26 league games for psv this season. depay was named in holland's 23-man world cup squad last year. tottenham were keen on signing depay last summer but psv rejected a £15million bid.
manchester city are preparing bids for raheem sterling, ross barkley and jay rodriguez. frank lampard was one of six homegrown players on their squad list this season. james milner is out of contract in the summer and is considering his options. the club are aware of a lack of homegrown talent at senior level.    sterling could buy out the final year of his contract but is valued at £50million.
manchester city are monitoring juventus striker alvaro morata. the spain international was a target for arsenal a year ago when he left real madrid. city also remain keen on juventus midfielder paul pogba but face competition from paris saint germain.

hearts captain danny wilson has decided to leave the club at the end of the season. the defender activated a clause in his contract to leave tynecastle. the 23-year-old led hearts to championship title success this season. celtic manager ronny deila has been linked with a move for the former rangers player.
carlos tevez has told juventus he wants to leave the club this summer. the 31-year-old striker's contract at juventus does not expire until the end of next season. tevez wants to return to his first club boca juniors in argentina. juventus president daniel angelici has told tevez to terminate his contract with the club.
edinson cavani insists there is 'too much talk' about his future at paris saint-germain. manchester united are interested in signing the uruguayan striker. but cavani says he will stay at the club until his contract expires. nasser al-khelaifi has ruled out selling the striker this summer. robin van persie and radamel falcao could leave old trafford this summer .

juventus and liverpool are interested in signing chelsea midfielder oscar. the 23-year-old has been criticised by jose mourinho in recent weeks. the brazilian midfielder has struggled to make an impact for the club. juventus boss carlos dunga revealed oscar reminds him of roberto baggio.
carlos tevez has told juventus he wants to leave the club this summer. the striker has always said he intends to finish his career at boca juniors in argentina. tevez is under contract at juventus until the end of next season. he is on course to win a second serie a title with the club.

andre ayew is out of contract at marseille this summer and free to talk to foreign clubs. swansea have made a contract offer to the striker. the 25-year-old ghana international is keen to move to the premier league. the swans are also keeping track of schalke full-back christian fuchs.
arsenal are keen on signing liverpool winger raheem sterling. the gunners are having reservations over their interest in the 20-year-old. sterling is currently refusing to sign a new contract at anfield. real madrid chief zinedine zidane is also interested in signing the reds forward.

tottenham want to offer nabil bentaleb a new deal to ward off interest from rival teams. clubs from across europe are monitoring the algeria international's situation. bentaleb's current deal expires in the summer of 2018. tottenham are in talks over a new contract for the midfielder.
time lapse video shows storm water creeping along the tracks at bardwell park train station in sydney's south. the video was filmed from the platform over a 45 minute period at 11am on wednesday. the flooding forced the partial closure of the t2 airport line. about 80 sets of traffic lights are still out across the city and a number of roads remain closed due to flooding. the two-day total rainfall of 225mm was the most in 17 years.
grace joy roseman died after she managed to move over the edge of her bedside cot and a'safety' ridge cut off oxygen supply to her brain. west sussex coroner penelope schofield has called for 'dangerous' bednest cot to be pulled from the shelves. seven-week-old baby was found with her head over edge of the cot after mother put her down for a nap. cot was endorsed by national children's trust and has been pulled from sale.

nypd officers shot dead a suspect as he fled from the scene of a crime wednesday night. members of the new york police department claim the man, 30, opened fire in the queens section of the city after they responded to a call from a bar. when he turned around to do so again he was shot dead. no officers were hurt during the incident.
mauricio pochettino will return to st mary's on saturday as tottenham manager. the former southampton boss is looking forward to his return to his former stomping ground. the argentinian left the south coast club in the summer to take up the job at tottenham hotspur.   poc tottenham boss insists he has no desire to be popular among southampton fans.
