lorient beat marseille 5-3 at the stade velodrome in ligue 1. it was lorient's first win in five games and moved them clear of the relegation zone. jordan ayew scored a brace for the visitors. andre-pierre gignac and francois bellugou also scored for the away side.
inverness defender josh meekings will be allowed to play in scottish cup final against falkirk on may 30. sfa judicial panel decided it was not entitled to apply retrospective punishment in his case. the charge of deliberate handball against celtic was thrown out.   he admitted he was fortunate not to have conceded a penalty and been red-carded.
ronald koeman has promised not leave southampton this summer for a bigger club. the dutchman has guided saints to the top of the premier league this season. koeman's side only need a point to break their record premier league points tally set last season. barcelona and real madrid are not of interest to koeman.
west ham defender carl jenkinson says jack grealish should follow his heart when choosing whether to play for ireland or england. the aston villa winger is torn between representing the republic of ireland and england . the 23-year-old is on loan at west ham from arsenal until the end of the season. jen atkinson played for england at youth level but can still play for the england senior side.
west ham became the first premier league club to reduce season ticket prices for fans. sam allardyce has labelled the move the best business by any club in a long time. west ham's cheapest adult season ticket will cost as little as £289 when the club move to the olympic stadium next year.
le'veon bell will miss the first three games of the new season after being charged with marijuana possession. former steeler legarrette blount will miss first game of the season. bell will appeal the nfl's decision to ban him for abusing the league's substance abuse policy. bell was stopped in his car after a police officer noticed a strong smell of marijuana.
tottenham are considering a new state-of-the-art stadium with a retractable pitch for an nfl franchise. tottenham's new £400m stadium is due to be completed for the start of the 2018-19 season. the nfl are said to be within five years of having a permanent franchise in london. spurs' new 65,000-seat stadium could be better suited to a nfl london franchise.
mauricio pochettino spent 16 months as southampton manager before moving to tottenham. nicola cortese sacked nigel adkins and replaced him with the argentine. the former saints boss is preparing to return to st mary's for the first time since he left. the argentinian has brought through a number of young players at spurs. he has deployed strict and grueling training methods at both spurs and southampton.
new england patriots will host the opening game of the 2015 nfl season on september 10. the super bowl champions will play the pittsburgh steelers at the gillette stadium. espn will host a double-header of monday night football in week one. seattle seahawks will play st louis rams in their opening game. the nfl released the full schedule for the 2015 season.
the first-degree murder conviction carries a mandatory sentence of life in prison without parole in the slaying of odin lloyd, a 27-year-old landscaper and amateur weekend football player. hernandez was also found guilty on firearm and ammunition charges. the former new england patriots star was found guilty of the murder of lloyd in a shooting in a deserted industrial park in 2013.
michael bennett labelled jimmy graham'soft' and 'overrated' after seattle seahawks' win over saints two years ago. bennett says he still feels the same way about his new team-mate. the defensive end says he didn't like graham as a person or a player. graham signed a deal with seattle in free agency.
charles tillman has ended his 12-year career with the chicago bears. the 34-year-old cornerback has agreed a deal with the carolina panthers. tillman will link-up with former bears coach ron rivera. the veteran cornerback was a staple of the bears' defense during his career.
dallas cowboys defensive end greg hardy has been suspended without pay for 10 games. domestic violence charges against hardy were abruptly dropped in february. he was accused of assaulting his former girlfriend, nicole holder, and threatening to kill her. nfl commissioner roger goodell concluded that hardy violated the nfl's personal conduct policy.
stevan ridley has signed a one-year deal with the new york jets. the 26-year-old is the 15th player to join the jets in a frantic free agency. ridley played just six games for the patriots last season after suffering a tear to his right acl.
sarah thomas, who has worked exhibition games, will be a line judge for the 2015 season. the 41-year-old was the first woman to work college games in 2007. she was in the league's officiating development program in 2013-14 and worked some team minicamps.
lesean mccoy was shipped to the buffalo bills in exchange for linebacker kiko alonso and says chip kelly's team has a 'college feel'   the running back says kelly doesn't like star talent and that he doesn't 'like or respects the stars'  mccoy ran for 1,000 yards in four of six seasons with the eagles.
denver broncos cornerback aqib talib and his brother yaqub are being investigated for aggravated assault. a shot was fired outside club luxx in dallas, texas, after a physical fight on wednesday morning. talib was wanted on charges of aggravated assault with a deadly weapon in 2011. he and his mother were accused of shooting a gun at his sister's live-in boyfriend.
adrian peterson is to meet with the nfl to discuss his reinstatement. the minnesota vikings running back was placed on the commissioner's exempt list due to a child abuse case. peterson played once last season and was due to be reinstated on april 15. the 30-year-old has been linked with the dallas cowboys and cardinals.
sarah thomas is set to become the nfl's first permanent female official for regular season games. the 42-year-old mother-of-three from mississippi has officiated pre-season games as a line judge. she will be one of eight new officials for the 2015 season. thomas has been refereeing college games since 1999.
efe obada only took up american football last year and has played just five games for london warriors. the 22-year-old will fly to texas next month for rookie mini-camp. obada was mentored by warriors defensive co-ordinator aden durde.
jacksonville jaguars are committed to playing one home game each year in london until 2015. a competition for uk-based fans is being run to announce sixth and seventh draft picks live on tv. it will be the first time any part of the nfl draft has taken place outside the u.s.
badou jack outpointed anthony dirrell to take the wbc super-middleweight title on points. jack beat dirrell 116-112 and 115-113 at the uic pavilion in chicago on friday night. jack will fight mandatory challenger george groves for the title. danny jacobs stopped caleb truax in the 12th round to defend his wba middleweight title.
nicola adams was due to fight at the english national championships on saturday. but she has pulled out after a burglary at her home in leeds. adams and her family were at home at the time but were not aware of the break-in. she had been due to face great britain rival lisa whiteside.
floyd mayweather faces manny pacquiao in 'the fight of the century' in las vegas on may 2. mayweather holds an undefeated professional boxing record going into the bout. joe calzaghe believes mayweather will overcome the challenge of pacquaio. the former undefeated welshman says mayweather is under more pressure.
the weigh-in for floyd mayweather and manny pacquiao's welterweight fight will take place on may 2. fight organisers have charged fans to attend the weigh in. tickets will cost £6.60 and will go on sale on friday at 8pm. all funds raised will go to charities chosen by the fighters.
luke rockhold beat lyoto machida by second-round submission in new jersey. rockhold wants a title shot and a shot at mma history in new york. jacare souza beat chris camozzi in the co-main event and wants a middleweight title shot.
luke rockhold takes on lyoto machida at welterweight on saturday night in new jersey. machida was wrapped in an electric blanket to make weight before the weigh-in. the brazilian was wearing a sauna suit and covered in a blanket. 'the dragon' later tipped the scales at 185lb for his clash with rockhold.
luke rockhold takes on lyoto machida in a middleweight clash in new jersey on saturday. rockhold is bidding to extend his winning streak to five and earn a title shot. the californian says he has to be the bull to machida's matador. machida is confident he can upset rockhold and earn title shot .
conor mcgregor said he would 'kill' floyd mayweather 'in less than 30 seconds' if he faced the boxer. mayweather is currently in training for his mega-fight against manny pacquiao. mcgregor is preparing for his world title fight against jose aldo in the ufc.
ufc champion ronda rousey made her debut appearance with fast and furious co-star the rock at wrestlemania 31. she wants to 'find a way' to return to the wwe but her focus is on her upcoming fight against bethe correia . she took down co-owner stephanie mcmahon and triple h in front of 77,000 fans.
jeff novitzky is the new vice president of athlete health and performance for the ufc. he was involved in investigations into barry bonds, marion jones and lance armstrong. anderson silva, nick diaz and hector lombard all tested positive for drugs.    ufc announced earlier this year that they will implement a new drug testing programme.
jimi manuwa takes on jan blachowicz in the octagon tonight. the londoner suffered his first defeat to alexander gustafsson last year. jimi believes his 'aggression and killer instinct' will help him finish his opponent inside two rounds.
mirko filipovic faces gabriel gonzaga in poland on saturday. cro crop lost to the brazilian in 2007 when he was beaten by a first-round head kick. mirko wants to avenge the defeat at ufc 70 in 2007.    gonzuga said he does not consider the fight a rematch because of the eight-year gap.
conor mcgregor insists featherweight champion jose aldo doesn't want the title as much as he does. the irishman defends his title in las vegas on july 11. aldos makes the eighth defence of his belt against mcgregors.
paula creamer has called for a masters tournament for women at augusta national. creamer first floated the idea on twitter following jordan spieth's victory at the masters. the world no 27 suggested a women's event could be staged the week following the men's event.
chad mendes and ricardo lamas meet in the main event of the ufc featherweight title fight on saturday night. no 1 ranked mendes takes on no 4 ranked lamas at the patriot center in fairfax. conor mcgregor and jose aldo are the other top ranked 145ers in the featherweight division.
justin rose finished joint second in the masters at augusta national earlier this month. rose returns to action at the zurich classic of new orleans at tpc louisiana this week. steve stricker and rickie fowler will also play in the event. stricker is making his way back to full fitness after back surgery last december.
conor mcgregor is challenging jose aldo for his featherweight title in las vegas on july 11. the irishman has a new tattoo of a tiger's face on his stomach. the 26-year-old has already got a gorilla and a heart inked on his chest.
chad mendes beat ricardo lamas in the first round to retain his no 1 featherweight ranking. jorge masvidal fell to a split-decision loss to al iaquinta in the co-main even. dustin poirier and julianna pena made successful returns to the octagon.
lindsey vonn, 30, has been dating golf's former no 1 since 2013. the us alpine skier spoke about her relationship with tiger woods on the late night with seth meyers. she credited him with helping her recover from injury that kept her out of 2014 winter olympics. vonn says woods is a 'great father' to woods' daughter sam, seven, and son charlie, six.
sir nick faldo and tom watson will compete at the open for the last time at st andrews in july. faldo will cross the swilcan bridge for the final time on the 25th anniversary of his victory there. almost 10,000 spectators will be able to watch from seats on the first, 17th and 18th.
bubba watson shows off incredible baseball style shot while practicing in china. the two-time masters champion was working with his caddie. the american showed off the trick shot on twitter. watson finished t-38 at the masters and shenzen international in recent weeks.
former us open champion jim furyk beat kevin kisner on the second play-off hole at the rbc heritage. the 44-year-old finished 18-under in regulation play to win the title at hilton head. furyk hit a final round 63 to finish on eight-under par at harbour town. recent us masters champion jordan spieth finished tied 11th after final round 70.
kiradech aphibarnrat beat chinese teenager li hao-tong in a play-off hole at the inaugural shenzhen international in shenzhen. the 25-year-old won his second european tour title after finishing two shots behind overnight leader .
thailand's kiradech aphibarnrat fired six birdies in the space of nine holes to take the lead at the shenzhen international in china. the 25-year-old began the third round one shot behind peter uihlein . bubba watson struggled to his second consecutive round of 74 to finish two over par.
carly booth is currently in mauritius for a photo shoot with golf punk magazine. the 22-year-old took to instagram to show off her bikini body. the scot is currently ranked world no 520. booth was the youngest-ever scot to qualify for the ladies european tour.
jordan spieth bounced back from his opening 74 with a nine-under-par round of 62 at the rbc heritage. troy merritt fired a 10-under 61 to equal the course record at harbour town golf links. matt kuchar is tied for second place with john merrick after a round of 65.
rory mcilroy's foundation is hosting the dubai duty free irish open at royal county down from may 28-31. us open champion martin kaymer and former world number one luke donald have confirmed their participation. patrick reed has also confirmed his participation in the tournament.
jordan spieth finished the first round of the rbc heritage on three over par. the masters champion finished well off the pace by carding a three-over-par 74. spieth looked tired as he struggled in difficult conditions in south carolina. matt every and graeme mcdowell shared the lead on five under after first round at hilton head.
rory mcilroy battled with fifty shades of grey star jamie dornan at a game of circular soccer. the world no 1 golfer won 2-1 to promote new football concept circular soccer . the duo were taking part in the first circular soccer showdown of 2015 .  mcilroy is an avid manchester united fan and dreamed of playing for the red devils as a child.
world no 9 agnieszka radwanska lost to sara errani 7-6 (8/6) 6-4 in two hours and eight minutes at porsche grand prix in stuttgart. ana ivanovic lost to caroline garcia on tuesday in the fifth seed's second round exit. world no 15 errani will now face kazakhstan's zarina diyas in second round.
rafael nadal lost 6-4, 7-6 (8-6) to italian fabio fognini in the third round of the barcelona open. the world no 4 was looking for a ninth title at the tournament. nadal was playing in front of his home crowd at the catalan clay court. he will now face pablo andujar in the quarter-finals of the event.
deposed masters champion bubba watson sits four shots off home hope huang wen-yi's lead at augusta national. watson had to settle for an opening-day 70 and is in joint 17th place at the shenzhen international. the defending champion finished 38th in the defence of his masters crown.
jordan spieth returns to golf just days after winning the masters at augusta national. the 21-year-old will play in the rbc heritage classic at harbour town this week. spieth equaled tiger woods' masters record of 18-under 270 to win the green jacket. he has had 26 appearances and interviews in 25 hours since the victory.
rafael nadal beat spanish compatriot nicolas almagro 6-3 6-1 to reach the barcelona open third round. world no 4 is looking for his ninth career title on the catalan clay court. the second seed was watched by barcelona forward neymar in the crowd. nadal will play 13th seed fabio fognini or andrey rublev on thursday.
there will be a capacity of 7,000 for july's match against france at london's queen's club. british tennis fans face a wimbledon-type scramble for davis cup quarter-final tickets. only around 2,500 tickets will be available to the ordinary public. the rest will go to organisations and governing bodies. andy murray will lead the gb team in the tie at july 17-19.
marin cilic lost to victor estrella of the dominican republic at the barcelona open. cilic is the 2014 u.s. open champion but is struggling with a shoulder injury. estrella beat main cilic 6-4 6- 4 in the second round of the tournament.
serbian fifth seed ana ivanovic lost 7-6 (8/6) 6-4 to france's caroline garcia in the first round of the 2015 porsche tennis grand prix in stuttgart. it was the third time this year that the 2014 runner-up has lost to garcia. russian ekaterina makarova and carla suarez navarro both beat qualifiers in first round.
angelique kerber of germany beats top seed maria sharapova 2-6, 7-5, 6-1 at porsche grand prix. madison brengle of the u.s. also upset third seed petra kvitova in the second round. three-time defending champion lost her world no 2 ranking after the defeat.
jose mourinho was given a tour of wimbledon as part of jaguar's new deal with the all england lawn tennis club. chelsea manager said he felt like he was british when andy murray won the 2013 men's title. mourino also described sw19 as'more than a grand slam' due to its traditions and aura. murray beat novak djokovic to win britian's first title in 77 years.
serena williams beat italian sara errani 4-6 7-6(3) 6-3 in the fed cup play-off on sunday. america were beaten 3-2 by italy in the doubles rubber and relegated to world group ii. world no 1 says she is not as ready for the claycourt season as she thought.
japan's kei nishikori beat teymuraz gabashvili 6-3 6-4 in the second round of the barcelona open. the top seed made a successful start to his title defence. madrid-born 2010 champion fernando verdasco crashed out of the competition against andrey rublev.
martina navratilova's brief stint as coach of agnieszka radwanska is over. the pair announced in december that they would be working together. radwinska has struggled this season and was knocked out in the first round in stuttgart.
novak djokovic is world no 1 and in superb form, but rafa nadal insists he has no worries about roland garros. the spaniard was beaten by the serb at the monte carlo masters last week. nadal is looking to win the french open for a sixth consecutive year. but nadal says this year is no different to previous years.
queen's club will host davis cup quarter final against france from july 17-19. british captain leon smith wants to take on the french on grass. jo wilfried tsonga is back to form after overcoming an arm problem. andy murray will play at queen's club in the quarter final.
jenson button failed to start the bahrain grand prix due to energy recovery system failure. lewis hamilton won his third race of the season after finishing second. kimi raikkonen finished a record seventh time on the podium in the gulf kingdom. nico rosberg has only beaten his mercedes team-mate once this season.
jenson button failed to complete qualifying for the bahrain grand prix. button stopped on track in each of the practice sessions due to technical issues. button will start the race 20th and last after his engine failure and sensor issue. fernando alonso managed to get a mclaren into q2 for the first time this season.
bernie ecclestone confirms azerbaijan will stage the european grand prix next season. the race will be held in the capital of baku. human rights watch has criticised the country's human rights record. but f1 chief maintains the sport has conducted its due diligence on the country.
world no 1 novak djokovic defeated tomas berdych 7-5 4-6 6-3 in the final at monte carlo open. the serbian became the first player to win the opening three masters 1000 events of the clay court season. the serb beat the czech in three sets in a rain-hit match.
lewis hamilton qualified on pole position for the bahrain grand prix on saturday. his mercedes team-mate nico rosberg was third six-tenths of a second behind hamilton. hamilton has dominated roberg this season and is 17 points ahead of the briton .
jenson button failed to start the bahrain grand prix after he broke down in qualifying. the british driver was set to start from the back of the grid. button's mclaren team had to work hard to get his car ready in time for the race.
lewis hamilton takes pole position for the bahrain grand prix by four tenths of a second. sebastian vettel of ferrari was second with team-mate nico rosberg third. jenson button will start 20th after his mclaren broke down in qualifying.
ferrari team principal maurizio arrivabene has urged kimi raikkonen to improve his performances if he wants to stay at ferrari. the finn's contract ends at the end of the current formula one season. raikkonen has said he has never been happier working with a team in his career.
ferrari team principal maurizio arrivabene has revealed to using a carrot-and-stick method with kimi raikkonen. lewis hamilton is yet to sign his new contract with the maranello marque.    it has been suggested that hamilton will replace raikonen at ferrari for next season.
nico rosberg described ferrari's pace as 'dangerous' and 'worrying' ahead of bahrain grand prix. the mercedes driver topped the timesheet with a lap of one minute 34.647secs during friday practice. but he trails team-mate lewis hamilton by 17 points in the drivers' standings.
formula one supremo bernie ecclestone has urged lewis hamilton to consider a move from mercedes to ferrari. hamilton is yet to sign a new contract with mercedes. the 30-year-old is 13 points ahead of team-mate sebastian vettel in the drivers' championship.
davy condon suffered spinal concussion in a fall at aintree during the grand national this month. it was the second spinal injury within a year for the irish jockey. condon was riding portrait king when he fell at the third-last of the race. the jockey was advised to retire after seeing a specialist.
french trainer freddy head likens 2,000 guineas hope ride like the wind to charm spirit. head says he is 'on the same sort of level' as charm spirit was at this time last year. 34 colts remain in the field for the first classic of the season on saturday.
jenson button's mclaren broke down in the first practice session of the bahrain grand prix. button finished 19th after finishing 19th in free practice. button's car suffered an electrical fault three minutes into the first session. the car returned to the garage and he finished the day in 19th. button fears he will be at the back of the grid for sunday's qualifying.
robbie mcnamara broke eight ribs, cracked six vertebrae and has no feeling in his legs after a fall at wexford. the jockey says he is feeling 'great and optimistic' as he continues to recover from injuries. he was due to partner lord windermere in the grand national at aintree.
ap mccoy has confirmed he will ride to the final race at sandown on saturday if he can secure mounts. the soon-to-be-crowned 20-time champion jockey will ride in the handicap hurdle at 5.35. there had been speculation he would end his career in the celebration chase or bet365 gold cup.
arsenal legend ian wright will present ap mccoy with his final champion jockeys trophy at sandown on saturday. ian played for arsenal for seven years and broke every scoring record at the club. thierry henry was asked to present the award but sky did not allow it. mccoy has been invited to attend a home game before the end of the season.
northampton face saracens at stadiummk on saturday. tom wood is keen for his side to regain their form after recent defeats by clermont and exeter. harlequins full back ugo monye is hanging up his boots at the end of the season.
jack cosgrove has agreed to join edinburgh on a two-year deal. the 20-year-old worcester warriors prop has been capped nine times for the dark blues under 20s side. edinburgh reached the european cup final last season and are in the play-off final.
michael allen will join edinburgh on a two-year deal at the end of the season. the 24-year-old ulster back has never lived outside of ireland. he can play either at wing or centre for the club. allen is a former pupil of methodist college belfast.
mariano galarza played for gloucester against sale sharks despite being ineligible. the rfu has said he should have been ineligible for the match. the aviva premiership club will face a rugby football union hearing.    the club face the prospect of having points deducted for the misdemeanour.
billy vunipola, steffon armitage and nick abendanon have been shortlisted for european player of the year award. saracens no 8 and toulon flanker have starred in this season's champions cup. leinster's jamie heaslip and clermont's fritz lee are also on the shortlist.
davy mcgregor was playing for heriot's racing club against the barbarians for their 125th anniversary. hooker was caught by an opponent's hip or shorts. the hooker's ear was left hanging off after the horrific injury. the irish rugby player is on his way to a plastic surgeon to have it replaced.
manu tuilagi has been out of action since october with a groin injury. the leicester tigers centre has not played for england since the three-test summer tour of new zealand in 2014. the 23-year-old is taking his recovery 'week by week' to return to action in time for the pre-world cup. manu tuilagi picked up the injury in october.
mike brown was knocked out in the rbs 6 nations test against italy in february. the harlequins full back is still showing signs of concussion nine weeks later. brown could miss the rest of the season and may not play again until the world cup warm-up matches in august. the 29-year-old has taken no part in training or team meetings.
mike fitzgerald has helped the chiefs win two super rugby titles. the new zealander will follow peter betham to leicester tigers next season. the 28-year-old lock will follow the waratahs wing to welford road next year.
matt giteau has not played for australia since the 2011 world cup in new zealand. the fly half was left out of the wallabies squad for the last tournament. he is currently playing for toulon and is eligible to play for the national side again. australias had a policy of not picking players based abroad for the world cup. but the aru announced a u-turn and will pick 'elite' players from abroad.
andy farrell says rugby union is going to be the sport of the year with the world cup coming up. england assistant coach says stuart lancaster's side are in great shape ahead of the tournament. stuart lancaster’s side begin their world cup campaign against fiji at twickenham on september 18. farrell admits that england have some tough decisions to make in terms of selection.
players with 60 caps playing overseas can now be selected for australia. the aru passed a new rule to allow players with over 60 caps to play for the wallabies. players with seven years' professional contract with australian rugby will be eligible. adam ashley-cooper, drew mitchell and matt giteau are among those eligible.
england lead west indies by 74 runs after day three of the second test in grenada. joe root is unbeaten on 118 not out at stumps after posting a commanding score of 373 for six. gary ballance, ben stokes and moeen ali all took wickets for the visitors. jonathan trott and alastair cook also scored half-centuries for england.
joe root is 118 not out at stumps on day three of the second test against the west indies at the national cricket stadium in grenada. england captain alastair cook scored 76 not out after missing out on a century. cook has gone 34 innings and 697 days without a test ton. jonathan trott scored 59 runs for england in the first innings.
marlon samuels gave ben stokes a send-off salute after giving his wicket away in the second test on thursday night. the west indies all-rounder was wicket-taking at the close of the third day. geoffrey boycott said the gesture was good 'banter' and was seen as 'fun' by graeme swann. stokes was dismissed by devendra bishoo for a duck.
alastair cook and jonathan trott are the sixth english pair to score more than 100 runs together on 10 occasions. new zealand all-rounder corey anderson could miss the test series in england with a broken finger. west indies bowler shannon gabriel's fastest delivery was 94.3mph.
stuart broad took three wickets for 19 as england bowled west indies out for 299 on day two of the second test in grenada. broad produced his best and quickest bowling since knee surgery last year. alastair cook and jonathan trott guided england to 74 runs without loss at st george's. broad backs cook to go onto a big hundred and put his side in a winning position.
australian batsman aaron finch has had surgery on his hamstring. finch was injured playing for mumbai indians in the indian premier league. the world cup-winning batsman faces three months out of action after the operation. the 28-year-old was captain of australia's twenty20 team.
alastair cook passed alec stewart's 8,463 runs to become england's second highest test run-scorer. stuart broad bowled beyond 90 miles per hour for the first time since returning from knee surgery. cook and jonathan trott shared a first half-century stand on day two of the third test.
zara phillips pulls out of rolex kentucky three-day event after high kingdom suffers injury. the queen's granddaughter was due to make her debut at the event. high kingdom suffered a cut leg after kicking out and cutting himself in his stable. phillip won silver at london 2012 and 2014 world equestrian games on high kingdom.
san antonio spurs beat los angeles clippers 100-73 in game 3 to take 2-1 series lead. kawhi leonard scored a play-off career high 32 points for the spurs. houston rockets beat dallas 130-128 to take a 3-0 lead over toronto raptors. the clippers must now come from behind after two straight defeats in the series.
alastair cook's former team-mate graeme swann pointed out when the england captain's form turned. adil rashid was made to wait for his test debut after being left out on day one. devon smith became the first grenadan to score a test run in grenada. joe root 'wasn't a massive fan' after the first time he faced james anderson. marlon samuels has no 50s in five tests against england.
ben stokes and marlon samuels clashed on the opening day of the second test in grenada. stokes is 'battling himself' and is 'not listening to me' as he tries to score runs. samuels says the england players 'don't learn' and that stokes 'can't help' talking to him . the west indies batsman is 94 not out after a hard-fought opening day and is in good form.
alejandro valverde successfully defended his fleche wallonne title on wednesday. movistar rider finished ahead of julian alaphilippe and michael albasini. team sky's chris froome fell in the final 12km but finished 123rd after a fall. former winner philippe gilbert pulled out of the race after a crash.
ronnie o'sullivan beat craig steadman 10-3 in the first round of the world snooker championship on wednesday. the five-time world champion had trouble with his shoes at the crucible. the 39-year-old could face a small fine for breach of dress code. o'ssullivan asked for a new pair of shoes after winning his first round match.
reanne evans saw her 10-year reign as women's world snooker champion end on tuesday. evans lost 4-2 to hong kong's ng on yee in the semi-finals of the world amateur championship. the 29-year-old lost to ken doherty in the first round of qualifying for the world championship.
world no 1 michael van gerwen beat james wade 7-0 in the betway premier league on thursday night. world champion gary anderson lost 7-1 to stephen bunting. raymond van barneveld beat dave chisnall and phil taylor drew 6-6 with adrian lewis.
cleveland cavaliers beat boston celtics 99-91 at home to take 2-0 lead in playoff series. washington wizards beat toronto raptors 117-106 in toronto. dwight howard scored 28 points as houston rockets beat dallas mavericks 111-99.
judd trump beat stuart carrington 10-6 in the first round of the betfred world championship. trump led 7-2 from wednesday but carrington fought back to win the match. trump will now face marco fu in the second round. defending champion mark selby beat anthony mcgill 10-4 in the opening second round match.
paula radcliffe said she 'was close to pulling out' of the london marathon on sunday. but celebrity doctor hans-wilhelm muller-wohlfahrt has made sure she will race. radcliffe will compete in her final competitive marathon of her career. the doctor has worked with ronaldo, michael owen and usain bolt.
china's ding junhui was on for a maxumum break of 147 at the world snooker championship. the world no 3 potted 12 reds and 12 blacks before screwing back for the blue instead of the black. ding realised what he had done and chuckled before starting to giggle. ding would have pocketed £30,000 for the maximum break at the crucible.
jimmy butler scored 31 points as the chicago bulls beat the milwaukee bucks 91-82 on monday. the golden state warriors beat the new orleans pelicans 97-87 to take a 2-0 lead in their nba play-offs series. butler set a play-off career-high of 31 points in the victory against the bucks.
stephen curry scored 40 points as the golden state warriors beat new orleans pelicans 123-119 in overtime. curry hit seven 3s as golden state completed a fourth-quarter comeback to lead play-off series 3-0. chicago beat milwaukee 113-106 in double overtime to set up a series sweep against milwaukee. lebron james scored 31 points as cleveland cavaliers beat boston 103-95 in boston.
chris paul and luol deng will play in the first-ever nba game held in africa on august 1. the game will be a team africa vs team world exhibition at the ellis park stadium in johannesburg. more than 35 players from africa have played in the nba since 1984.
neil robertson beat welshman jamie jones 10-2 in the first round of the world championship at the crucible. the 2010 champion has committed more hours to the game than ever before. barry hawkins beat qualifier matthew selt 10-9 in a final-frame decider.
arsene wenger wants cesc fabregas to be shown the'respect he deserves' when he returns to arsenal on sunday. the midfielder returns to the emirates stadium to face chelsea. wenger hopes fans will give him a good reception at the club's home ground. jose mourinho has won seven and drawn five of his 12 meetings with wenger.
aston villa attacker gabriel agbonlahor missed the semi-final win against liverpool because of a troublesome hamstring injury. the 28-year-old posted a video on instagram of himself performing a boxing workout with a trainer . tim sherwood's side face manchester city at the etihad on saturday.
just nine points separates the bottom seven teams in the premier league. chris ramsey feels qpr will avoid relegation if they win three more league games. sean dyche insists burnley are not scared of relegation. tim sherwood believes his appointment at aston villa has given his side belief and confidence.
former everton chairman and life president sir philip carter has died aged 87. carter also served as president of the football league and a vice-president of football association. he was chairman of everton throughout the 1980s. under his stewardship, the club won two league titles, an fa cup and the european cup. bill kenwright paid tribute to carter as a great man and the very best friend anyone could ask for.
danny ings hasn't scored since february 11 for burnley and is struggling for form. burnley manager sean dyche insists that the rest of his players must share the goalscoring burden. ings has been linked with a move to manchester united or liverpool. everton lost 1-0 at burnley on saturday and have scored just one goal in their last seven matches.
aaron lennon has four games remaining of his loan spell at everton from tottenham. roberto martinez wants to get the most out of the winger in the time he has left at goodison park. martinez says discussions about the winger's future will come at the end of the season. reports have linked lenn on with a swap deal with kevin mirallas.
kevin mirallas has been linked with a move away from everton this season. roberto martinez admits to not knowing what the future holds for the belgian star.    martinez believes mirallas is happy and wants him to be part of the future at the club. the toffees host manchester united on sunday afternoon at goodison park.
leroy fer has not played since injuring his knee against sunderland back in february. the dutch midfielder could be rushed back for london derby at home to west ham. manager chris ramsey admits the club are taking a chance on the 25-year-old.
steve mcclaren has called speculation linking him with newcastle 'disrespectful'    john carver is the current incumbent in the newcastle hotseat. derby boss insists his sole focus is to get derby promoted to the premier league. mcclaren is understood to be one of two people on newcastle's short list for the job.
steve bruce is confident he can keep hull city in the premier league this season and avoid relegation. hull were beaten 2-0 by southampton on saturday and are two points clear of the drop zone. hull have six games to save their season after losing to southampton. ronald koeman's side moved up to fifth in the table.
alan pardew says crystal palace manager would sell yannick bolasie if offered £40-60million. pardew claims all of his players are 'undervalued' at selhurst park. the former newcastle boss says he would sell the winger if the right offer came in. palace boss pardew insists 'every player has a price'   pardew is ready to fend off big-money bids for several of his stars.
john carver says newcastle's hierarchy must try to end protests against the club. newcastle fans have planned a mass protest against owner mike ashley on saturday. at least 10,000 supporters boycotted the club's last home game against spurs. carver has called for unity at the club following a divisive season. the supporters' group have asked fans to stand in the 34th minute of swansea's match.
esteban cambiasso signed a one-year deal with leicester city last summer. the 34-year-old midfielder is wanted by delhi dynamos for india's i-league. leicester are currently 18th in the premier league. nigel pearson wants the former real madrid midfielder to stay at leicester. but leicester's premier league status may depend on his future.
thibaut verlinden is a highly regarded member of belgium's u16 squad. the 15-year-old midfielder is set to sign for stoke city this summer. mark hughes has also persuaded barcelona's mohamed el ouriachi to join.
romelu lukaku is everton's top scorer this season with 18 goals. the belgium striker faced abuse playing in youth teams back in his homeland. he used it as an added motivation to score goals for his side. the 21-year-old hailed the work rate of strike partner arouna kone, who allows him to focus on scoring.
southampton fans have not forgiven mauricio pochettino for leaving for spurs last year. southampton face tottenham at white hart lane on saturday. fans are planning to show their support for dutch manager ronald koeman by wearing orange.
queens park rangers are in the drop zone of the premier league with 28 points. chris ramsey believes his side will stay up with three wins from the last five games. rangers face west ham, liverpool, manchester city, newcastle and leicester. ramsey wants his side to improve their defensive concentration.
everton claimed a win over struggling burnley at goodison park on saturday. tom heaton produced a string of saves against everton and saved ross barkley's penalty. eden hazard starred for chelsea as they beat manchester united. craig gardner starred for west brom at crystal palace on his return to crystal palace.
england under 21 captain jack butland has revealed he voted for harry kane to win pfa young player of the year. butland hopes to emulate iker casillas by winning the european championship this summer. the 22-year-old joined gareth southgate and michael owen at st george's park.
brendan rodgers insists he is the man to guide liverpool to success. the liverpool manager is under pressure following the fa cup semi-final defeat by aston villa. rodgers has been boosted by the news that jordan henderson has committed his future to the club. the manager hopes raheem sterling will follow suit and commit his future.
swansea city are interested in signing blackburn rovers striker rudy gestede. garry monk has made signing a striker his priority for the summer. the benin international is rated at £7million by blackburn. anderlecht's aleksandar mitrovic and club brugge's obbi oulare have also attracted interest.
there are just four points separating the bottom five in the premier league with six games to go. leicester, burnley and qpr are the only teams in the relegation zone. sportsmail's reporters give their verdicts on the closest relegation run-in for years. danny ings needs to score regularly for burnley to stay up.
sebastien pocognoli says he's baffled by tony pulis' decision to drop him from the starting 11 at west brom. the left back says he doesn't understand why he's not playing for the club. the belgian defender was an important player under alan irvine at birmingham.
mark hughes has opened talks over a contract extension for in-demand goalkeeper asmir begovic. begovic has attracted interest from several top clubs, including real madrid. stoke boss mark hughes is keen to keep begovic at the club after stoke's 2-1 win over southampton on saturday.
leonardo ulloa opened the scoring for leicester city in the 15th minute at the king power stadium.   leicester moved off the bottom of the premier league table for the first time since november. andy king scored a late second goal to put leicester 2-0 up against swansea city.
adam rooney does not want to see celtic win the league on their patch on may 11. aberdeen are eight points ahead of second place and could win the title. rooney was nominated for the scotland player of the year. the irishman has netted 27 goals this season.
harry kane scored his 30th goal of the season for tottenham in their 3-1 win at newcastle united on sunday. the pfa player of the year nominee tops this week's ea sports' performance index. christian eriksen sits third in the rankings after scoring vs newcastle. eden hazard, nacer chadli and morgan schneiderlin also feature in the top 10.
west ham's season tickets will cost as little as £289 when the club move to the olympic stadium next year. manager sam allardyce says filling the stadium is the most important thing for any premier league club. the cheapest season ticket at upton park is £620.
andre blackman, 24, stole a jacket worth more than £1,000 from harrods in knightsbridge. he was ordered to carry out 40 hours of unpaid work at hammersmith magistrates' court.   blackman told the judge his attempts to find a new club might be hindered by the order. blackman has been told by blackpool boss lee clark that he is surplus to requirements.
west bromwich albion host liverpool at hawthorns on saturday. the baggies are eight points above the premier league relegation zone. head coach tony pulis believes his side can rise to the challenge of facing the top teams. manchester united, chelsea and arsenal face west brom in their final five games.
tottenham striker is nominated for both the pfa player and young player of the season awards. harry kane has scored 20 premier league goals for spurs this season. the young striker is being animated in a new animation. the video features some of kane's best goals and celebrations from the season.
chris sutton has branded additional official alan muir 'idiotic' for failing to see a handball by inverness defender josh meekings in sunday's scottish cup semi-final. the former hoops striker has called for more accountability for officials. celtic lost 1-0 to invernesses in the scottian cup final at celtic park.
inverness defender josh meekings handled a goal-bound header from celtic's leigh griffiths in sunday's scottish cup semi-final. inverness lost 3-2 after extra-time at the parkhead club. the sfa have served a retrospective notice of complaint to ban him from the final. but invernesses have vowed to 'vigorously defend' their player.
celtic lost 2-1 to inverness in the scottish cup semi-final after extra time. ronny deila was angry at the referee's decision to award a penalty and send off josh meekings. craig gordon was rightly sent off for fouling marley watkins. steven mclean also awarded a penalty but celtic missed it.    the parkhead side were denied a clear penalty and went on to lose the game.
john brown says celtic have a case of'sour grapes' about their recent scottish cup exit. the rangers legend was part of the ibrox side that lost to inverness in 1989.    brown says it is 'a bit of sour grapes' that rangers are frustrated with the officials.
stuart mccall says he is already looking at transfer targets for rangers for next season. interim ibrox boss still does not know if he will be in charge beyond the current campaign. rangers are currently in the play-off positions in the scottish championship.
celtic lost 3-2 to inverness in the scottish cup final at hampden park. john hartson has urged his former club to move on from the injustice. celtic are'seeking an understanding' of the failure to penalise josh meekings. the former striker had a goal wrongly disallowed for offside while playing for the club.
newcastle united owner mike ashley owns an 8.92 per cent stake in rangers. interim chairman paul murray and director john gilligan held talks with ashley on wednesday. the rangers board have held their first meeting with the sports direct owner.
walter smith says ally mccoist deserves a chance to prove himself a successful manager at a stable club. the ibrox legend worked closely with mccoist and coach kenny mcdowall at rangers. smith believes both men have something left to offer in football.
tim sherwood is confident aston villa can secure their premier league survival with five games remaining. villa are four points above the bottom three and face manchester city on saturday. manager sherwood could have striker gabriel agbonlahor back from a hamstring injury.
real madrid star isco has lost his place in the starting line-up at the bernabeu. the spaniard was dropped to the bench after james rodriguez's return to fitness. isco admitted he is unhappy with carlo ancelotti's decision to drop him. he returned to the starting xi for the champions league semi-final, but only due to injuries.
john brown says ally mccoist will be welcomed back to ibrox 'with open arms'    the club's record scorer was axed as manager but has been on garden leave since december. dave king is now chairman of the club and has appointed stuart mccall as interim boss.
bacary sagna left arsenal for manchester city last summer. the defender has only made 16 appearances for city this season and faces a year without a trophy. manuel pellegrini's side are fourth in the premier league, with arsenal second. sagna insists he would make the same decision again if he was faced with it.
arsene wenger has drawn five and lost seven of his 12 clashes with jose mourinho. the arsenal manager has failed to win in 12 games against the manager. arsenal face chelsea at the emirates stadium on sunday in the premier league. cesc fabregas will return to face his former club for the first time.
floyd mayweather spends up to three minutes in the cryotherapy bath after training. the bath is cooled to -175f (-115c) using liquid nitrogen to aid his recovery. mayweather's mega-fight against manny pacquiao is less than two weeks away. the boxer was the first person to use the bath in subzero recovery.
tottenham have won two of 10 premier league matches at 12.00pm this season. six of the 10 games have followed europa league games on thursday nights. tottenham bossmauricio pochettino has blamed the lunchtime kick-off for spurs' lethargy. hugo lloris will stay at the club even if they fail to qualify for the champions league.
bayern munich manager pep guardiola has yet to commit his future to the german giants. guardiola's contract expires at the end of the 2015-16 season. former bayern boss ottmar hitzfeld says lucien favre should replace guardiola at the allianz arena. monchengladbach boss favre is on course for champions league football next season.
pep guardiola will see out his three-year contract at bayern munich, claims ceo karl-heinz rummenigge. guardiola has been linked with a move to manchester city. the german champions reached the champions league semi-finals on wednesday. but guardiola 'would not go to a club like manchester'
real madrid face barcelona in the champions league semi-final in berlin on june 6. it would be the biggest match in europe's biggest competition. real madrid and barcelona have only met twice this season in la liga. real vs barcelona would be a great match-up for the world to watch.
former rangers chairman and manager walter smith hopes that the club can move on from its off-field dramas. smith stepped down as chairman of rangers two years ago. dave king is yet to obtain the sfa clearance to become chairman of the club. rangers face dumbarton in the scottish championship promotion play-offs.
manny pacquiao holds open workout at wild card gym in los angeles ahead of floyd mayweather fight. pacquaio takes on fl floyd mayweather on may 2 in the most lucrative fist fight in history. the filipino star opened up about his motivation and journey to the top in boxing. mayweather will be paid $120 million to win the bout at the mgm grand.
floyd mayweather is down to within three-and-a-half pounds of the welterweight limit ahead of mega-fight with manny pacquiao. mayweather was photographed taking the scales at 150.5 lbs for the wbc's mandatory weight check 30 days before the fight. the pair will go head-to-head at the mgm grand in las vegas on may 2.  mayweather is looking to extend his 47-fight unbeaten streak against the filipino.
manny pacquiao and trainer freddie roach laughed at the gift given by celebrity lawyer robert shapiro. the pacman was given a speed ball with the face of floyd mayweather's face painted on it. mayweather takes on the eight-division world champion in less than three weeks. the bout is billed as 'the biggest fight in history'   mayweather has been coping with hand injuries and a split lip.
floyd mayweather jnr faces manny pacquiao in the richest-ever boxing fight on may 2 in las vegas. mayweather will earn more than $100million in the mega-fight. he is the owner of his own boxing business and has his own gym. the boxer says he is proud of being his own boss.
floyd mayweather jnr continued his swimming routine ahead of manny pacquiao mega-fight. the boxer took to the pool to complete a few lengths as his trainer looked on. the two boxers meet in las vegas on may 2 in what is being dubbed the richest fight in boxing history.
floyd mayweather's fight against manny pacquiao will cost us viewers up to $100 (£67.48) on may 2. the fight is the most expensive in pay-per-view boxing history. tv companies hbo and showtime have confirmed the recommended prices for the fight. mayweather faces manny pacquiao in las vegas on may 2.
floyd mayweather takes on manny pacquiao in a £160million mega-fight in las vegas on may 2. actor mark wahlberg stopped by to see the filipino at training. mayweather released two pictures from his training camp appearing to hold a weight from his head.

holders sevilla will take on fiorentina for a place in this season's europa league final. napoli face dnipro for a spot in the warsaw final, which takes place on may 27. the draw for the last four was made at uefa's headquarters in nyon.
