floyd mayweather took to his shots account to upload a picture inside his private jet on wednesday. mayweather faces manny pacquiao in the most expensive bout in boxing history on may 2 in las vegas. boxing legend muhammad ali wants to beat mayweather, according to his daughter.
arsene wenger should be given two more years at arsenal, according to nigel winterburn. jurgen klopp has announced he will leave dortmund at the end of the season. klopp would be perfect for arsenal but the club should keep faith with wenger, says the gunners legend.
thomas tuchel will replace jurgen k klopp as manager of borussia dortmund at the start of july. k klopp announced he was leaving dortmund after seven years at the end of the season. the 41-year-old will take over on a three-year deal. both tuchel and k klopp have been manager of mainz before. tuchell is currently seeing out the final year of his mainz contract and taking a year-long break from football.
usain bolt took three shots on the basketball court and converted all three on a trip in brazil. the jamaican sprinter is in rio de janeiro to promote an event. bolt has admitted that the 2016 olympics will be his last. the six-time gold-medal sprinter visited a small gym in mangueira favela on thursday.
kenya's athletics federation has suspended two management companies ahead of doping investigations. volare sports and rosa & associati have been banned from working in kenya for six months. marathon world record holder dennis kimetto's agent has been banned. kenyan authorities have blamed the rise in doping on foreign agents.
usain bolt wants to beat his own 200-metre world record by running under 19 seconds. the jamaican sprinter ran the distance in 19.19 sec at the 2009 world championships in berlin. bolt insists he is almost impossible to beat when he is fully fit. the six-time olympic gold medallist is currently in rio de janeiro.
red is the colour of the football league based on the party holding each club's constituency. 18 of the 20 premier league clubs are in labour consituencies. the conservatives have 29 and the liberal democrats only seven. ed miliband's party has mps in 55 of the 92 clubs in the top four divisions.
matt derbyshire opened the scoring after four minutes for rotherham. ross mccormack equalised for steve evans' side in the 67th minute. kit symons admitted his side were second best and need to rebuild in the summer.
tiger woods finished 5-under-par at the masters on sunday. the four-time masters champion drilled his club into a tree root on the ninth hole at augusta. the 39-year-old was forced to drop his club and scream in agony. woods claimed he popped a ligament in his right wrist back into place. the american finished 13 strokes behind jordan spieth.
rotherham fielded derby defender farrend rawson in the 1-0 win over brighton on easter monday. steve evans believes a decision is imminent on a possible points deduction for rotherham. the football league are investigating the millers for fielding an ineligible player. the club played rawson after his youth loan had expired.
real madrid defender raphael varane filmed the team's entrance to the santiago bernabeu. fans mobbed the team coach and banged on the windows as real arrived to play atletico madrid. javier hernandez scored the winning goal in the 88th minute against atletico in the champions league.
paris saint-germain were thrashed 5-1 on aggregate by barcelona in the champions league quarter-final. coach laurent blanc says his side are still not ready to win the competition. blaise matuidi says that psg need more time to reach the top.
newcastle united fans have planned a mass protest against owner mike ashley on saturday. supporters' group have asked fans to stand in the 34th minute of st james' park match against swansea. newcastle have lost their last six premier league games under caretaker manager john carver. garry monk insists newcastle's players will not be affected by the protests.
joe launchbury has been out since october due to a nerve problem caused by a bulging disc in his neck. wasps lock is hopeful of making his comeback against leicester tigers on may 9. launchbury could make his debut at the club's new home at the ricoh arena. the 24-year-old still has aspirations of playing for england at the world cup.
napoli manager rafael benitez is out of contract this summer. the spaniard has won 12 trophies since 2002 with valencia, liverpool, chelsea and napoli. manchester city, paris st germain and real madrid are all considering changes. the 55-year-old has won the europa league twice with napoli and is a man in demand.
yaya toure's agent dimitri seluk wants to meet with manchester city to discuss the midfielder's future. toure has hinted that he is open to leaving the etihad stadium this summer. the 31-year-old has two years left on his current contract at manchester.
jack wilshere was on the bench for arsenal against reading after five months out through injury. ray parlour has backed the 23-year-old to be the future of the club. but the club legend fears his injury record could turn him into another abou diaby. arsene wenger's side face aston villa in the fa cup final on saturday.
manchester united have over eight million followers on weibo, almost double that of twitter. guangzhou evergrande taobao are third on the list of clubs with most weibo followers. arsenal are the most popular premier league club globally with 5.68million followers. china's government outlaws twitter as they seek to control the media.
alexis sanchez has scored 22 goals in all competitions for arsenal this season. the chilean forward has been nominated for pfa player of the year award. sanchez signed from barcelona last summer. the forward has singled out team-mate and fellow attacker santi cazorla as a'spectacular' player. arsenal are currently second in the premier league table.
patrice evra believes juventus played 'ugly' against monaco in the champions league quarter-final. massimiliano allegri's team beat monaco 1-0 at the stade louis ii on wednesday night. paul pogba is likely to miss the semi-finals .
bafetimbi gomis injured his hamstring in swansea's 1-1 draw with everton last weekend. the striker will miss three to four weeks with a grade two hamstring strain. the frenchman had scored four in his last seven matches after excelling since wilfried bony's departure.
barcelona and bayern munich are in the champions league semi-finals. real madrid and juventus both won on wednesday to reach the last four of the competition. lionel messi, neymar and luis suarez lead the line for barcelona in the semi-final line-up. bayern will face bayern in the final in berlin on june 6.
john peacock has named his squad for next month's uefa european under-17 championship in bulgaria. england are the defending champions and are in group d with holland, italy and republic of ireland. chris willock and stephy mavididi have been called up to the squad for the first time. herbie kane and trent arnold also included in the squad.
police appeal to track down fans who tended to the wounded at hillsborough disaster 26 years ago. images released as part of ongoing home office inquiry into disaster which killed 96 liverpool fans. investigators believe those pictured may be able to answer questions of victims' families. images are 26 years old but investigators believe they may help track down key witnesses.
jordan spieth visited to the observation deck of the empire state building on monday. the masters champion was still proudly sporting his green jacket. spieth broke several scoring records on the way to his four-stroke victory at augusta. he is the second-youngest masters champion of all time. justin rose missed a putt on the 16th that set spieth on his way to victory.
jordan henderson is 'over the moon' after signing a new long-term contract with liverpool. the midfielder put pen to paper on a deal worth more than £100,000 per week. the deal will keep him at liverpool until the summer of 2020. liverpool vice captain could be handed the armband when steven gerrard leaves the club.
chelsea manager jose mourinho was in the crowd to watch marcus bettinelli in fulham's 1-1 draw against rotherham. the 22-year-old goalkeeper could potentially provide back-up for thibaut courtois at chelsea. second choice goalkeeper petr cech is expected to leave the club in the summer.
bayern munich lost 3-1 away at porto in the champions league on tuesday. pep guardiola is confident his team will overturn the scoreline at home in the semi-final. guardiola's side lead the bundesliga by 12 points and are in the german cup semi-finals. franck ribery is set to miss bayern's home game against porto because of an ankle injury.
gareth bale has not started eight of real madrid's 50 matches this season. carlo ancelotti's side have won all of their eight matches without the welshman. bale missed wednesday night's champions league win over atletico due to injury. real have a 69 per cent win record without the £86million man.
thiago alcantara would never have signed for manchester united even if david moyes wanted him. pep guardiola wanted to sign thiago from bayern munich. but moye wasn't keen on the midfielder and he wasn't the right fit for united. thiago is one of the best passers of the ball in the world. he dictated the pace of the game from deep for bayern in their 6-1 win over porto.
southampton are only ranked 16th in the premier league in terms of wage bill but are seventh in the league. chelsea are 10 points clear at the top of the table but are only the third-highest wage payers with £192.7m. manchester united have the highest wage bill with £215.8m. qpr's salary bill was almost twice what the club earned last season.
manchester united keeper david de gea has been linked with a move to real madrid this summer. phil neville says keeping the keeper at the club would be the biggest signing manchester united could make. the spanish keeper has impressed for louis van gaal's side this season.
manchester united are reported to have put in a £21.5m bid for dortmund captain mats hummels. dortmund value their captain at £35million but united want to sign him for £35m . d dortmund want to bring in real madrid's sami khedira as their new captain for next season.
manchester united chief executive ed woodward held talks with monaco president vasim vasilyev on sunday. manchester united could sign radamel falcao permanently at the end of the season. the striker has scored just four goals on loan at man united this season. under the terms of the loan united would have to pay £43.5m for the striker but monaco are willing to negotiate.
rafael cracked three ribs during manchester united's u21 clash with leicester. the brazilian right-back is surplus to requirements and will be sold in the summer. the 24-year-old was hurt by a stray knee from leicester's anthony knockaert. united have handed trials to mk dons teenagers luke tingey and kyran wiltshire.
adam federici let alexis sanchez's shot go over the line in saturday's fa cup semi-final. reading lost 2-1 to arsenal in extra-time after the game finished 1-1 after 90 minutes. federici has taken to twitter to apologise to reading's fans for his error.
bayern munich beat porto 6-1 at the allianz arena to reach the champions league semi-finals. pep guardiola scored a hat-trick in the second leg of the quarter-final victory. the win takes bayern's goals total for the season to 115. bayern still have five bundesliga matches to play before the final in berlin on june 6.
uefa have published champions league regulations for next season. top-seeded teams will be champions league winner plus title holders in seven highest-ranked countries. arsenal, atletico madrid and porto could drop down in the pots for the group stages. psv eindhoven could also benefit from the change.
louis van gaal has been impressed with michael carrick's contribution to manchester united this season. manager has identified borussia dortmund's ilkay gundogan as a long-term successor to carrick. carrick is in the twilight of his career at old trafford. united could make a move for the 24-year-old in the summer.
barcelona beat paris saint-germain 2-0 at the nou camp to reach the champions league semi-finals. luis enrique's side beat psg 5-1 on aggregate in the quarter-final. neymar is a blend of cristiano ronaldo and lionel messi in his skillset. psg project needs more investment and edinson cavani is a brilliant centre-forward. barcelona look like genuine treble contenders and are on the cusp of winning the title.
paris saint-germain defender david luiz was at fault for both goals as barcelona beat psg 2-0 in champions league quarter-final. itv pundit roy keane described the defender as 'lost'   keane offered his sympathy to the £50million former chelsea man.
former england footballer is selling a £6.75million penthouse in exclusive neighbourhood of chelsea. campbell has threatened to leave the country if labour wins the election. he is an outspoken critic of labour's mansion tax and has sold a £20million townhouse this year.
premier league club are confident that the deal to move into the olympic stadium does not contravene domestic or european legislation. west ham are set to move to the london 2012 showpiece venue for the start of 2016-17 season. fresh questions were raised about the award of the 99-year lease to west ham on tuesday.
bayern munich thrashed porto 6-1 at the allianz arena on tuesday night. pep guardiola's side are through to the champions league semi-finals. bayern lost 3-1 to porto in the first leg of the semi-final last week. guardiola was pleased with his side's first-half performance against porto.
alexis sanchez scored twice as arsenal beat reading 2-1 in the fa cup semi-final at wembley on saturday. the chile international will play in the 2015 fa cup final next month. sanchez has scored 22 goals for arsenal in his first season in the premier league. arsene wenger's side host league leaders chelsea at the emirates stadium on sunday.
adam federici let alexis sanchez's shot cross the line in the fa cup semi-final. reading lost 2-1 to arsenal at wembley on saturday evening. steve clarke has backed federici to bounce back against birmingham in the sky bet championship.
bayern munich beat porto 7-4 on aggregate to reach champions league semi-finals. pep guardiola's side had lost the first leg 3-1 to porto in portugal last week. guardiola said after the game that winning is a matter of life and death at bayern.
barcelona beat paris saint-germain 2-0 in the champions league quarter-final second-leg. andres iniesta scored both goals in the opening half of barcelona's win. the 30-year-old had failed to register a single assist or goal this season. iniesta claimed he 'never went away' after a superb first-half performance against psg.
john higgins beat robert milkins 10-5 in the first round of the betfred world championship. graeme dott beat ricky walden 10-8. four-time winner higgins is bidding to win a fifth world title at the crucible.
barry hawkins beat matthew selt 10-9 in the first round of the world snooker championship. selt won five frames in a row to launch a comeback at the crucible. but hawkins kept his composure to win a final frame decider. hawkins looked set to progress to the second round after leading 7-2.
deshane beckford has impressed on trial at premier league outfit west ham. the 17-year-old has impressed after spending two weeks with the club. west ham are discussing a deal for the jamaican starlet. season tickets at the olympic stadium will cost as little as £289.
kenny bayless will referee floyd mayweather and manny pacquiao's super-fight on may 2 in las vegas. bayless is widely considered the leading referee in the world. he will celebrate his 65th birthday two days after the mega-fight.
ian poulter was dressed all in purple on sunday for his final round at the masters. jordan spieth collected £1.23million for winning the masters at augusta national. tiger woods and rory mcilroy were paired together for the final round. phil mickelson opted for an all-black outfit as he tried to win the masters for a fourth time. england's danny willett hit three rounds of 71 but was let down by a final round of 76.
kenny bayless will referee the match between floyd mayweather and manny pacquiao on may 2. the veteran referee has overseen five of mayweather's previous fights. oscar de la hoya believes mayweather will benefit from the appointment of bayless. the 64-year-old will pocket $25,000 for the night's work.
andy murray married kim sears at dunblane cathedral on saturday afternoon. the tennis star tied the knot in front of thousands of fans and friends and family at 4.00pm. andy's mother judy murray was a guest at the ceremony and arrived at the cathedral in a gold dress. the wedding is due to take place at the 12th century cathedral and is being held in the rain.
glenn roeder is part of a new managerial committee at championship side sheffield wednesday. former hull city chairman adam pearson helped lead hull to the premier league. head coach stuart gray is also part of the task force at the club. dejphon chansiri recently bought the club from milan mandaric.
bayern munich lost 3-1 to porto in the champions league quarter-final last week. xabi alonso could become only the second player to win champions league with three different teams. clarence seedorf is the only other player to have done so. alonso won the title with liverpool and real madrid in his first season at liverpool.
there are 23 current and former premier league players still involved in the champions league quarter-finals. seven have manchester united connections. chelsea, arsenal, manchester, liverpool and manchester city all knocked out of europe's top competition. dimitar berbatov, javier hernandez and patrice evra are among those still playing.
tim sherwood has had an inspired start in charge of aston villa. the former tottenham boss has won five of his first ten games in charge. christian benteke has flourished under sherwood and has scored nine in his last seven for villa . fabian delph has been handed key responsibilities at villa and is a real leader under new management.
west ham lost 2-0 to manchester city at the etihad on sunday afternoon. sam allardyce was furious at the fourth official robert madley during the defeat. the hammers boss was furious because a foul by eliaquim mangala on stewart downing was missed. manuel pellegrini also screamed at the linesman during the game.
west ham lost 2-0 to manchester city at the etihad on sunday. the hammers have just one win in 11 premier league games this season. defender carl jenkinson insists the club are determined to finish in mid-table. the hammers are currently bottom of the table.
manchester city director of football txiki begiristain is keen for bayern munich manager pep guardiola to become their new manager in 2016. manuel pellegrini has come under-fire this season. guardiola is facing his first champions league exit prior to the semi-final stages of his coaching career. bayern lost 3-1 at porto in the champions league quarter-finals on tuesday night.
martina hingis defeated 6-4, 6-0 by agnieszka radwanska in her first return to singles since 2007. former world no 1 was playing for switzerland in the fed cup for the first time since 2007 . the 34-year-old was persuaded to play because of injuries in the switzerland team and to secure a spot on the olympic team.
bayern munich have joined manchester united and liverpool in the race to sign memphis depay. the psv eindhoven star has been compared to a young cristiano ronaldo by ronald de boer. liverpool hope to convince the 21-year-old to sign for them. psv value depay at £25million and he is valued at £20m by psv.
arsenal's fa cup semi-final victory over reading clashed with premier league clash on saturday. luke shaw was in good form against chelsea, and may have changed his diet. joe root's celebration of his two wickets in the first test was criticised by alan smith. giles clarke missed the test in antigua because he was in dubai.
liverpool have been given permission to install a 4.5metre fine mesh privacy screen at their melwood training ground. the club had grown concerns over confidentiality of team details being leaked prior to matches. local residents wanted a designated area for fans to watch training and did not want a screen.
steven gerrard's liverpool career will end at stoke's britannia stadium on sunday, may 24. the captain's final game at anfield as a liverpool player will come in the premier league against crystal palace on may 16. liverpool captain hoped to end his 25-year association with liverpool in fa cup final at wembley. but liverpool lost to aston villa in sunday's semi-final at stamford bridge.
manchester united lost 1-0 to chelsea at stamford bridge in the premier league on saturday. eden hazard scored the only goal of the game in the 38th minute. louis van gaal's side dominated possession and dominated the game. united boss van gaal's team are coming to challenge for the title next season. united are considering an approach for juventus midfielder paul pogba in the next transfer window.
jose mourinho has named eden hazard as one of the three best players in the world. hazard scored the winner against manchester united and is in superb form for chelsea. hazard is widely expected to be named pfa player of the year on sunday.
liverpool manager brendan rodgers could see up to 10 of his stars leave after another trophyless season. captain steven gerrard has already agreed to join la galaxy. glen johnson and kolo toure are both out of contract and set to leave on a free transfer. jordan henderson agreed a new £100,000-a-week deal until 2020 on monday night.
michael conlan was on the verge of pulling out of his must-win bout in world series of boxing. the two-time bronze medallist booked his place at the rio 2016 olympic games in venezuela. conlan beat josé vicente azocar to book his place. paddy barnes beat yoel finol to top the 49kg wsb rankings.
amir khan could be set to face manny pacquiao in abu dhabi. floyd mayweather is preparing to face mayweather on may 2 in vegas. khan has been close to fighting mayweather for two years. mayweather and mayweather could face each other in a re-match in winter.
juventus are monitoring liverpool wideman raheem sterling's situation at liverpool. the italian champions elect want at least £55m for midfielder paul pogba and have bid for axel witsel. manchester city, chelsea and real madrid are also interested in the winger.
tom cleverley helped aston villa reach the fa cup final after beating liverpool 2-1 on sunday. tom cleverley says tim sherwood has brought an attacking style of football to villa. villa face arsenal in the final on may 30 after reaching the semi-final. christian benteke and fabian delph scored in the win at wembley.
manuel pellegrini should have given frank lampard more game time at manchester city. phil jagielka is five games away from going a complete season without getting a single booking. tom cleverley has found a steely edge since tim sherwood took charge at aston villa. didier drogba covered more ground at sprint speed than manchester united's radamel falcao.
david moyes gave wayne rooney his professional debut as a 16-year-old at everton back in 2002. manchester united manager succeeded sir alex ferguson in the summer of 2013. rooney was heavily linked with a move to chelsea at the same time. jose mourinho was also interested in signing the england striker.
manny pacquiao's shorts will carry sponsorship logos worth a total of £1.5m in sponsorship when he fights floyd mayweather on may 2. pacman's shorts alone will carry sponsor logos worth $2.25m. mayweather and pacman will fight at mgm grand garden arena in the richest fight of all time.
liverpool lost 2-1 to aston villa in the fa cup semi-final at wembley on sunday. brendan rodgers' side are under scrutiny after the defeat. rodgers has underperformed this season and must accept criticism. the club's transfer committee and owners fenway sports group are also under pressure. liverpool are heading for mediocrity after a disappointing season.
manchester united lost 1-0 at chelsea in the premier league on saturday. eden hazard scored the only goal of the game at stamford bridge. louis van gaal labelled his side's performance as their best of the season. manchester united ace wayne rooney was happy with the performance.
manchester united travel to stamford bridge to face chelsea in the premier league on saturday afternoon. marouane fellaini has been in brilliant form for manchester united in recent weeks. goalkeeper thibaut courtois believes his side have a plan to deal with the midfielder. the goalkeeper believes eden hazard will be collecting the pfa player of the year award.
eden hazard has been the best player in the premier league this season. the chelsea forward scored the only goal of the game in 1-0 win over united at stamford bridge. hazard is now the player you look to in a crisis. jose mourinho's side will win the league now.
eden hazard opened the scoring for chelsea in the 13th minute at stamford bridge. manchester united keeper david de gea was at fault for the opening goal of the game. jose mourinho's side move up to second in the premier league table with the win.
manchester united beat chelsea 1-0 at stamford bridge in the premier league on saturday. eden hazard scored the only goal of the game in the first half. ander herrera was denied a late penalty for diving against gary cahill. jose mourinho said the incident will be forgotten because it was a manchester united player.
chelsea beat manchester united 1-0 at stamford bridge on saturday. eden hazard scored the only goal of the game. jose mourinho's side need just two more wins to clinch the premier league title. john terry led the chelsea celebrations after the win.   but the manager has warned his players they still have work to do.
john terry insists chelsea need two wins from their last six to win the premier league title. jose mourinho's side beat manchester united 1-0 at stamford bridge to move 10 points clear at the top. eden hazard scored the only goal of the game in the second half.
bournemouth drew 2-2 with sheffield wednesday at dean court on saturday afternoon. bournemouth went from top to third to second to top to second in the space of two minutes. eddie howe's side were unbeaten in 10 league games before the draw. chris maguire scored an injury time penalty to salvage a draw for the owls.
paul scholes co-owns salford city with gary neville, nicky butt, phil neville and ryan giggs. the club is currently top of the evo-stik league first division north.   with one week to go promotion is well and truly in the hands of the former manchester united players.
radamel falcao hasn't scored or had a shot on target for manchester united since january 31. the colombian striker is on a season-long loan at old trafford from monaco. manchester lost 1-0 at chelsea in the premier league on saturday . the striker has failed to score since and has collected £3,080,000 in wages since.
andres iniesta made his debut for barcelona during the 2002-03 season. manchester united boss louis van gaal gave iniesta his debut as manager of barcelona. iniesta has praised manchesterunited boss for his trust in him to make his debut.    iniesta also admitted his winning goal at stamford bridge was one of the highlights of his career.
reading drew 1-1 with arsenal in the fa cup semi-final at wembley stadium. steve clarke's side were flat in the first-half and struggled to match arsene wenger's side. garath mccleary scored a late equaliser but adam federici's goalkeeping error allowed arsenal to win in extra time. clarke will hope the performance will inspire a return to the premier league.
manchester united to introduce living wage at old trafford in july. all premier league clubs have agreed to pay the living wage from the start of the 2016-17 season. but united officials have decided to implement the salary a year early. staff at manchester united will be paid £7.85 an hour.
wayne rooney knows manchester united will be playing for 'pride' against manchester city at old trafford on sunday. louis van gaal's side have lost their last four meetings against city. united captain rooney is the leading united scorer in derby history with 11 goals. united are four points clear of city in the premier league table.
everton forward kevin mirallas opened the scoring on his return to the first team at goodison park. ashley barnes was sent off on the stroke of half time for two bookable offences. ross barkley missed a penalty for everton but aaron lennon converted from the spot to give the visitors the lead.
rotor volgograd beat manchester united in the first round of the uefa cup in 1995. the russian outfit were competing in the second division of russia's third tier. manchester united drew 0-0 with rotor in russia before being eliminated on away goals. the club have been wound up after going bankrupt.
everton forward steven naismith has won the barclays spirit of the game award for his selfless charity work and contributions to the local community. the 28-year-old teamed up with job centre plus to offer unemployed fans the opportunity to watch the club. barclay's community leader maria branigan says naismatic has done 'fantastic work within the community'
roberto martinez says burnley's players remind him of his old wigan side when they avoided the drop. sean dyche's side are two points from safety in the premier league. everton face the clarets at goodison park on saturday afternoon. martinez believes burnley have a fearlessness in their squad.
manny pacquiao takes on floyd mayweather in las vegas on may 2. the filipino boxer has promoted a range of t-shirts ahead of the bout. fans can buy four shirts commemorating the 'fight of the century'   three of the shirts cost $29.99 (321) and one is priced at $24.99 (£21)
ross barkley missed a 10th minute penalty as everton beat burnley 1-0 at goodison park. roberto martinez took the penalty despite the presence of leighton baines on the pitch. barkley has scored 15 penalties from 16 attempts in the premier league. everton boss martinez defended barkley's decision to take the penalty.
tickets for floyd mayweather and manny pacquiao's fight have yet to go on public sale. the two camps and mgm grand are locked in a stand-off over allotments for the tickets. mayweather's promoter said tickets would go on sale this week for the may 2 bout. but mgm officials have been tight-lipped about their availability. estimated gate for the fight is already £48million and prices have tripled in the resale market.
belgium striker christian benteke has two years left on his contract at aston villa but harbours ambitions to play in europe. tim sherwood will consider selling the 24-year-old in the summer if he wants to leave the club. the striker has scored eight goals in his last six matches for villa.
laura robson has not played since the 2014 australian open more than 15 months ago. the former british no 1 has been training in florida as she nears a return to action. the 21-year-old shared a picture of her in an ice bath as she cooled down in the heat.
jamie redknapp and thierry henry face off in the studio ahead of floyd mayweather vs manny pacquiao. the sky sports pundits joke around in anticipation of the big fight. both men collapse into giggles as they try to maintain the mock tension. mayweather and manny pacquiao are set to fight in two weeks.
martin skrtel says steven gerrard is still one of the best players in the world. liverpool captain is aiming to end his liverpool career by making the fa cup final and beating arsenal. skrtels believes liverpool have the players to replace the departing captain. gerrards is set to feature in the semi-final against aston villa at anfield on sunday.
brendan rodgers leads liverpool in the fa cup semi-final against aston villa on sunday. rodgers believes cup glory would help his players develop a stronger winning mentality. liverpool's last trophy success came in the league cup under kenny dalglish in 2012. steven gerrard is looking to win a trophy in his last game at liverpool.
mark hughes believes tom jones' song 'delilah' is costing stoke a spot in the europe league. stoke are 17th in the premier league fair play table. the potters have been singing the song as their unofficial club anthem since the 1980s. hughes' side are set to miss out on european football next year.
barcelona boss luis enrique has urged his side to switch their attention back to the la liga title race. barcelona face valencia at the nou camp on saturday in the champions league. real madrid travel to face malaga and carlo ancelotti's side are without karim benzema. andreas iniesta has been ruled out of barcelona's clash with valencia.
luis suarez scored a brace in barcelona's 3-1 win over psg in the champions league quarter final. the barcelona forward nutmegged paris saint-germain defender david luiz twice. suarez says it was the quickest way to goal for him. barca beat psg at the nou camp in the first leg of the tie.
zlatan ibrahimovic has had his four-game ban reduced by one match after successfully appealing to the french olympic committee. dimitri payet also had his ban reduced after an appeal to the ligue 1 committee. both players were banned for abusing referees after psg's defeat to bordeaux. ibrahimova was initially banned for three games and payet for two.
uefa's general secretary gianni infantino says there will be no choice but to suspend greece from international football. greek government have proposed new laws banning teams from european competitions. uefa and fifa say it is direct government interference in football.
stephan lichtsteiner played with eden hazard at lille and paul pogba at juventus. the juventus defender has tipped kingsley coman to be the next big thing. he says coman has all the attributes to be a'very good striker'    juventus face monaco in the champions league quarter-final on wednesday night.
gareth bale is out of real madrid's champions league quarter-final second leg against atletico. the wales international injured his calf against malaga on saturday. carlo ancelotti's side face city rivals at the santiago bernabeu on wednesday night. bale took to facebook to wish his team-mates good luck.
manchester united's reserve side drew 1-1 at leicester's king power stadium. harry panayiotou put leicester in the lead after 18 minutes with a header. sean goss equalised for manchester united in the 32nd minute. rafael and adnan januzaj both limped off in the first half with rib injuries. robin van persie and jonny evans were both reintroduced to the side for the reserve match.

diego simeone believes english football needs to 'wake up' after this season's poor showing in europe. chelsea, arsenal and manchester city were eliminated from champions league last 16. atletico madrid take on rivals real madrid in champions league quarter-final second leg on wednesday night. carlo ancelotti's side travel to the bernabeu for the clash.
nathaniel clyne is yet to sign a new contract at southampton. the england right-back is in the final year of his current deal at the club. manchester united, chelsea and manchester untied are interested in signing him. but southampton fear he has already decided to leave the club and could leave.
qpr striker charlie austin has 17 goals so far this season and will leave loftus road in the summer. newcastle, crystal palace and southampton have also expressed interest in the striker. everton were among premier league clubs who watched club brugge forward obbi oulare on sunday.
brentford owner matthew benham is considering appointing gianfranco zola as new manager. mark warburton is to leave the club next month after feeling his vision did not match that of brentford. the italian was manager of watford for a season in 2012. zola was sacked by cagliari last month after a winless spell in serie a.
robert green has won 12 england caps but made a calamitous error in the world cup against usa in 2010. sam allardyce says green can rival joe hart for england no 1 spot. green faces his former club west ham at loftus road on saturday.
manchester united and liverpool target memphis depay has held talks with paris st germain. manchester united are interested in signing the holland winger for £25million. louis van gaal gave depay his international debut but could miss out on signing him. depay is interested in playing with zlatan ibrahimovic at united.
real madrid striker javier hernandez scored a late champions league winner against atletico madrid. the on-loan mexican striker celebrated his goal 'like he had just won the world cup'   but former liverpool defender and pundit jamie carragher was quick to criticise the striker for his celebration. henry believes the striker needs to thank cristiano ronaldo for his goal.

thierry henry posted an 84-minute compilation video of michael laudrup's passing. former arsenal striker criticised javier hernandez's celebration after scoring winning goal for real madrid against rivals atletico. henry said the mexican striker celebrated 'like he'd won the world cup'   henry later defended his views on twitter, saying he owed everything to team-mate cristiano ronaldo.
amir khan will fight chris algieri at the barclays center in new york on friday, may 29. kell brook is going to fight frankie gavin at london's 02 arena but has called out khan. khan has slammed brook for his recent comments.
ricky hatton says manny pacquiao has the style to beat floyd mayweather in the fight of the century on may 2 in las vegas. hatton also says having trainer freddie roach in his corner gives him a huge advantage. but hatton warns mayweather to stay away from bolton boxer amir khan.
kell brook will fight frankie gavin at the o2 in london on may 30. brook beat jo jo dan for the ibf world welterweight title in sheffield last month.   brook had been desperate to face bitter rival amir khan at wembley in june.
floyd mayweather takes on manny pacquiao in a $300 million mega-fight on may 2. mayweather believes he is a better boxer than muhammad ali. ali suffered a shock defeat to leon spinks in 1978. ali adopted 'rope-a-dope' tactics against george foreman.
the marketing team for floyd mayweather and manny pacquiao put together the 30-second clip. it was filmed in a los angeles studio on march 11. both fighters square up in the middle of a desert road to advertise the pay-per-view event. the fight on may 2 is expected to break the pay per view record of £102m.
manny pacquiao and floyd mayweather will go head-to-head in a $300million mega-fight at the mgm grand in las vegas on may 2. manny's trainer freddie roach believes his man is better equipped to beat mayweather now than he was in 2010. the pair came close to agreeing a bout five years ago but it fell through.
bob arum pulled the plug on manny pacquiao's last conference call. many more callers were jamming the lines. floyd mayweather is due for his final conference call this wednesday. arum believes mass telephone talk-ins are a waste of time.
blackpool chairman karl oyston denies five football association charges for allegedly abusive text messages. oyston labelled a supporter a'retard' in a series of messages. the seasiders' chairman still faces a ban from football activities. he has been the target of fan protests at the club this season.
british boxer amir khan is currently training for his upcoming fight against chris algieri on may 29 at the barclays center in new york. the 28-year-old took a break from his training session to perform a party trick with an empty bottle. the bolton-born fighter delivered a flurry of punches as he kept the bottle in the air.
hull, leicester and swansea city are following poland international winger maciej rybus. hull's chief scout has watched the 25-year-old playing for russian side terek grozny. he impressed during poland's 1-1 draw with republic of ireland last month.
celtic managerronny deila has called for josh meekings to be spared a scottish cup final ban. the defender was retrospectively suspended for one match for handball in the semi-final defeat to inverness on sunday. meeking blocked a goal-bound goal with his hand. celtic lost 2-1 at dundee in the premiership final.
manuel pellegrini's side need eight homegrown players for their first-team squad next season. frank lampard, scott sinclair, micah richards and james milner are all set to leave. premier league champions will not compromise on quality and will ask about raheem sterling's availability. everton want at least £50m for ross barkley but city are interested in signing danny ings.
cheltenham town manager gary johnson got every player to pledge to give his all when he took over. cheltenham have two games left to preserve their league two status. johnson wrote 'i promise to do all i can' on a sheet of paper and asked players to sign it.
mauricio pochettino has questioned the logic of blooding more academy players at tottenham. harry kane, nabil bentaleb and ryan mason are all products of spurs' youth system. but the manager says he will be cautious in his approach to signing more players. hugo lloris wants to play champions league football with spurs next season.
manager micky adams has left the club by mutual consent. tranmere are bottom of the football league with two games to go. barnet and bristol rovers are battling it out for promotion to the national league. hartlepool are in the play-off places after a 3-0 win over professional oxford.
micky adams has left tranmere by mutual consent after just two games of the season. fans called for the manager to leave the club after their 3-0 defeat by oxford on saturday. adams' side are bottom of sky bet league two and two points adrift of safety. the former leicester boss joined the club in october.
burton albion secured promotion to sky bet league one after a 2-1 win at morecambe. lucas akins scored both goals as jimmy floyd hasselbaink's side secured promotion. bury are fourth in league two after a 1-0 win against portsmouth. shrewsbury town are a win away from a return to league one with a 1 -0 win at york city.
steven gerrard and frank lampard to be honoured by the pfa at annual awards ceremony on sunday. the two england midfielders will leave the premier league at the end of the season. the pair have amassed 19 major trophies between them. both players have retired from international football.
elliot kear has spent most of the year playing rugby union for london welsh after leaving bradford. kear will return to rugby league's championship with london broncos after a season with welsh. the 26-year-old is a wales rugby league international.
aaron cresswell is a reported target for chelsea and manchester city. sam allardyce claims no club has made an offer for the left back. the 25-year-old has starred for west ham this season, scoring twice in the premier league. but manager believes he would be better off staying at the club to develop his game.
javier hernandez scored in the 88th minute to send real madrid through to the champions league semi-final. the mexican striker scored 'the goal of his life' for madrid.   michael carrick and cristiano ronaldo led the tributes to the manchester united striker after the game.
featherstone prop james lockwood has been banned for two years after failing a doping test. lockwood tested positive for growth hormone releasing factors in an out-of-competition test. it is the first finding of its kind in the uk. the 29-year-old former dewsbury forward was handed the ban by uk anti-doping.
rafael benitez has been linked with the managerial job at sampdoria. sinisa mihajlovic is being lined up to replace the spaniard at napoli. but massimo ferrero has quashed rumours that a job swap is imminent. napoli travel to face samp doria in the serie a on sunday.
napoli boss rafael benitez has dismissed reports linking him to the manchester city job. the spaniard is out of contract at the end of the season and has yet to sign a contract extension with napoli. it has been rumoured he could replace manuel pellegrini at the helm of manchester.
ian watson's last game was as player-coach in the championship for swinton last june. salford assistant coach is poised to come out of his playing retirement at the age of 38. head coach iestyn harris has stepped up his training ahead of sunday's game against castleford.
three cars were broken into during bradford's defeat by hull kr at odsal stadium on sunday. bulls are investigating reports that cars were vandalised in the richard dunn sports centre car park. the championship club say three cars were damaged during the match.
john helm was commentating on bradford city's game against lincoln city when the fire broke out on may 11, 1985. the fire at valley parade stadium claimed 56 lives and injured 265. martin fletcher has suggested the fire may not have been an accident. helm says there is no evidence to suggest the blaze was caused deliberately.
toulon winger bryan habana scored the only try of the game in extra-time against leinster at stade velodrome. leigh halfpenny kicked 20 points from six penalties and a conversion for the irish province. ian madigan kicked five penalties and two conversions for the hosts. leinsters face clermont auvergne in the heineken cup final attwickenham on saturday.
new book claims fire at bradford's valley parade stadium was one of at least nine fires connected to then club chairman stafford heginbotham. judge oliver popplewell says police should look at eight other fires allegedly connected to the club chairman to'see if there was anything sinister'   the fire at valley parade killed 56 people and injured 265 on may 11, 1985.
former sports minister gerry sutcliffe does not believe a new inquiry into the fire at valley parade is justified. a new book claims the fire was just one of at least nine fires at businesses owned by then-bradford chairman stafford heginbotham.   the fire claimed 56 lives and injured 265 in the disaster at bradford city's valley parade in 1985.
the fire at bradford city's valley parade claimed 56 victims and injured 265 on may 11, 1985. former player and rangers manager stuart mccall does not believe the fire was an accident. a book written by martin fletcher claims the disaster was started by bad luck. the 30th anniversary of the tragedy is approaching.
paul smith is in line to take on andre ward on june 20 in oakland, california.    smith has lost his last two world title challenges to arthur abraham of germany. ward has not fought since november 2013 and has won all of his 24 bouts.
carl froch has expressed his desire to fight julio cesar chavez jr in las vegas. former middleweight world champion was stopped in nine rounds by andrzej fonfara. chavez has not fought since knocking out george groves at wembley last may.
patrick vieira has the backing of manchester city players to replace manuel pellegrini as manager if he is sacked. manchester players want the frenchman to take over at the end of the season. pep guardiola is currently bayern munich boss and is highly-respected at the club.
the jungle bar is being developed by icelandic duo búi bjarmar aðalsteinsson and stefán atli thoroddsen. called the jungle bar it also contains dates, sesame seeds and chocolate. cricket flour is said to be a good source of protein and other nutrients. the duo hopes it will encourage people in the west to eat more insects.
alexander giniyatullin kept a remarkably steady hand filming the scary scene in the kemerovo region of russia. a stream of soil flowed down a bank next to a main road, crushing trees in its path and leaving toppled power lines in its wake. the eerie phenomenon is called an 'earthflow' and is a rare type of landslide. it is thought to have happened at around 1pm on april 1. the earthflow also blocked nearby railroad tracks and caused power outages, but no one was hurt.
nicholas tooth, 25, was playing for the quirindi lions when he hit his head on an opponent's shoulder in a tackle during a first grade rugby union match on saturday. he was airlifted to newcastle's john hunter hospital in a critical condition but died late on sunday. the young man was visiting his hometown in the new england region of nsw for the weekend. mr tooth was remembered as a 'highly regarded' player and a 'good bloke' by his club.
women aged 17 to 25 compared themselves to their friends on facebook rather than celebrities in magazines. study by psychologists at university of new south wales found 40 per cent of young women spend 40% of their time online. women compare themselves alongside pictures of friends to measure up against each other.
video has emerged showing galaxy s6 edge bending and shattering under 110lbs (50kg) of pressure. the video was released by third-party warranty firm squaretrade . samsung claims the tests conducted by squaretrade was unfair as 110lbs of pressure 'rarely occurs' under normal circumstances. the company has responded with its own video showing a three-point bend test on both phones. s samsung famously poked fun at apple last year when it emerged its iphone 6 plus could bend.
unidentified woman flexed her muscles during a 'flex cam' break at a philadelphia soul game on april 12. video of the unidentified woman's robust display at the arena football league game has over 300,000 views on youtube. the flex cam is a stadium tradition in which people display their muscles.
40-second-video recorded by haim kaplan at the ngorongoro conservation area in tanzania. shows the driver of a supply truck trying to scare away a group of baboons. the driver is forced to retreat as one makes a lunge at him and another jumps into the back of the truck.
dr sandra lee is dermatologist at the skin physicians & surgeons practice in upland, california. she shares videos of herself extracting her patients' zits on her popular youtube channel. the clips have earned her nearly 60,000 subscribers, and she is known as dr pimple popper online. dr lee became an internet sensation after she posted a video of her extracting a man's blackheads on reddit and shared it. she is now well-known among the pimple popping community on reddit.
in a 2012 video, bus monitor karen huff klein, 71, was tormented by middle school students in greece, new york. one of the students involved in verbal attack has been accused of forcing a special-needs student to drink urine from a toilet while holding his crotch. mrs klein said that the students 'didn't learn any lessons' after learning of the alleged incident.   one of students involved was also involved in the bullying of a bus monitor three years ago at greee athena high school in upstate new yorks.
canine hairdressers in the taiwanese capital taipei are giving pooches bizarre new pet grooming trend. craze involves having pet pooch's fur shaped into a sphere or a square. many are now opting for the cuts simply to get more likes and shares on social media sites.
indonesian president joko widodo confirmed executions of bali nine duo andrew chan and myuran sukumaran is 'only a matter of time'    the pair are set to face the firing squad alongside eight other drug felons as soon as all appeals have concluded. the pair lost their most recent appeal for clemency and remain in an isolated cell.
john lahiff was bitten by a crocodile while playing golf at clive palmer's port douglas golf course on monday afternoon. the man in his 70s believes he accidentally stood on a sunbaking crocodile. he has spoken out from his hospital bed at cairns base hospital, swearing he will return to the green again. the golfer received puncture wounds on his leg and foot, including one down to the bone. he was taken to mossman district hospital in a stable condition.
tateyama kurobe alpine route opened to the public today on the winding track of murodo in japan. over a million people visit the 65ft high walls every year but numbers dropped to 910,000 last year. the walled wonder usually draws about a million visitors every year.
the ghost town of balestrino dates back to the 11th century a.d. and is based 40 miles south east of genoa. residents were forced to flee their homes in the town more than 60 years ago due to seismic instability caused by earthquakes. it is considered to be the most famous abandoned location in italy and folklore suggests that the area is haunted.
manchester city are four points clear at the top of the premier league table. but manuel pellegrini's side are vulnerable if they come fifth in the league. yaya toure has been a shadow of the player who led manchester to the title last season. pep guardiola's long-term plan is to take over at manchester in 2016.
welsh fort on st catherine's island, off the coast of tenby, pembrokeshire, can only be reached by crossing a beach during low tide. a new 328ft footbridge will open up the island for the first time. the fort was built in 1867, and defended britain from french invasion.
bizarre slow motion footage was captured in santa barbara, california by video maker scott kaiser. the bird opens its mouth to show off the size difference between the two parts of its beak. the video shows the pelican's tongue and inner bill anatomy on display in slow motion.

passengers at domodedovo airport in russia spotted a man asleep on the baggage reclaim conveyor belt. footage shows a man lying in the foetal position on the conveyor at the airport. other passengers appear more concerned with claiming their luggage. it's not the first time a passenger has decided to sleep on the airport baggage reclaim.
former england rugby captain lewis moody is undertaking a 100km trek to the north pole to raise £250,000 for charity. the plane was forced to make an emergency landing due to poor visibility. the aircraft's undercarriage was damaged in the bumpy landing. moody, 36, and his fellow trekkers were unharmed in the incident.
the dog named teeny is captured on video completing press-ups alongside a dog trainer at dogaroo centre in hong kong. the dog is sat opposite eric ko – a trainer with over ten years' experience . after a count of four the dog leans out and gives the trainer a kiss.
a knuckle cracks in less than 310 milliseconds and water rushing together causes a white flash. the cracking is caused by the rapid formation of a gas-filled cavity within a slippery substance called synovial fluid that lubricates the space between the finger bones. the experiment was made possible by magnetic resonance imaging.
the lion got its head stuck in a feeding barrel at the dierenrijk zoo in the netherlands. the animal was attempting to retrieve a piece of meat from the barrel. the lion jumps backwards and attempts to flick the barrel from its head as the other lions chase after it. visitors to the zoo can be heard laughing hysterically as the lion tries to free itself.
the cafe is based in moscow and invites cat lovers to bring their pets along for a cup of tea. all of the cats were rescued from a local shelter and have been vaccinated and chipped. customers are allowed to adopt the cats but only after an extensive interview. the cafe is the first of its kind to be opened in russia.

steven sloan and three friends were on an aluminium rowboat off the west coast of anderson island, washington. the group believe that the sound of the rope being pulled along the side of the boat is what attracted the killer whales. one of the group panics as the orcas swim dangerously close to and underneath the boat.

david cameron told an audience he was a west ham fan, despite supporting aston villa. the prime minister has since apologised, blaming a bout of 'brain fade' for the gaffe. the conservative party leader previously said he supported the west ham team. cameron was speaking at an event in south london and claimed to be a villa fan.
diego costa has failed to recover in time from a hamstring injury. jose mourinho's side travel to arsenal at the emirates on sunday. loic remy is also out of the match leaving didier drogba as chelsea's only fit senior striker. costa is not even likely to be named on the bench for the game. chelsea are 10 points clear in the premier league title race.
adam johnson, 27, charged with three offences of sexual activity with a child under 16 and one of grooming. premier league winger was arrested at his mansion in county durham on march 2. he will appear at peterlee magistrates' court on may 20. johnson has represented england at senior level 12 times and has a three-month-old daughter.
the women's tennis stars attended the porsche grand prix tennis opening ceremony in stuttgart on monday. ana ivanovic, caroline wozniacki, sabine lisicki, and maria sharapova were all in attendance. serena williams admitted she was not ready for the clay court tournament. world no 1 is top seed at the tournament and has won the last three years.
smita srivastava currently holds the record for having the longest hair in india, documented in the limca book of records. her hair was measured at 7ft (2.1m), which is more than three inches longer than the height of the average basketball player. the 37-year-old indian rapunzel is a local celebrity and is a jury member at a beauty contest. she has ambitions of becoming a guinness world record holder.
the rubber drain cover had been kicked out of position in peterborough, cambridgeshire. boy's leg was trapped for more than half an hour down the hole. firefighters, police and ambulance crews worked to free the boy, a pupil at stanground academy. it is believed the temporary plastic drain cover was left uncovered.
ronaldo and zinedine zidane took part in the 12th annual match against poverty in saint-etienne. clarence seedorf, fabian barthez and jay-jay okocha also played and scored in the charity friendly match. pierre-emerick aubameyang scored a hat-trick in the 9-7 defeat for poverty.
jack grealish has met republic of ireland manager martin o'neill and could play for england. the 19-year-old will decide his international future at the end of the season. the aston villa forward has taken time out from national duty seven months ago.   he could end up playing for republic of irland against england in june but could still switch allegiance afterwards.
ann price was the owner of ann's snack bar in atlanta. the wall street journal named her signature 'ghetto burger,' a double cheeseburger with bacon, grilled onions, ketchup, mustard and chili, the best burger in america. price started the restaurant back in 1971 and was known for her no-cursing policy.
eugenie bouchard refused to shake the hand of alexandra dulgheru before fed cup match at the weekend. the 21-year-old was mocked at home and abroad over the handshake controversy . she has since lost both her singles matches to players ranked 69 and 104 in the tournament. the world no 7 has now lost six out of eight matches this season.
eden hazard is poised to win pfa player of the year. chelsea winger must make himself a killer or a bully to defenders, insists gary neville. neville says cristiano ronaldo and lionel messi are 'in outer space' by comparison to other players. hazard is on par with arjen robben, thomas muller, neymar and gareth bale.
liverpool have agreed a new three-year kit sponsorship deal with standard chartered bank. the partnership will run through to the end of the 2018-19 season. standard chartered bank signed up as the reds' main sponsor in july 2010. the financial terms of the agreement remain confidential.
david ospina was lucky not to concede a penalty after clattering into oscar. laurent koscielny and per mertesacker both impressed for arsene wenger's side. but olivier giroud had little joy up front for the gunners. cesc fabregas was booed on his return to the emirates.
west ham's season tickets will cost as little as £289 when they move to the olympic stadium in stratford. co-chairmen david gold and david sullivan will use enhanced tv revenue to pass on savings to fans. the hammers will have the cheapest pricing strategy in the premier league. every season-ticket band at the club will be reduced by up to £205.
lewis hamilton claimed his third grand prix win of the season in bahrain on sunday. the mercedes driver extended his lead in the championship to three points. hamilton's younger sibling nicolas is preparing to compete in the british touring car championship. nicolas suffers from cerebral palsy.
floyd mayweather and manny pacquiao are less than two weeks away from facing each other in the richest fight in history. the pair spent the weekend with their families in los angeles. mayweather was joined by girlfriend doralie medina and his wife jinkee. both men will begin final week of training this week.
jack grealish starred as aston villa beat liverpool 2-1 in the fa cup semi-final on sunday. the 19-year-old wears his socks rolled down to show he is unafraid of taking hits. he has to buy kid-sized shinpads to meet safety regulations. man united legend george best also wore his socks round his ankles as a teenager. grealishes and his model girlfriend sasha attwood have been together since the age of 14.
manchester united players wayne rooney and david de gea and ashley young met sick supporters. louis van gaal and his players visited the manchester united foundation at their training ground on monday. the trio were part of a 'dream day' for the united foundation. united manager van gaals was in a jovial mood as he met the fans.
ronnie o'sullivan made a rude gesture during his second round match against matthew stevens. the five-time world champion was spoken to by referee olivier marteel and warned about his behaviour. o'ssullivan was leading 12-4 in the match at the end of the afternoon session.
video allegedly shot near the capital of sanaa shows 20 men wearing desert camouflage uniforms carrying out rifle routine in the sand. group calls itself soldiers of the caliphate in yemen and claims to have established a 'caliphate' in the country. it comes after months of conflict which has seen iran-backed houthi rebels fight both the government and al qaeda affiliates.
abby bishop was 24 when she took in her two-day-old niece zala. basketballer abby bishop has looked after her niece since she was two days old. now zala is 20 months old and she follows bishop as she travels the world playing for professional teams. zala will go with bishop to the u.s. this may when she starts playing for the seattle storm in the wnba. bishop has had to make a lot of adjustments to her life as a professional athlete.
javier hernandez scored twice in real madrid's 4-2 win over celta vigo on sunday night. the on-loan manchester united striker has scored six goals in eight games. real manager carlo ancelotti says the striker is undroppable on current form. real moved back to within two points of barcelona at the top of la liga.
andrea pirlo scored a stunning free-kick for juventus against rivals torino on sunday. juventus could have wrapped up their fourth consecutive serie a title with a victory. but juve fell to a 2-1 defeat at torino and missed out on the title. juve remain 14 points clear at the top of the league table.
david haye, 34, was stopped at dubai international airport after his arrival for a holiday. he was accused of fraud after writing a cheque as payment for a new property which bounced. former two-weight world champion handed over his passport to authorities. he has been unable to leave dubai and was forced to miss a mixed martial arts event in birmingham. haye has said the cheque was down to an 'administrative error' and was released the same day.
six chelsea players have been named in the pfa premier league team of the year for the 2014-15 season. john terry, gary cahill, branislav ivanovic, ryan bertrand, eden hazard and alexis sanchez are all in the team.    pfa announced the team for the premier league for the season on sunday morning.  david de gea was named as manchester united's most outstanding player this season.
daley blind was given a self-portrait of himself and his father danny as a late birthday present. the manchester united star posted a picture of the painting on his instagram. blind has been a key player for louis van gaal's side this season. the dutch star faces everton at sunday at goodison park.
arsene wenger's side are third in the premier league, level on points with manchester city. hector bellerin, francis coquelin and nacho monreal have impressed for the gunners this season. cesc fabregas was booed by large portions of the arsenal supporters after his return to the emirates. but when he was substituted in the final minute he was given an applause.
england's national saint's day falls on april 23. international footballers past and present took to social media to celebrate st george's day. harry kane, rio ferdinand and gary cahill among those to post pictures and videos.
ronnie o'sullivan took off his shoes mid-match at the crucible and played a frame in his socks. the five-time world champion was forced to borrow a pair of shoes from a member of the audience. o'ssullivan led craig steadman 7-2 in the first round of the betfred world championship. the 39-year-old could face a fine after breaching snooker's strict dress code.
manchester united lost 3-0 to everton at goodison park on sunday in the premier league. louis van gaal accused his players of lacking desire after the match. gary neville has slammed manchester united's performance as 'toothless'    it was the red devils' worst performance in the last five or six weeks.
laura wells is a model and environmental scientist. designed swimwear line in collaboration with us brand swimsuits for all. the eco-friendly collection is made entirely of 100 per cent recycled material. the collection is inspired by the ocean and features coral reef inspired designs. she has previously fronted campaigns for upside, berlei and asos.
manchester united lost 3-0 at everton in the premier league on saturday. louis van gaal said his players could not match everton's motivation. chris smalling said united were'second best from first minute until last'    manager fears defeat has allowed liverpool to apply pressure to united in the race for fourth.
live video streaming apps such as periscope and meerkat allow users to stream live video for free. sky and hbo could miss out on millions of viewers if viewers illegally stream the mega-fight. mayweather vs manny pacquiao will be broadcast next saturday on sky and showtime. sky is charging between £66 and £89.99 to watch the fight in the us.
jose mourinho has branded arsenal's 11-year wait for the premier league title as 'boring'    arsene wenger accused chelsea of being purposefully defensive during goalless draw at the emirates stadium on sunday. home fans chanted 'boring, boring gunners' throughout the game.   the portuguese manager heaped praise on skipper john terry for his 'fantastic' performance.
franck ribery, mehdi benatia, david alaba and arjen robben were injured for bayern munich's champions league clash with porto. pep guardiola's side lost 3-1 to porto at the allianz arena on tuesday night. robben was unavailable for the game with an abdominal injury. the german giants beat porto 6-1 on aggregate to reach the semi-finals.
cristiano ronaldo's shot hit a young supporter during real madrid's win over rivals atletico. the portuguese forward removed his training shirt and gave it to the supporter. the young supporter was star-struck by the kind act of kindness. real mad madrid face atletico in the champions league quarter-final on wednesday night.

manchester united manager louis van gaal says that wayne rooney suffered a knee injury during the defeat by everton at goodison park. rooney was replaced by robin van persie in the closing stages of the premier league clash. the england international was seen receiving treatment on the bench.   it is too early to know the severity of rooney's injury.
tottenham striker harry kane was named pfa young player of the year 2015 on sunday. the 21-year-old has scored 20 premier league goals for tottenham this season. kane also scored on his senior england debut for the club. the striker started the season as third-choice striker for spurs. he spent time on loan at four different clubs before breaking into the first-team.

the emerald green, diamond encrusted belt was unveiled by world boxing council president mauricio sulaiman in mexico city on tuesday. the $1million emerald winner's belt will be worn by manny pacquiao and floyd mayweather in the mega-fight on may 2. light heavyweight champion adonis stevenson and former world heavyweight champion larry holmes were also on hand to unveil the belt. mayweather was again spotted training in public ahead of his showdown with mayweather.

angelique kerber beat caroline wozniacki 3-6, 6-1, 7-5 in the final of the porsche grand prix in stuttgart. kerber came from a set down to win her second title of the season. the german beat the third seed in three sets .
australian jockey blake shinn rode his pants off in the opening race of a meeting in sydney. elastic in his pants gave way as he attempted to ride miss royale to victory. the 27-year-old bared his bum to all at the hyland race colours plate in canterbury, australia. shinn was forced to ride more than 200 metres to the finish line with his pants down.

man, known only as jason, from vancouver, uploaded the video to youtube of his method of popping a cyst. his wife filmed the video after his sister in law helped him pop the grape-sized growth on his wrist. he cried out in pain as his wife recorded the video of the procedure. jason's method of pop a cyster is condemned by medical professionals and doctors.

badou jack beat anthony dirrell on points at the uic pavilion on friday night. george groves will fight badou jack for the wbc world super-middleweight title this summer. groves bet £100 that jack would beat dirrell by a points decision or via a technical one. the 27-year-old took to instagram to show off his winning bet.

daniel sturridge will miss liverpool's trip to face hull city on tuesday night because of injury. brendan rodgers is unsure whether the striker will play again this season because of calf and thigh injuries. rodgers has vowed to do 'what is best' for the striker. the manager is adamant he will strengthen this summer and is keen on signing memphis depay.

st mirren skipper steven thompson accidentally speared team-mate john mcginn with a pole in training. john was stabbed in the leg by the pole and will miss the rest of the season. the scotland under 21 player is on crutches and will be out of action for a year.  thompson threw the pole at john in jest and it stabbed him on the leg.
paula radcliffe ran her final london marathon on sunday. the 41-year-old finished in a time of 2:36.55 in her final competitive race. radcliffe was the world record holder for the 26.2mile race for 12 years. she said the time was irrelevant and that she was 'unfit and unprepared' for the race.   radcliffe had barely run since february due to injury.
jurgen klopp has confirmed he will be leaving borussia dortmund in the summer. franz beckenbauer believes pep guardiola could succeed him at bayern munich. klopp won two bundesliga titles in seven years with borussian dortmund. becken bauer believes only a fully fit squad can beat lionel messi and co in the champions league.

thomas muller scored his 27th goal in the champions league during bayern munich's 6-1 win against porto at the allianz arena. the world cup winner became the highest-scoring german in the tournament. pep guardiola's side celebrated the win with bayern fans after the match. muller used a megaphone to stir up the fans as he led the celebrations.

world no 1 golfer rory mcilroy was a guest at a junior golf event in south carolina. he arm wrestled 17-year-old brad dalke in a strength test. dalkes will join oklahoma university in the autumn after graduating from high school. he committed to the university at the age of 12 and has finished high school a year early.
javier hernandez scored twice as real madrid beat celta vigo 4-2 in la liga. the manchester united loanee now has six goals in eight starts for carlo ancelotti's side. nolito opened the scoring for celta but toni kroos equalised for the visitors. james rodriguez scored the other goal for real.
john terry has made an appearance in all 33 premier league games for chelsea this season. the blues captain is on course to appear in all 38 premier league matches for his side. terry made just 14 appearances in the 2012-13 season under rafa benitez. the 34-year-old made 37 premier league appearances during the 2009-10 title winning season.
wladimir klitschko beat bryant jennings at madison square garden on saturday night. the world heavyweight champion has confirmed that tyson fury will be his next opponent. the 39-year-old is willing to fight fury in england and says he is ready to travel to america to defend his belts.   the ukrainian ended his seven-year american hiatus after beating bryants jennington.
chelsea beat manchester united 0-0 at arsenal in the premier league on saturday. jose mourinho's side have one of the best back fours in premier league history. john terry, paulo ferreira, william gallas and ricardo carvalho form a solid back four.   no team has conceded fewer goals in a premier league season than chelsea in 2004-05 as they won the title. manchester united's treble-winning defence of 1998-99 was the best in the league's history.

bafetimbi gomis has been recovering from a hamstring injury in france. the swansea city striker has been spending time with his family in lyon. the frenchman suffered the injury during the 1-1 draw with everton earlier this month. scans revealed a grade two hamstring tear and he is expected to be out for two to three weeks.

qatar spent an astonishing £17.2 billion directly and indirectly on the way to winning the 2022 world cup. much of this outlay was on goods and services for qatar. cash payments were made from secret slush funds controlled by mohammed bin hammam . fifa have been called upon to overturn the controversial decision to hand the world cup to qatar .

the apple watch sport edition is shown to shatter easily after being dropped from a height of just under four feet (1.2 metres)   the model has an ion-x glass display which is supposed to be'resistant to scratches and impact'   when the watch was dropped so the display hit the floor first, the screen shattered instantly. the watch costs from $349 (£299) but another test has shown that the watch lives up to apple's waterproof claims.
